Description:
2M KABLO was established in TURKEY in 1993 for low voltage cables production. We are manufacturing instrumentation, control, fire resistant and cathodic protection cables.

2M KABLO has been supplying to the Construction, Oil &Gas, Petrochemical, Nuclear, Power Plant projects, Automation, Fire & Security as well as OEM production.

ProductGallery.Name: FIRE RESISTANT CABLE - SILICON
ProductGallery.Description: Fire-resistant cables are used for fire alarm systems, power supply or control of equipment that needs to function during a fire such as warning, emergency lighting, evacuation and monitor systems. The place of usage is intelligent or semi-intelligent buildings where dense human population or valuable goods are found. These can be hospitals, cinemas, theatres, schools, shopping centers, airports, factories, etc. Fire-resistant products have low smoke density, are halogen-free and they don't emit poisonous gases.

ProductGallery.Name: CATHODIC PROTECTION CABLES
ProductGallery.Description: CP Cable is used as direct earth burial DC feeder cable in cathodic protection systems to protect against galvanic and electrolytic corrosion of metallic objects - such as storage tanks, pipelines, wells and ocean vessels - that are buried or submerged in water.It has excellent abrasion, crush, chemical, oil, sunlight and moisture resistance. PVDF insulation offers additional resistance to corrosive gases and brackish water, and can be used for deep anode ground-bed installations. Cathodic protection can protect all types of buried and submerged metallic structures.

ProductGallery.Name: CONTROL CABLES
ProductGallery.Description: Used in signal transmission of control systems for many applications in buildings. These cables are operated with 300/500 V and with the cross-section of 0.14 mm² to 2.50 mm². Depending on the applications need, PVC, HFFR or TPU outer sheathed, bare or tinned copper, screened or unscreened types are available. HFFR versions are less flammable in case of fire, mostly self extinguishing, have low smoke density and they do not emit poisonous and corrosive gasses

ProductGallery.Name: FIRE ALARM CABLES
ProductGallery.Description: Fire alarm cables are used in internal and external places such as schools, hospitals, meeting rooms and shopping centers where safety regulations must be taken against fire. These cables can be preferred in communication, ventilation, lighting  and voice announce systems of emergency exit ways, equipments and devices. Screened types protect the signal from electromagnetic interference and provide continuity in signal quality.

ProductGallery.Name: INSTRUMENTATION CABLES
ProductGallery.Description: Used in communication and instrumentation applications in process in industries like oil exploration, cement, paper, steel, power generation as well as in intrinsically safe systems in hazardous areas like petrochemical plants and thermal power plants to monitor measuring equipment in process automation applications. Individually and/or overall screened twisted pairs/triads/quads types are available where electromagnetic protection is needed. HFFR and/or fire resistant types are available upon request.

ProductGallery.Name: SERVO MOTOR CABLES
ProductGallery.Description: Servo Motor Cables are developed for frequency-controlled large power drive systems. They are used as connecting cables for high power transmission between frequency converters and large motor drives, reducing the effect of high electromagnetic interference signals. It is suitable for electromagnetic protection and it is suitable for use in narrow spaces with its double screen, low capacity flexible structure.Usage areas; Industrial plants are used in the paper industry and packaging industry, manufacturing and assembly industrial

ProductGallery.Name: UL CERTIFIED CABLES
ProductGallery.Description: The 300 V Instrumentation Cables are dual listed as Type PLTC per UL 13 and Type ITC per UL 2250. These cables can be preferred in Instrument & Control Wiring, communication, ventilation, lighting, and voice announce systems of emergency exit ways, equipment, and devices. Shielded types protect the signal from electromagnetic interference and provide continuity in signal quality.

Description:
3R solutions offers software and turnkey automation projects for optimized pipe spool fabrication.
3R’s software and pipe-shop solutions are customized to the client’s requirements.

ProductGallery.Name: Smart Automated Pipe-Shop
ProductGallery.Description:
Example of an automated pipe-shop.
The machines, transport system and manual workstations are connected to a central database that stores all information on all spools, and facilitates production planning. It provides details for spools in fabrication and updates their status after each step. The software is also used for tracking and quality assurance.
3R creates the shop layout, coordinates the installation and provides the software framework to control the entire fabrication process.

ProductGallery.Name: Smart Automated Pipe-Shop
ProductGallery.Description:
Example of an automated pipe-shop.
The machines, transport system and manual workstations are connected to a central database that stores all information on all spools, and facilitates production planning. It provides details for spools in fabrication and updates their status after each step. The software is also used for tracking and quality assurance.
3R creates the shop layout, coordinates the installation and provides the software framework to control the entire fabrication process.

ProductGallery.Name: Smart Automated Pipe-Shop
ProductGallery.Description:
Example of an automated pipe-shop.
The machines, transport system and manual workstations are connected to a central database that stores all information on all spools, and facilitates production planning. It provides details for spools in fabrication and updates their status after each step. The software is also used for tracking and quality assurance.
3R creates the shop layout, coordinates the installation and provides the software framework to control the entire fabrication process.

ProductGallery.Name: Smart Automated Pipe-Shop
ProductGallery.Description:
Example of an automated pipe-shop.
The machines, transport system and manual workstations are connected to a central database that stores all information on all spools, and facilitates production planning. It provides details for spools in fabrication and updates their status after each step. The software is also used for tracking and quality assurance.
3R creates the shop layout, coordinates the installation and provides the software framework to control the entire fabrication process.

ProductGallery.Name: Integration of Software and Machines
ProductGallery.Description: 3R bridges the gap between engineering and fabrication by connecting all machines and manual workstations to a central database. Fabrication data is continuously transfered back and forth, so you are always aware of the status of every pipe and spool currently in production. This way you are also able to effortlessly control the fabrication process without the need for any printed paperwork.

ProductGallery.Name: Machine for Automated Pipe Spool Fabrication
ProductGallery.Description:
This flange welding machine has the ability to weld two slip-on flanges simultaneously, with four welding torches (two for the inner welds and two for the outer welds) working at the same time.
The machine can be integrated into 3R's automated pipe-shop solutions. 3R's software provides the machine with the necessary data (e.g. flange rotation), and the automated transport system ensures that idle times are kept to a minimum.

ProductGallery.Name: Machine for Pipe Bending
ProductGallery.Description:
Bending machines are a great way to reduce cost and fabrication time, as there is no need to weld elbows to pipes. With a lot fewer welding seams, there is also less chance of failure, and quality can be increased.
These machines can be integrated into 3R's automated pipe-shop solutions. 3R's software provides them with CNC data, and it also simulates the bending process to ensure there won't be any collisions.

ProductGallery.Name: Control Software for Automated Pipe-Shops
ProductGallery.Description: Every machine and manual workstation in 3R's automated pipe-shops is connected to a central database, which makes it possible to control the entire fabrication from outside the shop. Every station sends updates after each processing step, so you can always track the status of every spool and pipe currently in production. You can also check the status of the machines themselves, as well as the transport system.

ProductGallery.Name: Software for Bending Feasibility Analysis
ProductGallery.Description: Kolli is 3R's application for simulation the bending process of a pipe. It receives the bending data from the central database and ensures that the pipe can be bent on your machine. It detects any possible collision, and in case it finds one, it automatically attempts to change the process in order to avoid any collisions. It supports a large variety of bending machine types.

ProductGallery.Name: Software for Creating/Importing Isometric Drawings
ProductGallery.Description: IsoBuilder is 3R's application for isometric drawings. It enables you to create them or import them from 3rd party systems. It boasts a variety of features, such as automatic spool splitting, automatic calculation of production time and costs, or generation of detailed processing data and lists. As it is part of 3R's software framework, it is connected to the central database and provides other applications with fabrication data.

We offer the best service possible, from presale advice to aftersales service. 7Solutions is ISO 9001 certified. Our turnaround is among the fastest in the industry, returning your instrument within five business days if possible.

ProductGallery.Name: WatchGas POLI
ProductGallery.Description: The WatchGas POLI in pumped version is an advanced instrument with an integrated pump that enables a full range of sensors for a variety of applications, including confined space entry. The POLI in diffuse detection version is a multigas detector that is ideally suited for worker safety monitoring in hazardous locations.

ProductGallery.Name: WatchGas UNI Sustainable
ProductGallery.Description: The UNI Sustainable is a sustainable single gas detector that offers a simple portable solution for a wide array of toxic gases and O2 (Oxygen) applications. The monitors have a large LCD screen, providing maximum readability in the field. These monitors are equipped with six bright red LEDs, allowing quick alarm notification. Constructed of strong and durable material, the UNI Sustainable is designed to be comfortable, yet drop resistant.

ProductGallery.Name: Ballfloat
ProductGallery.Description: For a confined space clearance measurement, a sampling hose is attached to a pumped gas detector. An open-end is at risk of allowing dust and liquids to enter the sampling hose, blocking the hose and delaying the work. Ballfloats are a perfect way to ensure no liquid or dust can enter the sampling hose. WatchGas has completely redeveloped the ball float to make it suited to heavy-duty work in every way.

ProductGallery.Name: WatchGas XDIwin
ProductGallery.Description: The XDI Gas Sensor is capable of utilizing a wide range of sensor cell types offering an unmatched number of configurations allowing for a simple stand-alone 4~20mA transmitter or a CAN bus address system enabling networking of up to 64 process sensors with a local diagnostics port which allows interrogation using a PC, network sensors may also provide individual independent 4~20mA outputs.

ProductGallery.Name: WatchGas NEO
ProductGallery.Description: The NEO is one of the most advanced handheld VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) monitors available for ppb (parts per billion) detection. The NEO offers several models from the most sensitive 1ppb to a high range up to 20.000 ppm for different applications and user selections. A novel design of Photo Ionization Detector (PID) and Ultra Violet (UV) lamp significantly reduces interferences due to humidity.

ProductGallery.Name: WatchGas QGM 5-Way Stackable Charging Cradle
ProductGallery.Description: Safety is key. The WatchGas QGM is a versatile multi-gas monitor engineered to keep you and your staff safe while working in hazardous environments. But to do so, you will need certain accessories to maintain the safety of your QGM, thus yourself. With a huge variety of charging solutions, there is always at least one to fulfill your needs.

ProductGallery.Name: Beacon Sounder
ProductGallery.Description: There are many types of alarms and lights available with many different features and sizes. All these designs have their own advantages and disadvantages, but these designs are not suitable for our applications. WatchGas has developed a Beacon Sounder, which is ideal as an alarm bar for the AirWatch and many other applications. BRIGHT AND LOUD. The Beacon Sounder, developed by WatchGas, has 36 ultra-bright RGB LEDs for colored lighting.

Description:
Founded in 2020, AFKAR is an EnergyTech Venture with the purpose of investing in cutting-edge technological solutions in the MENA region, while leveraging its unique ability to exploit the Energy transition and converge the ecosystems of businesses, innovators, regulators, and oil & gas companies alike. 

Fueled by collective expertise, industry knowledge and global network of its Founding Partners. AFKAR Ventures encapsulates a novel approach to its investments, market access, and intellectual property development, and enables the acceleration of transformational technological solutions in ways never seen before. The blend of innovation, collaboration, and Partnerships, complimented with unmatched active participation are fundamental and underpin our investment strategy for future growth. ​

We offer engineers to be engineers.

iQx™ is cloud native software built on the modern architecture. Through Open API, it can connect to all other well known softwares.

Understanding the complexity of time and cost estimation, time tracking, storing the best lessons and rig scheduling, iQx™ software provides plug-and-play applications that deliver both instant benefits and long-term value.

ProductGallery.Name: P1 - Well Cost Estimates with Risk Modelling
ProductGallery.Description:
Using Monte Carlo probabilistic modelling approach, iQx™ P1™ simulates time and cost outcomes considering all potential risks.

The application has an intuitive user interface allowing data to be imported from multiple sources. Powerful visuals provide probability ranges from P10 to P90 increasing confidence in budgeting. The outputs can easily be transferred to iQx™ CT™ (Actual Time and Cost Tracker) application when the project moves from planning to operations.

More info: https://agr-software.com/

ProductGallery.Name: CT Project Time and Cost Tracker
ProductGallery.Description:
CT™ seamlessly integrates user's all ongoing operations so that time and cost is tracked in one place. The application provides auto generated lookahead, email plugin for daily reports and a diverse range of time & cost related charts and overviews. Project members are easily added and removed from the project so that control can be kept over the distribution of information. 

More information https://agr-software.com/

ProductGallery.Name: RIG - Digitising rig scheduling
ProductGallery.Description:
RIG allows to manage the entire rig portfolio in one place. With collaboration at its heart, RIG offers seamless rig scheduling data sharing across all stakeholders. The user can test what-if scenarios and optimise alternative rig schedules. RIG is flexible and offers easy switch between Drafts and Master schedule. The user benefits powerful visual display of rigs and wells highlighting well maturity and white space. 

Case studies: https://agr-software.com/case-studies/Rig-scheduling-software-improves-asset-utilisation-planning-and-cost-efficiencies

website: https://rig.digital

More info: https://agr-software.com/

ProductGallery.Name: Ex - Learn from your Success
ProductGallery.Description:
Ex™ helps digitise storing the lessons learned and provides cloud-based central archive for best practices. Disconnected spreadsheets are now all stored online and provide access to the most recent data. Ex™ facilitates the gathering, storage and analysis of Experiences and Lessons Learned. The application ensures motivation for working with optimised learning across the company. Experiences are linked to projects, so they will be visible in both reports and the offset analysis.

More info: https://agr-software.com/

PressReleases.Name: Santos Ltd uses iQx™ drilling software
PressReleases.Description:
Using Monte Carlo simulation methodology, iQx™ P1™ helps well engineers enhance understanding of correlation between well costs and risks and improves information input for budgeting decisions. When complemented with CT™, all project members have access to the most actual drilling time and cost - saving the team unpleasant surprise at the end of the project.

We look forward to assisting the Santos team as they pursue their ambitions.

https://agr-software.com/news/General/Santos-Ltd-uses-iQx%e2%84%a2-drilling-software

PressReleases.Name: Spirit Energy picks iQx™ as their well time and cost planning tool
PressReleases.Description:
Spirit Energy recently joined our iQx user family. We can't wait to start providing P1 application to Spirit Energy's drilling and wells team. 

As their go-to tool for well time and cost planning, P1 delivers transparency in AFE budgeting and in choosing the most optimum well delivery path.
 
Get in touch with us at sales@agr-software.com and allow us to demonstrate how we help you improve uncertainty assessment in well cost.

PressReleases.Name: CT™ provides high quality data input to Neptune Energy's Deepsea Yantai drilling campaign
PressReleases.Description:
iQx long term user Neptune Energy used P1 time and cost planning and CT tracking application on their recent drilling campaign with Deepsea Yantai in the Norwegian Sea.

The outputs from the iQx applications provided high quality data for input into Neptune’s detailed analysis in Microsoft PowerBI.

As a result, Neptune Energy was able to achieve powerful visual and dynamic calculations to help ensure the actual costs remained within the sanctioned budget.

PressReleases.Name: Field proven well cost time estimation software plays a key role in the race for viable geothermal energy
PressReleases.Description: Deutsche ErdWärme, the largest private developer of geothermal power plants in Germany and a business committed to standardising, professionalising and automating the process of geothermal drilling, has partnered with AGR Software. The iQx™ platform is already delivering important, measurable benefits. Results already show that optimum performance is being achieved through enhanced understanding of all well risks, costs and timescales. These are all critical challenges to overcome in the high stakes race to improve the viability.

Analysis on future rig needs have contributed into Aker BP securing 5 of the NCS best rigs on long term contracts for their future rig needs.

The valve manufacturer AS-Schneider labels its valves with a QR code: This gives customers easy access to valve specifications and technical documents.

Description: Beamex is your trusted partner for calibration excellence, providing accurate measurements, reliable data, and traceability for a safer and less uncertain world. Beamex helps improve efficiency, ensure compliance, and increase safety with its comprehensive ecosystem of calibration solutions – from field calibration to workshop calibration, calibration management, and services. Through the company´s global reach, Beamex products and services are available in over 90 countries.

ProductGallery.Name: MC6-T State-of-the-art temperature calibrator and communicator
ProductGallery.Description:
Versatile temperature calibrator

The Beamex MC6-T is an extremely versatile portable automated temperature calibration system. It combines a state-of-the-art temperature dry-block with Beamex MC6 multifunction process calibrator and communicator technology.

It offers versatility, that no other temperature calibrator can match.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/calibrators/beamex-mc6-t/

ProductGallery.Name: MC6-Ex Intrinsically safe field calibrator and communicator
ProductGallery.Description:
The MC6-Ex is an intrinsically safe field calibrator and communicator.

It is ATEX, IECEx and North American certified and can be used in all hazardous zones / divisions.

The MC6-Ex includes a field communicator for HART, FOUNDATION Fieldbus and Profibus protocols.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/calibrators/beamex-mc6-ex/

ProductGallery.Name: MC6 Advanced field calibrator and communicator
ProductGallery.Description:
The Beamex MC6 is an advanced, high-accuracy field calibrator and communicator. It offers calibration capabilities for pressure, temperature and various electrical signals.

The MC6 also contains a fieldbus communicator for HART, FOUNDATION Fieldbus and Profibus PA instruments.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/calibrators/mc6-calibrator/

ProductGallery.Name: Beame ePG Electric pressure pump and controller
ProductGallery.Description:
Beamex ePG is an electric pressure pump and controller.

It provides an easy way to generate pressure.

The Beamex ePG is a portable, battery-operated electric pressure pump for industrial pressure calibration applications in ranges from -0.85 bar (-12.3 psi) up to 20 bar (300 psi).

It provides an effortless way to generate pressure or vacuum.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/calibrators/beamex-epg/

ProductGallery.Name: Beamex CENTRiCAL calibration bench
ProductGallery.Description:
A better way for workshop calibration

A modular solution for workshop calibration.

The Beamex CENTRiCAL calibration bench reflects the result of decades of experience providing workshop calibration solutions to the industrial process industry.

A standard yet configurable solution, combines ease of use, versatility, ergonomics and provides a better way to perform calibrations in a workshop.

Beamex CENTRiCAL – a central place for all your calibrations.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/calibrators/beamex-centrical-calibration-bench/

ProductGallery.Name: Beamex CENTRiCAL Trolley
ProductGallery.Description:
The Beamex CENTRiCAL trolley can be supplied with the same modules as the CENTRiCAL bench.

The trolley is equipped with wheels, an adjustable shelf, and a lockable drawer unit for storage.

The trolley has a modular construction: the instrument panel can be placed in the top of the trolley with a shelf in the middle, or in the middle of the trolley leaving the top shelf free for instruments.

ProductGallery.Name: Beamex CMX Calibration management software
ProductGallery.Description:
Beamex CMX calibration software helps in planning, managing, analyzing and documenting all calibration work and assets safely and efficiently, even in a highly regulated industry.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/software/calibration-software/

ProductGallery.Name: Beamex LOGiCAL Calibration Software
ProductGallery.Description:
Subscription-based calibration software Calibration software as a service. With LOGiCAL you will know what needs calibrating and when. By removing the need for manual data entry your calibration process will become faster and more reliable. You can also access calibration results and generate certificates (PDF) via your browser at any time. As a cloud-based solution, LOGiCAL makes it easy to cooperate and work at multiple locations. 

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/software/logical-calibration-software/

ProductGallery.Name: Beamex bMobile Calibration Application
ProductGallery.Description:
The Beamex bMobile Calibration Application is an intuitive, multi-platform solution for guided execution and documentation of field calibrations when used with Beamex CMX or Beamex LOGiCAL Calibration Management Software.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/software/beamex-bmobile-application/

ProductGallery.Name: Beamex POC8 Automatic Pressure Controller
ProductGallery.Description:
Automatic pressure calibrations
Improve the efficiency of your pressure calibrations.

The Beamex POC8 is an automatic pressure controller making pressure calibrations very efficient and easy to perform.

A variety of pressure ranges are available, from vacuum up to 210 bar (3045 psi).

A POC8 can be equipped with 1 or 2 accurate internal pressure measurement ranges and a barometric module.

Learn more: https://www.beamex.com/calibrators/beamex-poc8/

ProductGallery.Name: BORSIG Propylene & Nitrogen Recovery Unit
ProductGallery.Description:
The degassing of PP resin in the resin bin to purge non-reacted propylene monomer is a typical process step in the production of polypropylene. Nitrogen is commonly used as a purge gas. Continuous purge streams containing substantial amounts of monomer are processed with the BORSIG Propylene & Nitrogen Recovery Unit in order to minimize: 
- Loss of profit due to substantial loss of propylene monomer & Nitrogen 
- Flare gas streams / flare

ProductGallery.Name: BORSIG Control Sphere
ProductGallery.Description:

• High mass flow applications 
• Operation with High delta P 
• Full shut-off function 
• Wear-free and robust design 
• No ice buildup or blocking, Glycol injection not necessary 
• Split Body or Top-Entry

Description:
Brunton Wire Ropes FZCo., is a rope specialist, manufacturing steel wire ropes in Jebel Ali Free Zone, Dubai from the year 2003. It is one of the 5 global plants that the billion-dollar Rope & Specialty steel giant USHA MARTIN GROUP has and is one of the best in the world.
This company, backed by the 100 years plus group experience in evolving advanced rope designs, with elaborate manufacturing base globally possessing state-of-the-art machines, rich experience on negotiating the dynamic market forces, has today become a ‘REAL SOLUTION PROVIDER’ to the markets it serves. Brunton Wire Ropes is proud to have the products sold continuously to more than 33 countries in Europe, North America, South America, North Asia, Australia, Africa, and Middle East & South East Asia.
This plant, in Dubai, produces & supplies steel wire ropes for Oil & Gas, Crane, General Engineering, Fishing, Dredging, Mining, Elevator applications having a very wide diameter range between 3mm and 77mm.The capability of producing and selling new generation ropes like the compacted & plasticated ropes have helped the consumers to get a complete solution from a single plant.  
The elaborate testing facilities from raw material to final product gives the plant a qualitative edge over many competitors and thus, enjoys the confidence of many major oil giants, mining groups, elevator OEMs, big rigging companies. This plant is QMS certified and additionally has Lloyds & API (American Petroleum Institute) certifications.  As a result, Brunton Wire Ropes has grown more than 300% in 15 years.
The extensive inventory planning clubbed with a sound logistics leverage due to its Geographical position & supported by a large efficient port like Jebel Ali, have helped Brunton Wire’s customers to get ropes faster at all parts of the world.
The group’s R&D is continuously helping Brunton Wire to offer new designs to the consumers thereby, gaining a technological leadership.
We are in the process of further expansion in augmenting the rope capacity and adding value added products that our consumers are demanding from us.
In short, the Group’s backward integration model, hinged upon contractual steel resources, in resonance with the quality excellence datum and aided by the experienced executive leadership, have made Brunton Wire Ropes FZCo., to be a name that spells enormous reliability to all sections of wire rope consumers all around the globe.

Description:
BS&B Safety Systems is recognised worldwide as a leading supplier of overpressure protection devices. From its many global manufacturing locations, BS&B’s core product ranges include 
•	Rupture Disks/Safety Head/Sensors/Graphite Disks
•	Custom Engineered Products solutions for the OEM, Aerospace and energy Industries.
•	Explosion Vents/Suppression/Isolation units.
•	Specialty Buckling Pin Relief Valves.
•	Flame Arresters/Breather Valves and PVRV's/Emergency Vents. 
•	Process Systems for the Oil & Gas, Chemical & Refining industries

ProductGallery.Name: Rupture Disk Devices
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B provides application choices with the industry leading range of reverse buckling, forward acting (tension loaded), and graphite rupture disk devices. Our broad experience allows us to manufacture specialty designs for overpressure or vacuum protection with flanged, threaded or sanitary/aseptic connections.

ProductGallery.Name: Explosion Protection Systems
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B has the most practical safety solutions for combustible dust processes. Designing client application solutions, BS&B enables users to achieve compliance with NFPA, OSHA and ATEX standards while maintaining process throughput and economy. With the widest range of explosion protection, flameless venting, isolation and suppression, BS&B provides the most comprehensive selection to the end user.

ProductGallery.Name: Custom Engineered Products & Rupture Disk Assemblies
ProductGallery.Description: Custom Engineered Products & Rupture Disk Assemblies

ProductGallery.Name: Specialty Valves
ProductGallery.Description: The BS&B specialty valve technology is focused on providing the highest flow capacity available from both in line and angle valve devices. BS&B buckling pin valves are fast acting / quick opening pressure relief devices that offer rapid and easy field reset, dramatically reducing plant downtime after activation. Traditional spring loaded pressure relief valves compliment the BS&B specialty valve range.

ProductGallery.Name: Flame Arresters & Tank Venting
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B FlameSaf™ Flame arresters are used as secondary protection against explosions by preventing the transmission of deflagration and detonation in machines, equipment and plant, containing flammable gases. Flame Arresters allow flow but prevent flame transmission when located in-line or at end of line. BS&B TankSaf™ Breather vents, also known as conservation vents or pressure/vacuum relief vents are used to protect against overpressure and/or vacuum within closed vessels or tanks handling flammable or non-flammable fluids.

ProductGallery.Name: Process Systems for Oil & Gas
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B designs and builds process equipment systems and plant for the oil and gas, chemical and refining industries. BS&B technology can be seen in tens of thousands of oil and gas and other processing systems and plants in all of the major energy producing areas of the world. BS&B technology provided much of the oil and gas processing technology in common use today.

ProductGallery.Name: Rupture Disk Devices
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B provides application choices with the industry leading range of reverse buckling, forward acting (tension loaded), and graphite rupture disk devices. Our broad experience allows us to manufacture specialty designs for overpressure or vacuum protection with flanged, threaded or sanitary/aseptic connections.

ProductGallery.Name: Explosion Protection Systems
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B has the most practical safety solutions for combustible dust processes. Designing client application solutions, BS&B enables users to achieve compliance with NFPA, OSHA and ATEX standards while maintaining process throughput and economy. With the widest range of explosion protection, flameless venting, isolation and suppression, BS&B provides the most comprehensive selection to the end user.

ProductGallery.Name: Custom Engineered Products & Rupture Disk Assemblies
ProductGallery.Description: Custom Engineered Products & Rupture Disk Assemblies

ProductGallery.Name: Specialty Valves
ProductGallery.Description: The BS&B specialty valve technology is focused on providing the highest flow capacity available from both in line and angle valve devices. BS&B buckling pin valves are fast acting / quick opening pressure relief devices that offer rapid and easy field reset, dramatically reducing plant downtime after activation. Traditional spring loaded pressure relief valves compliment the BS&B specialty valve range.

ProductGallery.Name: Flame Arresters & Tank Venting
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B FlameSaf™ Flame arresters are used as secondary protection against explosions by preventing the transmission of deflagration and detonation in machines, equipment and plant, containing flammable gases. Flame Arresters allow flow but prevent flame transmission when located in-line or at end of line. BS&B TankSaf™ Breather vents, also known as conservation vents or pressure/vacuum relief vents are used to protect against overpressure and/or vacuum within closed vessels or tanks handling flammable or non-flammable fluids.

ProductGallery.Name: Process Systems for Oil & Gas
ProductGallery.Description: BS&B designs and builds process equipment systems and plant for the oil and gas, chemical and refining industries. BS&B technology can be seen in tens of thousands of oil and gas and other processing systems and plants in all of the major energy producing areas of the world. Description: We design and manufacture 10, 15, 20 and 40,000 psi hydrojetting machines. These are backed up by a vast range of accessories for every hydrojetting application. Accessories include nozzles, centralizers, surface prep robots, tank cleaning heads, tube bundle cleaners, PPE and much more. And we support you at every stage with local spares, service and training.

ProductGallery.Name: MultiJet Hydrojetting Pump Unit
ProductGallery.Description: We design and manufacture two models of high and ultra high pressure hydrojetting machines — the 140iV and 200iV. Both units feature the Hammelmann reciprocating plunger pump which has proven its reliability in the toughest of industries for many years. This pump’s long service intervals and excellent reliability give these units a low operating cost and maximize their operational uptime.

ProductGallery.Name: Zone 2 hydrojetting
ProductGallery.Description: These high pressure offshore pumps undertake superstructure and fabric maintenance projects including heli-decks, accommodation areas, walkways, and pipes and supports. We manufacture both deisel and electric pump units and offer a range of pumps to suit your flow and pressure requirements. We also supply performance conversion kits which are easily fitted.

ProductGallery.Name: Process Pump Packages
ProductGallery.Description:
Our process pump systems are used in both onshore and offshore environments. We specialise in the design and manufacture of most energy-related API 674, API 675, API 610, API 676, API 682 and API 685 pump packages. 

The range of pumped fluids is extensive, and the pressures and flows can be configured to suit your exact requirements. From basic, single pump, chemical injection skids to bespoke multi-pump systems, our design and build experience is extensive

ProductGallery.Name: Aerial Tube Bundle Puller
ProductGallery.Description: This unit is lifted into position by crane and the tube pulling and pushing operations are achieved through its integrated power unit. Hydraulic operation is through remote control to aid operator safety. The machine has a facility to ensure the load and machine are balanced. The unit’s slim design allows good access to the tube bundle.

ProductGallery.Name: Tube Bundle Cleaning
ProductGallery.Description:
Our tube bundle cleaning equipment is all you need for safe, efficient tube cleaning. To suit varied industry requirements, we offer a number of internal and external tube bundle cleaning systems. 

Our range of heat exchanger cleaners includes single and multi-tube cleaning devices. The internal bundle cleaning robot supports up to 5 lances and is controlled from the comfort of a dedicated control cabin. Our Freelance offers fast, efficient, safe and pollution-free tube cleaning at rates exceeding 200 tubes per hour. Low cost and minimal set-up time make flex lancing a popular method of tube bundle cleaning. The SSC20 shell-side cleaner enables semi-automatic high pressure water jetting of awkward-to-reach areas via a robotic, hydraulic arm.

ProductGallery.Name: PPE for high and ultra high pressure hydrojetting
ProductGallery.Description: The TST range of safety clothing has been developed to offer excellent protection and comfort to the operator. The Waterjet Protection range covers pressures up to 3,000 bar and the ProOperator range offers high pressure cleaning protection up to 500 bar. TST Sweden clothing products are ideal for use in many of our high pressure hydrojetting applications.

ProductGallery.Name: Surface Preparation Robot
ProductGallery.Description:
The robot is attached to the work surface with permanent magnets and, thanks to its small build, is ideal for cleaning particularly close to the edge of the coated area. The vacuum system immediately retrieves all waste water and removed solids and
allows for futher processing. The process of removing coating with high pressure water returns the metal sufrace to its original profilce ready for re-coating.

ProductGallery.Name: Tank Cleaning
ProductGallery.Description:
We are your one-stop-shop for all your vessel cleaning equipment. From selecting the best method to clean the tank, nozzle selection, the tank cleaning device, to the pump that supplies the high pressure water, we are here to support you.

Our no-man-entry systems remove the operator from the area of work by automating the process. In addition to the safety benefits, this improves efficiency and the cleaning quality.

ProductGallery.Name: Pipe Cleaning
ProductGallery.Description:
We offer pipe cleaning devices and accessories for all sizes of pipeline. From start to finish – rotating pipe cleaning machines, centralizers, and nozzles.

We have two nozzle ranges that are particularly popular with our customers. The Masterjet pipe cleaning models offer various nozzle and jet configurations with pressures of 400 – 3,200 bar. The Speed Regulated Pipe Cleaner is ideal for vertical and horizontal pipes with multiple elbows.

ProductGallery.Name: Hydrodemolition
ProductGallery.Description:
Our range of ultra high pressure waterjetting units are ideally suited to hydrodemolition applications. This, coupled with our range of hydrodemolition accessories, ensures we can supply you with the complete package. 

Hydrodemolition allows the safe, selective removal of concrete using ultra high pressure water. There are myriad reasons for using our hydrodemolition equipment. For instance, greater operator comfort, no damage to rebar, and no damage to underlying structure (no microcracks).

Address: Minerva Mill Innovation Centre, Station Road, Alcester
Description: For over 40 years, CALGAVIN® has built up unrivalled expertise in the thermal design and analysis of process plants. Our engineering team have extensive knowledge of thermodynamics, heat transfer and fluid flow phenomena, combined with global experience providing improvement solutions to hundreds of plants worldwide. The company was founded on the development and sale of the tube-side heat transfer technology hiTRAN® Thermal Systems.

ProductGallery.Name: hiTRAN Thermal Systems
ProductGallery.Description:
hiTRAN Thermal Systems incorporate a wire matrix element (turbulators), purpose-designed and easily installed to offer the most significant benefit for laminar and transitional flow regimes. 

The tube side heat transfer coefficient can be increased up to 16x, dependent upon Reynolds number and hiTRAN geometry. Applications in both single and two-phase flow are possible, including high and low viscosity fluids. 

For new exchangers installation is completed after fabrication and can easily be retrofitted.

Description: CANNON ARTES S.P.A., a leading global Engineering and Construction Company in the water treatment business, has extensive experience in the Oil & Gas sector, upstream and downstream, with a great attention to sustainability and water recovery. CANNON ARTES’ sustainable solutions include Produced and Injection Water Treatment, Condensate Polishing, Effluent Water Treatment & Reuse. CANNON ARTES is qualified with major global and regional energy players .

ProductGallery.Name: Produced Water Treatment
ProductGallery.Description:
Produced water accounts for the majority of the waste deriving from the production of crude oil and, in order to make oil production sustainable, it must be treated. After a primary process of separation from the oil, water still contains dissolved and emulsionated oil and significant concentration of solids.
Specific produced water treatment packages are based upon the following technologies: De-sanding Hydrocyclones; Deoiling Hydrocyclones; Flotation Units; Walnut Shell Filters; Sand Washing Systems; Degassers; Filters.

ProductGallery.Name: Injection Water
ProductGallery.Description:
Water injection can increase pressure in the reservoir to stimulate oil production, the secondary recovery.
Seawater injection is the most convenient solution generally requiring filtering, deoxygenation and biociding to remove any impurities. To achieve this the following filtration technologies are commonly adopted:  Media filters , Ultrafiltration (UF) , Sulphate removal packages, Deoxygenation, Zerogas® Vacuum Deaerators or Membrane Deaeration (MDA) packages .

ProductGallery.Name: Desalinaton
ProductGallery.Description:
Sea water desalination is implemented when there is limited availability of well and surface water such as 
in desert areas or when the available surface water is of extremely poor quality.  Heart of the desalination process is a Reverse Osmosis unit .
Key issues in the treatment of sea water are filtration and debacterisation of incoming water. Filtration could be performed with membrane technologies (ultrafiltration, microfiltration) or with pressure-type media filters .

ProductGallery.Name: Demineralisation and Condensate Polishing
ProductGallery.Description: Demineralized water finds important applications in the Oil and Gas and Petrochemical sectors where it is used as a process fluid. The removal of all dissolved salts from water is normally carried out in two steps, deionisation and polishing, the first one as the removal of the bulk of ions, the latter focusing on the remaining traces of them. The technologies involved are Ion Exchange, Reverse Osmosis, Electro Deionisation.

ProductGallery.Name: Deaerators
ProductGallery.Description: The thermophysical deaeration process (Cannon Artes’ own proprietary ZEROGAS®technology) is mostly applied in Boiler Feedwater Degassing. The process achieved in the deaerating tower, arranged vertically or horizontally,  atomises the make-up water on a set of special “structured packing” . Vacuum degassing or Membrane DeAeration (MDA) are instead employed when either heating up of water is not allowed or when steam is not available as the degassing media such as in deoxygenation of injection water.

ProductGallery.Name: Effluent Treatment
ProductGallery.Description:
Effluent Treatment Plants in Oil Refineries, Petrochemical, Chemical, Gas Processing Plants include the following steps:
- Pre-treatment 
- Oil Separation by means of API oil-water gravity separators ,  Tilted Plated/Corrugated Plates Interceptors (TPI/CPI) ,  Flotation and Walnut Shell Filters
- Biological Oxidation through Extended Aeration technology, Membrane Bio-Reactors (MBR), Sequencing Batch Reactors, Moving Bed Bio Reactors,
- Tertiary Treatment and Water Re-use with Advanced Oxydation Processes, Microfiltration (MF), Ultrafiltration (UF), Reverse Osmosis (RO).

ProductGallery.Name: Drinking Water Package
ProductGallery.Description:
Package-type drinking-water makers are designed to treat sea, well or surface water removing bacteria, dissolved salts and suspended solids producing high quality water. 
Cannon Artes’ drinking Water makers, installed in containers, are customised according to the Client’s specific conditions: salinity of inlet water, required capacity, level of automation and type of enclosure where the plant is installed. The container provides excellent protection at site, during transportation and can be moved when a camp is dismantled.

ProductGallery.Name: Sanitary Water Treatment
ProductGallery.Description:
Cannon Artes supplies package-type sewage treatment plants based on the Cannon Artes’ proprietary BIOCLAR Process foreseeing recycled activated sludge, oxygenation and final sedimentation. 
The BIOCLAR modular solution is also available with the Membrane Bio-Reactor (MBR) technology combining 
clarification, aeration and filtration where the final gravity clarifier is replaced by the implementation of a membrane filtration unit. 
Cannon Artes offers BIOCLAR Units as prefabricated, self contained, metallic-type modules. 
Capacity ranges from 10 to 10,000 people.

ProductGallery.Name: Cooling Water Filtration
ProductGallery.Description: Filtration of make-up and side-stream water in cooling circuits, operated through cooling towers, is a fundamental step to ensure safe and continuous operations and not waste water.  In “make-up” and “side stream” filtrations, Automatic Valveless Gravity Filters (AVGF) are widely employed and Cannon Artes’ Hydraback® technology is the right response to cooling water filtration issues. Filtration and backwashing are done by gravity and unlike pressure-operated filters no rotating parts nor control equipment are required.

ProductGallery.Name: Water Treatment Systems
ProductGallery.Description:
Refineries and petrochemical plants are among the major users of water for generation of steam and cooling purposes, often using seawater. Artes’ dedicated water treatment solutions include:
WELL WATER TREATMENT
Filtration by means of media filters enhanced by use of chemical agents (In-line Clarification);  or membrane process (Microfiltration, Ultrafiltration), or reverse osmosis technology for desalination.
SURFACE WATER TREATMENT
Water Clarification with coagulation and flocculation, or membrane filtration, or a desalination process through reverse osmosis  technology.

ProductGallery.Name: BESS
ProductGallery.Description: Capstone offers clean, cost-effective modular Lithium-Ion battery energy storage systems (BESS) for a wide range of on or off-grid applications. Our containerized BESS product can be used as energy-storage devices for power harnessed from renewables or the grid, as uninterruptible power supply when grid power is available, or as main power sources when it is not. Paired with Capstone’s foundational microturbine technology, the solution guarantees a continuous reliable energy supply.

Description: Cargostore Containers LLC supply DNV 2.7-1 certified offshore containers for oil & gas, offshore catering, and renewable energy projects. An ICV certified company based in Abu Dhabi, Cargostore Containers is part of the Cargostore Worldwide Group (U.K). The company has depots in Abu Dhabi and Dubai, U.A.E; Dammam, Saudi Arabia; Kuwait, as well as many additional depots globally.

ProductGallery.Name: 20ft DNV Offshore Reefer
ProductGallery.Description: Cargostore’s 20ft Offshore Reefer Container provides energy efficient, portable and secure storage of goods requiring temperature control. All our Reefers are certified to DNV 2.7-1 standards, are suitable for offshore use and come in 10ft and 20ft sizes.

ProductGallery.Name: 4FT DNV Basket
ProductGallery.Description: Cargostore offers a wide variety of DNV offshore baskets that are sized to suit a variety of applications. The design provides efficient cargo storage both during operations and when the rig isn’t in use, being stackable to maximise limited deck space. All units come with slings and shackles with forklift pockets for easy loading and transportation.

ProductGallery.Name: 8ft Offshore Cargo Basket
ProductGallery.Description: The 8ft Offshore Cargo Basket is designed for the secure storage and transportation of cargo for offshore use. Certified to DNV 2.7-1 standards, the 8ft DNV Basket is designed with internal lashing for secure storage, and points to attach tarpaulin.

ProductGallery.Name: 10ft DNV Half Height  Container
ProductGallery.Description: The 10ft DNV Half Height Container is designed for the storage and transportation of offshore equipment. Certified to DNV 2.7-1 standards, this unit is designed with a swing door for easy access as well as internal lashing points, and it can be fitted with a tarpaulin to keep contents secure and dry.

ProductGallery.Name: 10ft DNV Offshore Refrigerated Container
ProductGallery.Description: Cargostore’s DNV 10ft Refrigerated Container (also called a 10ft Reefer) provides energy efficient, portable and secure storage of goods requiring temperature control. Our reefers are certified to the DNV 2.7-1 standard for offshore use. We also supply a 10ft Split Reefer CCU, a 20ft DNV reefer as well as the 20ft Dual Voltage, Twin Room Reefer.

ProductGallery.Name: 20ft DNV Offshore Container
ProductGallery.Description: The 20ft DNV Offshore Container is the standard size for offshore shipping containers. This container enables you to store or transport a wide variety of dry cargo to and from an offshore platform. DNV certified, we can supply this unit worldwide through our global network of depots.

ProductGallery.Name: 20ft DNV Half Height Container
ProductGallery.Description: The 20ft DNV Half Height Container is an excellent general storage container that is typically used for transporting or storing very heavy loads due to the container’s lower center of gravity and strength.

ProductGallery.Name: 20ft DNV Offshore Open Top Container
ProductGallery.Description:
Cargostore’s DNV Open Top Containers are designed to accommodate larger objects that cannot be loaded into a regular sized shipping container.

Open Tops have a removable tarpaulin cover that enables bulky items to be loaded and unloaded from the top. This makes them suitable for items such as lumber and scrap metal that might not easily fit into a container with a solid roof.

Description: Established in 1982, CDI is the foremost leader in pipeline pig detection, signaling, and locating technology.  Always focused on creative design and innovative engineering, their in-house manufacturing produces technologically advanced equipment used in the oil and gas industry as well as water treatment and utility service companies.  UL/CSA, ATEX/IECEX, UKCA certified, CDI has pigging equipment appropriate for any area of the world whether it be onshore, offshore or subsea. ISO 9001:2015  www.pigging.com

Address: AU Gold Tower, Floor 28, Office A | Jumeirah Lake Towers
Description: CECO Environmental (NASDAQ: CECE) is a global diversified energy technology company committed to delivering confidence to its customers. With decades of experience and a deep understanding of engineering and complex specifications, CECO is your ideal partner for innovative problem solving for the challenges of Environmental Air Pollution Control, Energy and Fluid Handling & Filtration.

Address: Office 2401 & 2402, 24th Floor, Reef Towers, Cluster O, Jumeirah Lake Towers
Description: Celeros Flow Technology acts as a full-lifecycle optimization partner for customers who design, install and maintain the world's critical flow systems. We unite the original equipment manufacturer of high-quality pumps, valves, filtration and pipeline access equipment with comprehensive aftersales support. By combining these disciplines, we can act as a single supplier dedicated to maximizing the whole life value of our customers’ flow control assets.

ProductGallery.Name: CUP-BB5HP
ProductGallery.Description:
The ClydeUnion Pumps CUP-BB5HP encompasses heavy duty, radially split diffuser type, multi-stage pumps available in two configurations: inline or back-to-back impeller arrangements. Both of which are designed as engineered-to-order solutions and manufactured to the latest edition of API 610 and API 682.

The full ClydeUnion Pumps CUP-BB5HP range offers proven design history, evolving from our legacy OK and HMBS machines to provide the industry with a very comprehensive hydraulic coverage, and optimum efficiency levels.

ProductGallery.Name: Quick Opening Closure - GD Bandlock™ 2
ProductGallery.Description: GD Engineering is a world leader in the manufacture of quick opening closures. Our GD Bandlock™ 2 is the original and benchmark design for global high pressure applications with over 20,000 units in operation worldwide. GD Bandlock™ 2 Closures provide horizontal or vertical access to any pressure vessel in seconds.

ProductGallery.Name: M&J M-303 Slab Gate Valves
ProductGallery.Description: The M&J Valve Model M-303 is an advanced design slab gate valve for high pressure differential applications in the oil & gas sector. It is designed to simplify installation and upgrades, improve safety and reduce environmental impacts. The M-303 features a floating slab gate that uses the natural force of line pressure to obtain a reliable, dynamically tight downstream seal.

ProductGallery.Name: M&J Danflo-Axial Pilot Operated Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description: Pilot-operated valves use line pressure or electronic/pneumatic signals to feed line fluid into selected ports for the desired control action. Special versions of the valve, using an integral power piston, are available for Electro-hydraulic/Servo control.

ProductGallery.Name: GD Engineering Pig Stop & Bypass Mechanism
ProductGallery.Description: To support the continued development of offshore facilities in the oil and gas industry, GD Engineering has developed a range of Multiple Pig Launching solutions for both Topside and Subsea applications to enable sequential pig launching operations to be performed remotely, without the need to depressurize the launcher.

ProductGallery.Name: High Capacity Filtration
ProductGallery.Description: In response to the growing levels of contamination across a variety of process applications, Celeros Flow Technology has developed a new range of High Capacity (HC) filtration solutions that deliver high contaminant retention efficiency with minimal impact on process parameters. Customers can select from a total system solution to match specific application needs, or opt to upgrade their existing filter arrangement with a HC filter cartridge from our standard range.

Description: The company was formed in Halifax, West Yorkshire, UK in 1945 to manufacture air tools for use by Aircraft Industry and Motor Trade. In 1954 the company designed and patented the twin piston air reciprocating saw. The result of this was the production of lightweight, low air consumption, reliable saws and continuous improvement has endorsed their reputation for being the best in their class in the world to date.

Specialist Stainless Steel & Nickel Alloy round and Profiled wire manufacturers. The manufacturer of the Original SUPA 75 SLICKLINE. Manufacturing locations in the UK / USA / Canada. Slickline stock facility in Jebel Ali. Group products include Slickline / Knitted Mesh / Welding Wire / Rope / Strand / Profiled Wire / Fine Wire / Pulleys.

CENTRAVIS is the one of the world largest companies producing and selling seamless stainless tubes and pipes. The Company’s production facilities are located in Nikopol, Ukraine. The Company’s products are used in nuclear and thermal power, chemical and petrochemical industries, mechanical engineering and oil and gas industry. The Company’s product portfolio includes over 1000 standard sizes of pipes and tubes from more than 100 types of corrosion-resistant and heat-resistant steel grades in 8  segments.

Centro Servizi Metalli S.p.A. deals with distribution and water jet, plasma, laser  and mechanical cutting stainless steel quarto plates.
CSM Group is active in Italy (Reggio Emilia HQ) and Europe in Poland,France, Germany,Benelux.
CSM has in stock AISI 304L, 316L, 316Ti,321H, 347,904L, duplex, super duplex and nickel alloys (with M.T.C)

CSM uses an I.Q.M.S, certified by TUV - SUD.
In 2013 Industeel Belgium-ArcelorMittal Group entered in the capital of CSM.

ProductGallery.Name: PLASMA CUTTING
ProductGallery.Description: The material is cut by melting the edge of the item. A jet of gas at ultra high temperature is used to melt it, producing a 3/4 mm cut. This technology guarantees a clean, high-quality cut with little tapering. Cutting can be done completely submerged under water, semi-submerged or in air. High-definition cutting available (8 ÷ 80). Maximum size: 3000 x 8000 mm. / 2500 x 12000 mm.Maximum thickness: 150 mm. Type of cut: all shapes. Numerical Control Machines

ProductGallery.Name: SAW CUTTING
ProductGallery.Description: The material is cut by sawing the sheet metal with a toothed blade. This technology guarantees a perfectly perpendicular cut and a high finish; it also minimizes any changes in the mechanical specifications of the material. Particularly suitable for the supply of plates in bespoke sizes.Maximum size: 2500 x 8000 mm. / 2500 x 6000 mm.Maximum thickness: 200 mm. Type of cut: vertical and horizontal. Numerical Control Machines.

ProductGallery.Name: LASER CUTTING
ProductGallery.Description:
The cutting process takes place through a laser head with a 12 KW generator. This technology guarantees a perfect vertical cut with fine finishing.
Maximum size: 3000x6000 mmMaximum thickness: 20 mm. Type of cut: all shapes

ProductGallery.Name: WATERJET CUTTING
ProductGallery.Description: The  material  is  cut  using  a  high-pressure  jet  of  a  mixture  of  water  and  abrasive  material. Thanks to this cold cut process the chemical and physical characteristics of the material do not undergo any alterations, so a top-quality cut is achieved. Maximum useful cut size: 3000 x 8000 mm. Maximum thickness: 150 mm. Type of cut: all shapes.

PressReleases.Name: CENTRO SERVIZI METALLI SPA
PressReleases.Description:
Centro Servizi Metalli S.p.A. deals with distribution and water jet, plasma, laser  and mechanical cutting stainless steel quarto plates.

Description: CGG is a global technology and HPC leader that provides data, products, services and solutions in Earth science, data science, sensing and monitoring. Our unique portfolio supports our clients in efficiently and responsibly solving complex digital, energy transition, natural resource, environmental, and infrastructure challenges for a more sustainable future.

We are very pleased to have this opportunity to introduce our company to you.

We are specialized in manufacturing UV/IR & IR3 Flame detectors certified with FM, EN:54-10, ATEX, IECEx, CCC and so forth. 
We can supply various kind of quality product with competitive price and timely delivery.
If you are interested, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time. We will provide product catalog & further information upon your request.

Address: Chelsea Technologies Ltd,  55 Central Avenue, West Molesey
Description: Chelsea Technologies design and manufacture best-in-class environmental monitoring technology to make the world safer, cleaner and smarter. For over 50 years, our fluorometers, sensors & systems have been used around the world to help our customers understand the natural environment, improve water treatment processes,  monitor for pollution and contaminants in all water environments, comply with ballast water and exhaust gas wash water monitoring regulations, and even support oceanographic research.

ProductGallery.Name: UviLux
ProductGallery.Description:
UviLux sensors enable real-time, in situ detection of a wide variety of UV fluorescence parameters including, oil in water, Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons (PAH) and the BTEX group of contaminants (benzene, ethylbenzene, toluene and xylene).

The compact and highly sensitive fluorometers have excellent turbidity rejection and high ambient light rejection, making them suitable for deployment in groundwater monitoring, as well as natural waters to depths of up to 1000m.

ProductGallery.Name: UniLux DYE
ProductGallery.Description: UniLux DYE is a low cost, miniature fluorometer for monitoring common tracer dyes. The highly sensitive sensors indicate small changes in rhodamine and fluorescein at very low concentrations. Robust ambient light and turbidity rejection ensure suitability in a wide variety of water environments.

Description: CSL is producer of high quality calibration gas standards, Gas handling equipment& Gas monitoring systems for various applications and hence serving to Oil & Gas, Power, Steel & Cement, Marine, Gas Detection, Gas Analysis, post harvest for fruits etc industries. We are also, exporting to 40+ countries through our distributors & agents in 12 countries. Our lab is equipped with 10 nos of GCs & 5 nos of Gas Analyzers to cater all kind analysis.

ProductGallery.Name: CALIBRATION GAS STANDARDS IN CYLINDERS
ProductGallery.Description: Various Calibration Gas Standards filled in refillable cylinders as per requirement, to calibrate your Gas Chromatography and Gas analyzers.

Description: Being the full member of International Association of Classification Society, CCS provides world-leading technical codes and standards and offers classification survey services for ships, offshore installations and related industrial products. The class society also provides statutory survey, verification surveys, notarial surveys, certification and accreditation and other services in accordance with international conventions, regulations and related rules of the authorizing flag states or regions.

Address: Office 29, Floor 29 -Corniche Road, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates
Office No: 2101, JLT Cluster G, Building JBC1, DMCC, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

Description: Chromatotec Group is specialized in designing, manufacturing and selling online chromatographs for gas and liquid, exclusively made in France. With offices in China and USA, the group is historically based in Bordeaux area (South West of France) since its creation in 1986. Chromatotec Group is worldwide recognized for its leading-edge technology. Based on chromatography principle, our analyzers are focused on VOC/Sulfurs/Odor Monitoring. We produce also generators for chromatography and online calibration.

ProductGallery.Name: Monitoring and analysis of contaminants in liquids
ProductGallery.Description:
The airmoVOC WMS is a unique and efficient product for monitoring and analysis in liquids. This Mcerts certified solution measures and analyzes VOCs and BTEX (Benzene, Toluene, Ethylbenzene and Xylene) dissolved in liquid matrices. 

Chromatotec® presents a headspace sampling system (following US EPA method 502-2) designed to extract representative samples from a liquid phase. The vaporized sample can be preconcentrated using a trap in order to achieve very low concentrations (ppb and / or ppm).

ProductGallery.Name: Online analysis and monitoring of sulfur compounds in natural gas and gaseous fuels
ProductGallery.Description:
The energyMEDOR® is an autoGC-ED (MEDOR® Electrochemical wet
cell Detector) for the analysis and monitoring of sulfur compounds in
natural gas and gaseous fuels: H2S, Mercaptans, Sulfides.
Two versions exist:
• The energyMEDOR® ppm (which measures at ppm levels)
• The energyMEDOR® ppb (which measures at ppb levels)

ProductGallery.Name: Online analysis and monitoring of odorous compounds Sulfur & VOC monitoring
ProductGallery.Description:
The vigi e-nose is the first analyzer able to track VOC & Sulfurs at ppb/
ppt levels. It is more sensitive than human nose. It is composed by one
autoGC-ED (MEDOR® Electrochemical wet cell Detector) and PID for
VOCs. Zero air generator included in the same box for autonomous
operation.

PressReleases.Name: Turnkey Global Analytical Solutions for Gas and Liquid Analysis: A New Challenge for Instrumentation in the Energy Market
PressReleases.Description: In the previous years the Oil and Gas industry has experienced important evolutions that have changed the needs in terms of analysis and control. Reinforcement in regulations, policies and compliance has led the industry to ask for more tailored applications dedicated to specific-compounds monitoring. Standard instruments are not fitted to answer all these new challenges and the instrumentation market has to be able to propose customized advanced solutions dedicated to unique analysis context.

PressReleases.Name: Analysis of trace-level impurities in hydrogen
PressReleases.Description: To achieve sustainable development goals related to climate change and to improve air quality, the reduction of carbon emissions due to transport and mobility are fundamental. Transport is currently responsible for over a quarter of greenhouse gas emissions in developed countries and is worldwide the primary source of urban air pollution. The deployment of hydrogen as a sustainable fuel has the potential to substantially reduce emissions of greenhouse gases and harmful air pollutants.

PressReleases.Name: Continuous monitoring of natural gas and permanent gases
PressReleases.Description: Permanent gas analysis covers a wide range of applications in the petrochemical, chemical, and energy industry fields. For example, permanent gases such as O2, CO2, N2, Ar, CH4 or ethane are common in pure gas manufacturing, refinery gases, natural gas, fuel cell gases, and many other industrial processes. Automatic identification and quantification of the concentration of these components can be important for the control of manufacturing processes and production quality.

PressReleases.Name: Moisture Monitoring in Gaseous Matrices
PressReleases.Description: In 2020, Chromatotec® introduced into its lineup, the DET H2O Electrolytic Moisture Monitor Hygrometer; available in process or portable versions. These hygrometers, with pressure reducers allow moisture measurement by electrolyzing residual amounts of water (between 0 and 1500 ppmV) contained in gaseous matrices.

PressReleases.Name: Turnkey solutions for biogas quality control
PressReleases.Description:
Chromatotec® proposes an autonomous, robust and reliable
solution aimed at biogas quality control produced in continuous.
This solution is based on a reference technology, gas chromatography
with TCD detector (GC TCD), allowing to obtain precise results
without interferences. It integrates a hydrogen generator which
provide the carrier gas that the GC-TCD needs, making the
instrument completely autonomous since it does not need electricity
to operate.

Description: CHW Forge is manufacturer of standard and non standard flanges,customized complex forgings. Our product find application in Oil & Gas, Power, Heavy Engineering, pressure vessel and Heat Exchangers. We can manufacture ring diameter up to 4500 mm, & 650 mm height. We have capability to produce single forging of 25 Tons is all kind of material like Carbon Steel, Alloy Steel, Duplex, Aluminium, Titanium and Nickel Alloys.

PressReleases.Name: CHW Forge is now API Monogram Certified Company
PressReleases.Description: HW FORGE is one of the India’s leading Forging Company having an experience of more than six decades in manufacturing high quality of complex and critical forgings. We are pleased to announce that CHW Forge is now an API Monogram Certified Organisation, licensed to apply API 6A, API 20B & API 20C monogram for the forgings and products intended to use for Well Head & Christmas Tree equipment and other Petroleum and Natural Gas applications.

Description: Aereon reaches companies all throughout the continent, and as a Cimarron company, our work can be found in more than 45 countries around the world, ranging from offshore to desert service, through Aereon, Jordan Technologies, Flare Industries, Hy-Bon and Cimarron. Many industries around the world have benefited from Aereon and our commitment to reduce air pollutant emissions.

ProductGallery.Name: Air-Flare System
ProductGallery.Description: Air flare systems are composed of two concentric risers and one or more blowers providing supplemental combustion air. A blower forces air into an outer air annulus where the process gas passes through an inner riser and upon reaching the flare tip, these two streams intermix. This air assist has three principle effects:  High-pressure airflow causes turbulence in the waste stream which improves mixing and therefore enhances combustion efficiency.  Additional air is induced

ProductGallery.Name: Thermal Oxidizer
ProductGallery.Description: AEREON Thermal Oxidizers with a destruction efficiency of 99.9% offer safe, reliable combustion for a wide variety of gas processing applications. This compares to other industry used equipment such as fl ares and enclosed combustors with efficiencies of 98% and 99.5% respectively. This seemingly small improvement results in half the VOC (Volatile Organic Compounds) emissions from thermal oxidizers over enclosed combustors and a twentyfold reduction in VOC emissions compared to open flaring.

Address: Clarke Valve, 42 Whitecap Drive, North Kingstown, Rhode Island, 02852, United States
Description: Clarke Valve is the exclusive manufacturer of the Dilating Disk™ Valve, a next generation control valve. This advanced technology quarter-turn valve is characterized by its three interlocking petals that control the flow of process fluid. Unique patented stem-seal technology reduces fugitive emissions by 98% and records a methane leakage rate of only 2 parts-per-million (PPM). Lighter weight, less downtime, smaller footprint. ProductGallery.Description: CLEANBLAST™ offers Nederman brand vaccum blaster. ProductGallery.Name: Internal pipe blasting&coating
ProductGallery.Description: The Tublast internal pipe blaster has a exchangeable tungsten carbide deflection tip with spreads the abrasive at 360º. An internal nozzle of 13 or 16mm can be selected. It’s delivered with various centring collars for small pipe diameters and a centring carriage for blasting larger diameters pipes. This carriage can easily be set to fit different pipes. The Tublast has a standard blast hose coupling connection and can efficiently blast pipes with internal diameters of 70 to 295mm.

ProductGallery.Description: The conventional method of recovering spent abrasive is both labor intensive and time consuming. Through many years of experience in using, designing and building vacuum systems, CLEANBLAST has specially developed the vacuum-recovery system suitable for blasting operations. The system is engineered for minimum installation, easy operation, simple maintenance and increased productivity with superior overall performance.

Description: Cokebusters is an energy services business specialising in the mechanical cleaning, inspection and integrity assessment of piping systems and pipelines. Founded in 2005 and operating from Chester (UK) and Houston (USA), the company's ethos starts with innovation. Its niche is the decoking of refinery fired heater tubes and subsequent inspection, using in-house technology. Uniquely this is offered as a ‘combined service’, facilitated by patented cleaning and single bodied intelligent pigs delivered using bespoke pumping units.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters 'Mechanical Cleaning' Service
ProductGallery.Description: With some 20 years of world wide experience, Cokebusters has developed, deployed and refined an integrated solution to comprehensively clean process tube and piping systems. Our service led solution involves connecting our Double Pumping Unit to the process and progressively scraping away the layers of coke/scale with incrementally sized mechanical pigs.  The pigs are propelled in water enabling the debris to be entrained in water for subsequent filtration and disposal.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters Mechanical Scraper Pig
ProductGallery.Description:
The mechanical scraper pigs are built in house to a patented design.  There are some 50 different incremental pig sizes, ranging from 1”-12” diameter.  We can manufacturer ‘off spec’ to suit particular requirements.

The ability to design and build in house allows Cokebusters to be in control of its own supply chain.  It also means we can respond quickly to customisation requests.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters Series 21 Double Pumping Unit
ProductGallery.Description:
Commonly referred to as a DPU - a purpose built trailer, or containerised unit, which contains all the equipment and functionality to connect and deploy mechanical ‘scraper’ pigs.  The unit has four basic elements:

•	manned control room
•	water handling tanks
•	double pumping engines
•	all connection equipment and tooling

All our pumping units are designed, built and maintained in house.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters Bespoke Test Loop
ProductGallery.Description: Purpose built test loops at our premises in Chester (UK) and Houston (TX, USA) enable operators to be process trained and new technologies to be evaluated before attending site.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters Skilled Operators
ProductGallery.Description: Our experienced site operators are committed to consistently delivering a high quality and reliable service. Graded by examination and experience, Cokebusters operators are experts in delivering the most efficient service, maintaining our bespoke equipment where required and providing performance feedback to our technology team at home. This close collaboration and expertise means Cokebusters is able to minimise downtime for its clients on site and deliver the most comprehensive integrity status.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters In-House Manufacturing
ProductGallery.Description:
Cokebusters designs and builds its own specialist equipment.  We continuously innovate and improve the tools we use to service our clients’ needs.

By internalising the manufacturing of our equipment we reduce supply chain dependency, affording more flexibility and agency over our production process. Our teams of designers, fitters and site operators work together to ensure our equipment is the best it can be.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters 3rd Generation Intelligent Pig Collection
ProductGallery.Description:
The challenge of internally inspecting so called "unpiggable" piping/pipelines is familiar to many operators. 

The Cokebusters intelligent pig is, uniquely, a single bodied, untethered, bi-direction device.

Initially conceived as a tooling to credibly verify the performance of mechanical cleaning technologies, a 20 year development pathway has led to the latest patented inspection devices which can rapidly scan internal and external pipe surfaces across a diameter range of 2.5”-12” ID.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters 3rd Generation Intelligent Pig
ProductGallery.Description:
The Cokebusters‘ intelligent pig is suited not only to the complex serpentine coil networks found within heaters and steam generators, but also to process piping systems and pipelines.

Ultrasonic in nature, the intelligent pig is propelled by liquid flow, provided by Cokebusters’ pumping units or within the control of the facility product flow.

Using our bespoke Roxtail™ software, results are provided numerically, graphically and by 3D user interface.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters 4th Generation Intelligent Pig
ProductGallery.Description: A result of 20 years of research and development into inspection technology, our bespoke 4th Generation device can operate down to 1.5” ID and is believed to be the smallest intelligent pig worldwide.

ProductGallery.Name: Cokebusters 'Piping Inspection' and 'Containment Integrity' Service
ProductGallery.Description:
As it navigates, the Cokebusters’ intelligent pig collects a vast cargo of inspection data, configured according to the parameters of the inspection campaign. 

Using our bespoke Roxtail™ software, the resultant data is cleaned, ordered and reported in tabular and graphical formats. The integrity report includes Level 1 and 2 fitness for service and remaining life assessments carried out in accordance with API 579 / ASME FFS-1 standards. Deeper Level 3 assessments can also be undertaken.

ProductGallery.Name: CURISTEC Well Cementing Simulation
ProductGallery.Description: CurisIntegrity modeling platform provides a complete cementing integrity engineering platform. ProductGallery.Name: CURISTEC Data Management

ProductGallery.Name: CURISTEC Consulting
