With the solid experience gained in over 60 years of activity, DAFRAM - a made in Italy BALL VALVES manufacturer, is one of the most reliable companies in its sector. Thanks to high-tech products aquired important references for special applications, such as transport, storage and processes with hydrogen, CO2 Capture, cryogenic, high temperature, high pressure and subsea to meet the most stringent requests of end users.

ProductGallery.Name: DAFRAM trunnion mounted ball valves
ProductGallery.Description:
DAFRAM trunnion mounted ball valves are built as standard in accordance with the design requirements of API 6D and, upon request, B16.34; both in two and three piece bolted construction.
Independent floating spring loaded seat rings are always in contact with the ball to provide an effective tight seal at low and high differential pressures.
The whole range may be supplied with two basic seating design criteria: self relieving and double piston effect seats.

ProductGallery.Name: Multiport Selector Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Multiport Selector Valves (MSVs) can play a key role to optimize engineering and management of production facilities, as well as testing of oil and gas wells. Employing an MSV in place of many actuated valves can lead to several advantages, such as fewer automation systems, smaller, lighter and more reliable skids, overall lower costs. Special design features allow to improve tightness performances and reliability, customized solutions are possible for both onshore and offshore applications.

ProductGallery.Name: DAFRAM twin ball Double Block and Bleed valves
ProductGallery.Description: Double Block and Bleed valves ensure double isolation function thanks to two obturators inserted in a single body and they provide the bleed function by means of a bleed/vent system located between. From the trunnion mounted and floating ball valve design, DAFRAM derived a series of DBB valves with several different constructions and features to meet Customer requirements. DAFRAM DBB solutions lead to several advantages: weight and cost saving, reduced leak paths, increased reliability.

ProductGallery.Name: DAFRAM actuated valves for ESDV, IPF and HIPPS
ProductGallery.Description: DAFRAM supply actuated valves being qualified as VAC centre since years. Actuator sizing and design are developed for ESD, BDV, IPF and HIPPS service. Valve-actuator assembly is assembled and tested according to the most stringent requirements by Dafram experienced personnel. Latest delivered projects are Zohr (ESDVs), Yibal Khuff (IPF) and Al Dabb'iya (HIPPS).

ProductGallery.Name: DAFRAM electric actuated valves MOV
ProductGallery.Description: DAFRAM valves can be supplied together with electric actuators. Actuator sizing and assembly design is performed by DAFRAM in order to meet the most stringent requirements. Valve-actuator assembly is assembled and tested by DAFRAM skilled personnel. Latest delivered projects are Zohr (Egypt) and Bahr Essalam Ph.2 (Lybia).

ProductGallery.Name: DAFRAM flow control ball valves
ProductGallery.Description: The control valves range consists of top quality trunnion mounted ball valves for high performance with special configurations, ensuring excellent flow characteristic and accurate, reliable control in a wide range of applications.Ball valves are able to control fluid flow at very small openings, to open at high differential pressure and to maintain low fluid velocity (and thus low noise and vibration). In addition, control ball valves allow tight and fast shut-off in case of emergency.

ProductGallery.Name: DAFRAM subsea ball valves
ProductGallery.Description:
DAFRAM provides all subsea valves designed and manufactured in-house. The modern and comprehensive production facilities allow DAFRAM to machine, weld, conduct non destructive examination processes and apply a wide range of protective paint systems, all under one roof.
DAFRAM subsea ball valves are built as standard in accordance with the design requirements of API 6A/17D, API 6DSS and, upon request, B16.34. The body can be in two and three piece bolted or welded construction.

ProductGallery.Name: DAFRAM Remote Valve Diagnosis
ProductGallery.Description: Remote Valve Diagnosis (RVD) is a new proprietary system that monitors, acquires, registers and transmits critical valve performance information back to the maintenance personnel. The purpose of RVD is to provide real time condition information from a valve within any location, providing an alarm in the case of malfunction. RVD system can provide information about the tightness of a trunnion ball valve or a multiport selector valve, by means of a patent pending algorithm.

ProductGallery.Name: Ex Floodlight
ProductGallery.Description:
Ex Floodlight is LED light with a high level of protection intended for use in places with explosive gas and dust atmosphere. The lamp is designed for use in the marine, shipbuilding, ship repair, and offshore industries, both for indoor and outdoor spaces. The light has RFID TAG for easier maintenance and inspection and gorilla glass as unique features on the market.
Applicable in Hazardous zones 1, 2, 21, 22

ProductGallery.Name: Ex GalaLED
ProductGallery.Description:
Ex GalaLED is a portable, low voltage LED lighting with high level of protection intended for use in places with an explosive gas and dust atmosphere.
The Explosion-proof GalaLED is a state-of-the-art product with many outstanding features. The lamp operates on 230VAC and on safety, low voltage of 42 VAC which is in compliance with the highest safety standards (CENELEC norm HD63751). This Explosion-proof light weighs only 2,3kg, has luminous flux up to 2500 lumen, and a high level of protection.

ProductGallery.Name: Marine LED Floodlight
ProductGallery.Description:
The Marine LED Floodlight is a model of drydock lighting specially developed and designed to meet the highest requirements for safety, endurance and quality of work light. 
The Marine LED Floodlight has no breakable glass components, it is resistant to dust and high pressure jets and has mechanical protections IP 66 and IK 10. Additionally, the reflector is equipped with a replaceable, transparent protective foil that further protects the lamp from external influences.

ProductGallery.Name: GalaLED portable low voltage LED light
ProductGallery.Description:
GalaLED is a revolutionary model of portable, temporary work lighting intended for use in the marine industry - shipbuilding, ship repair and maintenance, offshore, oil and gas and construction industries.
Due to its low, safe operating voltages - 24VAC, 42VAC, 110VAC/VDC and 24 VDC all GalaLED lighting models can reliably and safely be used during various technological phases and work processes - steelwork, sandblasting, high-pressure wash and anti-corrosion protection.

ProductGallery.Name: SEAL emergency LED light
ProductGallery.Description:
DL-SEAL is a linear lamp developed and designed to illuminate access areas to docks, stairways, passageways and other humid working areas.
It is made out of high quality non-corrosive materials - PMMA, ABS, polycarbonate and stainless steel and it meets the IP67 and IK10 protection requirements. ProductGallery.Description:
The NaviSuite Kuda software is dedicated to USV- and vessel-based hydrographic surveys, offering you all the necessary tools to carry out cost- and time-efficient bathymetric survey operations. 

With a variety of variants of this software bundle available, you can pick the one best tailored to your needs and budget. The software provides high-performing features focusing on simplicity, automation and autonomy, while also enabling you to carry out remote operations.

ProductGallery.Name: NaviSuite Kuda Pro + Processing
ProductGallery.Description:
The NaviSuite Kuda software is dedicated to USV- and vessel-based hydrographic surveys, offering you all the necessary tools to carry out cost- and time-efficient bathymetric operations. 

The software provides high-performing features focusing on simplicity, automation and autonomy, while also enabling you to carry out remote operations. With this variant of NaviSuite Kuda, you can plan, acquire, process and deliver your data all in one software suite!

ProductGallery.Name: NaviSuite Mobula Pro + Processing
ProductGallery.Description:
NaviSuite Mobula is a plug-and-play ROV control and inspection software, allowing operators to plan and perform inspections efficiently – and enabling automation. The software provides high-performing features focusing on automated steering and inspection, as well as delivering advanced, high-quality data visualisations. 

VideoRay Defender and Blue Robotics BlueROV2 models are supported, along with any ROV platform if you let EIVA do a bit of coding. Pick the software variant best tailored to your needs and budget.

ProductGallery.Name: NaviSuite Perio – Software
ProductGallery.Description:
NaviSuite Perio allows you to accurately deploy multiple virtual buoys (up to 250 via a single transmitter) for AIS navigation aids at a fraction of the cost of physical buoys. 

NaviSuite Perio offers a unique approach to navigational aiding, by enabling you to deploy a high number of any buoy type as virtual buoys so they appear correctly on AIS displays on nearby vessels.

ProductGallery.Name: NaviSuite Beka
ProductGallery.Description:
NaviSuite Beka is our software bundle for everything that has to do with operations involving catenaries, that is, operations involving anchors, cables, flexpipes, risers, etc. 

It combines anchor handling and catenary data acquisition, ROV inspection and reporting in a single tool that covers both operation planning and execution. This simplifies the work process and reduces the risk of calculation errors that comes with using multiple software tools.

ProductGallery.Name: NaviSuite Nardoa
ProductGallery.Description:
Advanced 3D pipeline & cable route inspection software. 

NaviSuite Nardoa is a cutting-edge, completely integrated 3D software solution for the acquisition and processing of data during subsea pipeline and cable route inspections.

This proven, off-the-shelf software bundle allows you to save man-hours and money while delivering high-quality, thorough and comprehensive inspection results to your customers. Furthermore, it can be upgraded with our NaviSuite Deep Learning option for high-performance automated eventing.

ProductGallery.Name: ScanFish Katria incl magnetometers

ProductGallery.Name: ScanFish XL
ProductGallery.Description:

Designed to host a payload of up to 400 kg, ScanFish XL offers freedom from sensor and instrumentation limitations of a typical ROTV, enabling comprehensive multi-instrument data collection with every runline. 

By design, ScanFish XL is capable of what we refer to as 3D steering – meaning that it is able to navigate both vertically and horizontally.

“Stratum Reservoir is an industry leader in rock, fluid, and stable isotope analysis for the energy, mining, and agricultural industries. Our network of laboratories around the world, produces high precision analytical data that our global team of subject matter experts use to deliver scientific insights that enable our customers to gain a thorough understanding of their resources.

We work collaboratively and think holistically, leveraging technology to assist our clients devise strategic plans to identify high potential assets, best utilize their current investments and plan for sustainable resource management. For over two decades we have devised distinct, highly granular analyses and offered essential interpretations to guide our clients in assessing resource potential, gaining insight into the fundamental elements and physics governing an asset’s economic viability, and formulating ongoing resource management programs.”

ProductGallery.Name: PVT Services
ProductGallery.Description:
Our PVT services include:
•	PVT studies on:
a)	Gas condensate
b)	Volatile oil
c)	Black oil
d)	Heavy oil
•	H2S Capabilities
•	Chromatography for liquid and gas analysis
•	Scaling potential
•	Water sampling
•	Inhibitor evaluation
•	Flow assurance
•	Surface/downhole Sampling and sample transfer services
•	EOR testing
•	EOS modeling
•	Live fluid preparation
•	Integrated PVT and geochemical analysis
•	Sample storage

ProductGallery.Name: CCUS
ProductGallery.Description: We are your key to a Net-Zero Solution:  Reducing emissions is critical to mitigating environmental damage, and our CCUS Solutions offer an effective option for energy producers and other large-scale industries

ProductGallery.Name: Geochemistry Services
ProductGallery.Description: Stratum Reservoir offers complete analytical services in the field of geochemistry. These services include the analyses and interpretation of detailed source rock evaluation (pyrolysis, TOC, and maturity assessments). Additional services include bulk properties, high-resolution gas chromatography, biomarker analysis by gas chromatography mass spectrometry (GCMS), and compound specific stable isotope analysis for oils, extracts and gases. Analytical results can be applied in many ways ranging from simple assessment of oil and gas quality to basin-wide characterization, assessment of reservoir compartmentalization and production allocation.

ProductGallery.Name: GEOLOGIC SERVICES
ProductGallery.Description:
Petrographic evaluations provide direct measurement of total mineralogy (whole rock and clay types), texture, and pore types. This data is essential to establishing depositional environment, diagenetic history, and identifying low-resistivity pay zones and other anomalous log responses. When appraising hydrocarbon reservoirs, rock and fluid samples represent the ground truth.

Our services include:
•	X-ray diffraction (XRD)
•	X-ray fluorescence (XRF)
•	Chemostratigraphy
•	Thin section preparation
•	Thin section petrography
•	Biostratigraphy
•	Scanning electron microscopy (SEM)
•	Sedimentology
•	Integrated studies
•	Core and fracture description
We also offer interpretive and advisory services for deeper insight and understanding.

ProductGallery.Name: ROUTINE CORE ANALYSIS
ProductGallery.Description:
Rock and fluid samples provide a direct link to your reservoir or source rock. With decades of skill and expertise spread across the globe, our laboratory services play a pivotal role in reservoir completion strategies. With production success increasingly dependent on what is known about a reservoir, laboratory analyses help quantify the unknown and reduce risk. The result is  better wells with improved recovery and overall economics. We offer a complete suite of Routine Core Analysis services including:
•	Core gamma
•	Photography
•	CT scanning
•	Fluid saturation determination

ProductGallery.Name: Core Imaging
ProductGallery.Description:
Our diverse core imaging capabilities allow the understanding of the rock fabric from the visual to the microscopic scale. Beyond data, we provide upscaling and interpretation for better reservoir characterization.
Many of these datasets can be viewed through our proprietary software, RockView. This complimentary software allows you to visualize, interrogate and understand image datasets. As an example, you can slice, dice, color and understand your whole core CT data in a brand new way.

ProductGallery.Name: Parker Vent Master
ProductGallery.Description:
The primary function of the Parker Vent Master™ is to isolate the
analyzer from fluctuating outlet pressures by controlling the pressure
of the collection header (commonly referred to as the Vent Header)
and pumping the effluent sample gases into the fluctuating return
system.

ProductGallery.Name: Parker R-Max Stream Switching System
ProductGallery.Description: The Parker Gen II R-max™ is a multi-functional system capable of integrating both stream switching and filtering into one unique compact assembly. The system is designed to control both gases and liquids in analytical systems ranging from vacuum to 500 psig (34 bar) while requiring only 65 psig (5 bar) actuating air pressure. The system was engineered with a focus on improved product reliability and reduced cost of ownership.

ProductGallery.Name: Parker Intraflow
ProductGallery.Description: Parker’s IntraFlow™ modular system has been developed specifically for analytical, lab and other complex general purpose instrumentation flow control systems. ISA/ANSI SP76.00.02 compliant, Parker IntraFlow™ fittings and valves provide maximum flexibility with minimal space requirements. One of the unique features is that all flow paths, regardless of direction, are maintained on a single plane within the system as there are no lower level manifold blocks required.

ProductGallery.Name: Norgren FRL
ProductGallery.Description: Correct compressed air preparation means using a filter regulator lubricator (FRL) in the correct order. Combination FRL assemblies or maintenance units allow your choice of units to be assembled. Norgren box sets are the ideal assembly - a filter/regulator, lubricator, shut-off valve, gauge and mounting brackets fully assembled

ProductGallery.Name: IMI Herion Solenoid valves
ProductGallery.Description: Herion specialise in NAMUR Solenoid Valves, Remote mounted Solenoid Valves, Pilot operated spool valves and Direct & Indirect solenoid actuated poppet valves. Herion valves can be electrically or pneumatically operated and are used to pilot larger actuators or cylinders. The valves can handle both clean and contaminated fluids and body and seal materials can be selected to suit the application. Herion solenoid valves are available with a wide range of different certifications and approvals and can be used in aggressive or ATEX environments. Herion NAMUR solenoid valves can be easily fitted to actuators or valves having the standard interface.

ProductGallery.Name: IMI Maxseal Solenoid valves
ProductGallery.Description: Maxseal valves perform exceptionally well in harsh environments all over the globe and are often associated with offshore oil & gas applications, but are also used onshore, particularly in coastal environments where a fully stainless steel construction is advantageous. Maxseal products have global certifications, and due to their exceptional reliability are often found on Safety Instrumented Systems. Our products are in operation in both upstream and downstream solutions.

ProductGallery.Name: Ruelco -Pressure Pilots
ProductGallery.Description: The Ruelco pressure pilot is the most versatile, robust and easy to adjust pressure pilots available. With a maximum over pressure up to 10,000 PSI at any set point or range, the standard Ruelco Pressure pilot can be put into almost any pressure environment with 100% function reliability. The easy to change ranges add to the versatility of the product.

ProductGallery.Name: Bartec Medium Voltage Switchgear Devices for Zone 1
ProductGallery.Description: BARTEC medium voltage feeding solutions combine knowledge in industrial medium voltage solutions with the high level of expertise needed to ensure safe protection for hazardous areas in Zone 1. The BARTEC Zone 1 transformer solutions guarantee a failure-free operation as well as high availability and reliability due to the absence of rotating elements. The systems are natural air cooled which pre-empts the problem of environmental hazards due to oil loss.

ProductGallery.Name: Ruelco -Level Switches
ProductGallery.Description: The Ruelco Level Switch is a 2-way valve which will supply a control signal when a predetermined liquid level is reached inside of a tank or pressure vessel. The Ruelco Level Switch is a pneumatic or electric liquid level switch, which can act as a normally open or normally closed 2-way valve. The patented Level Switch will provide a fast system response when the liquid in the tank or pressure vessel reaches the predetermined level.

Description: One-stop Shop for Flare Gas Utilization although many companies and governments committed to Zero Routine Flaring by 2030, $30 billion worth of gas is wasted and 700 million t CO2e is emitted every year globally in the oil and gas industry. F2V built an integrated flare gas utilization business model, that offers a readily scalable solution and drives multiple benefits to governments, local communities, oil and gas companies, investors and and GHG emission credit traders.

PressReleases.Name: F2V, Occidental Oman Sign Agreement for Flare Gas Recovery at Mukhaizna Field
PressReleases.Description: Flare2Value (F2V), an energy solutions company in flare abatement; and Occidental Oman (Oxy Oman), the Sultanate’s largest independent oil producer, are pleased to announce the signing of an agreement, where F2V will construct and operate flare gas recovery facilities. The project will reduce emissions and create economic value from captured associated gas. With the project, F2V demonstrates a novel business model that delivers flare gas utilization solutions.

PressReleases.Name: A new model for flaring in Oman
PressReleases.Description: On a new business model: “It is our view that for the large number of small/medium-sized flares, we need a different business model. Flare abatement ought to be farmed out to specialised companies that develop projects and own and operate associated gas monetisation plants. Second, we ought to keep solutions simple and replicable. We cannot have a bespoke solution for every flare, or every site. We have too many to deal with.”

PressReleases.Name: F2V Joins the Aiming for Zero Methane Emissions Initiative
PressReleases.Description: The F2V team is excited and honoured that our company has been elected as a supporting member of the Aiming for Zero Methane Emissions Initiative, set up by OGCI. I am delighted to share OGCI chair, Bob Dudley message : “We welcome F2V to the Aiming for Zero Methane Emissions Initiative. Recognizing that eliminating methane emissions from the oil and gas industry represents one of the best short-term ways of addressing climate change"..

PressReleases.Name: OGCI Climate Investments invests in F2V flare gas capture project
PressReleases.Description: London, March 1st, 2022 – OGCI Climate Investments (OGCI CI), a specialist decarbonization investor, today invested in a flare gas capture project that has the potential to significantly reduce methane emissions and their associated harmful effects on the climate. The project, based in Oman, is being developed by Flare2Value (F2V), an energy solutions company in flare abatement.

FIMA Maschinenbau GmbH is a German manufacturer for single- and multistage radial blowers and turbo compressors. Original spare parts and services are provided by Service@FIMA.

ProductGallery.Name: Radial Compressor
ProductGallery.Description: Our radial compressors include single- and multi-stage process gas compressors, process air compressors and mechanical vapour compressors. In the integral version, the impeller is directly mounted on the high-speed shaft. Alternative versions are fitted with intermediate bearings. FIMA is the acknowledged world market leader in low-volume radial/turbo compressors. This type of compressor is frequently implemented in chemical processing plants or refineries.

ProductGallery.Name: Radial fans
ProductGallery.Description: FIMA radial blowers are characterised by their heavy duty industrial design and longevity. We offer customised solutions in pressure-resistant, gas-tight and corrosion-proof designs for most applications in the chemical and petrochemical industries. Thanks to their high safety and quality standards, our system solutions are frequently implemented along with environmentally hazardous substances or potentially explosive compounds.

ProductGallery.Name: Hermetically encapsulated fans and compressors
ProductGallery.Description: In the FIMA HETICO®, the impeller and the drive are encapsulated in a common housing. This avoids dynamically stressed seals between the process chamber and the environment. Due to the design principle of the magnetic coupling, the FIMA MACOUCO® realizes a high environmental compatibility compared to conventional machine types. In the MACOUCO®, the magnetic coupling and the bearing unit are flanged directly to the compressor housing.

ProductGallery.Name: Explosion-proof blowers
ProductGallery.Description: FIMA explosion-proof blowers are designed to move permanently explosive gases. These machines are able to handle the explosion groups IIA, IIB and IIB3. Typical applications for these special blowers are in tank terminals, chemical mixers, paint booths. Full certification and conformity with the latest environmental constraints facilitate permission by local authorities.

Description: FireDos specializes in the development and production of innovative and reliable proportioning systems, extinguishing monitors and trailers for fire fighting. We provide our customers security – through risk reduction, lower operating costs and compliance with legal regulations. Every single FireDos product is designed, built and tested to meet the most challenging conditions. Our proportioning systems,  extinguishing monitors and trailers fulfill an elementary task: they protect people, buildings, plants and equipment.

ProductGallery.Name: FireDos Stationary Foam Proportioners for Fire Extinguishing Systems
ProductGallery.Description: Our stationary proportioners are a key element to industrial fire extinguishing systems. Operators worldwide rely on our purely mechanical equipment – which is independent of electricity and emergency power supply – if it is about precise and reliable foam agent proportioning into the extinguishing water. All foam agent types, even such ones of high viscosity, can be mixed. A constant proportioning rate across a wide operating range guarantees automatic adaptation to variable firefighting scenarios.

ProductGallery.Name: FireDos Monitors for Firefighting with Water or Foam
ProductGallery.Description:
FireDos monitors are fit for firefighting with water or foam and deliver thousands of liters of water per minute, reaching 150 meters and more. The innovative, flow-optimized 'Oval Flat Design' ensures minimum pressure loss, enabling maximum throw & reach for the monitors. 

-    For flow rates from 500 l/min to 60 000 l/min
-   Manually or electrically controlled
-    Adjustment of the extinguishing agent flow rate during operation and full pressure

ProductGallery.Name: FireDos Trailers for firefighting and cooling
ProductGallery.Description:
Equipped with monitors, proportioners or a combination of both and together with a foam agent or water tank, fire trailers are a mobile supplement to stationary extinguishing systems. They are ready for quick and flexible use and reduce the need for personnel within the area of risk. 

-   Equipped with monitors, proportioners or a combination of both
-    For firefighting with water and foam

ProductGallery.Name: FireDos Smart Proportioners: Remote Maintenance reduces Downtimes
ProductGallery.Description: To guarantee faultless operation of a fire extinguishing system, regular maintenance also to the proportioners is a must. ‘Smart Proportioners’ optimize maintenance processes, allow remote troubleshooting and reduce costs.

ProductGallery.Name: FireDos Proportioners for Fire Trucks
ProductGallery.Description: The emergency personnel of municipal fire services, factory or voluntary fire brigades need equipment they can rely on at 100 %. Our proportioners were developed specifically for use by fire brigades and convince by their easy operation, reliability and flexibility when in use. These units are fit to be installed in crew cab or tanker fire trucks, roll-off containers and aerial ladder trucks.

ProductGallery.Name: FireDos Portable Proportioner for Fire Brigades
ProductGallery.Description: The mobile proportioners offer maximum flexibility in mobile use and guarantee precise foam agent proportioning across the entire operating range. It takes only a few turns to switch between the proportioning rates during operation. The mobile proportioners are also suitable for producing wetting agent. Due to the reduced surface tension, the wetting agent deeply soaks into the substance on fire, notably increasing the extinguishing success, compared with water or foam.

ProductGallery.Name: FireDos Early Fire Detection
ProductGallery.Description: There is a high risk of fires, especially in waste, wood and paper processing. Early fire detection systems using infrared detection allow early identification of potential fire sources and rapid response times. Hazardous hotspots that may turn into a fire source are identified within minutes, even before smoke or flames appear. The early fire detection system allows the full-surface monitoring of large areas using panoramic thermal imaging.

ProductGallery.Description: Our needle valves provide a reliable and consistent flow control and are manufactured in various materials, sizes and end connection configuration. These valves are designed to regulate a working pressure up to 10,000 psig and sizes ranging from 1/8” to 1” ; 6mm to 30mm. Every needle valve is factory tested with nitrogen at 1000 psig (69 bar).

ProductGallery.Name: Manifold  Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Our range of manifold valves includes 2-way, 3 way and 5-way manifold valves, made of stainless steel, carbon steel and duplex stainless steel available in various specifications and configurations. These are functionally installed to control, measure, isolate, equalize, calibrate, drain, vent or differentiate the pressure of liquids and gases. Valve manifolds series offer 2, 3 and 5 valves configurations which come in remote mounting and direct mounting

ProductGallery.Name: GAUGE VALVE
ProductGallery.Description: FLUIDLOK gauge valves are constructed using raw materials as per the international quality standards like ASTM, BIS, BS, etc. and provide fast, conventional installation and an economical gauge maintenance and operation. These valves are specifically designed for safer pressure gauge installation. These valves are manufactured in stainless steel, carbon steel or as per client requirements in various configurations and sizes with a working pressure of up to 6000 psig.

ProductGallery.Name: Monoflange Dbb Valve
ProductGallery.Description: Double Block and Bleed valves are used as an alternative to a system which has multiple valves. FLUIDLOK DBB Valves are designed in an integrally forged body or barstock body specifically to provide a compact design with strength thereby reducing potential leak paths, system mass which in turn reduces the total weight, vibration, making it rigid, safer and cost efficient. These valves find their application in various industries like oil and gas, chemical, refinery, power.

ProductGallery.Name: Modular DBB Valve
ProductGallery.Description: Our DBB valves Integral Body Double Block and Bleed Valve (Modular DBB Valve) are available in various configurations and sizes and manufactured in stainless steel, carbon steel, monel, duplex, super duplex, etc. in accordance with standards such as ASME B16.5, API flanges, ASME B16.34, ASME B16.10, API 6D (fire-safe is optional), our DBB Valves Are Fire Safe Tested as per API 6FA

Description: FMS Tech. is a pioneer and innovator of in-vehicle-monitoring and on-board computers technology. FMS Tech. has provided fleet management systems that have generated millions of dollars in savings and profits to customers. FMS Tech. strives to innovate new technologies to help enhance the experience of customers and progress in their daily business, improve the driving of our personal and commercial vehicles, reduce carbon dioxide and protect the environment, minimize unnecessary expenditures, and save cost.

ProductGallery.Name: FMS Fusion Series
ProductGallery.Description: Fusion solution is the latest innovation in their Video-matics technology by FMS Tech. The product was designed to help companies with massive road transport and long driving hours requirements mitigate risks to reduce road accidents and fatalities by combining the power of telematics with the latest visual technologies. With advanced and powerful processing capabilities along with built-in Image Processing, this solution caters to multiple applications and verticals.

ProductGallery.Name: FMS Track 2000 Plus
ProductGallery.Description: The FMS Track 2000 Plus Device has Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) which supports both GPS and GLONASS providing high-accuracy reading and reporting down to 1 meter resolution. With the built-in GSM modem, the device will send vehicle location, vehicle parameters, and notifications to the cloud server and mobile device according to predefined settings, or upon exceeding specific thresholds, or in case of an emergency.

ProductGallery.Name: FMS Trace 2000
ProductGallery.Description:
The Trace 2K device is designed for heavy fleet applications featuring high-accuracy tracking device and waterproof at IP66 rating making it suitable for harsh weather and environments.

It is equipped with Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) which supports both GPS and GLONASS and CDMA GSM modem that provides accurate reporting and faster connectivity and instant notification. Through these systems, the user can have notifications sent quickly to cloud server or mobile device.

ProductGallery.Name: FMS e-Lock Master
ProductGallery.Description: FMS E-Lock Master is an RFID controlled electro-mechanical lock specially designed for asset tracking and security solution. With a built-in wireless communication module, it supports pairing with multiple E-Lock Slave and control the locking and unlocking of all the paired devices at once, by a single tap of the RFID card on the E-Lock Master. It also consists of a built-in GNSS & LTE module for asset location and communication with a dedicated web-based software.

ProductGallery.Name: FMS SBD Skylink
ProductGallery.Description: The FMS SBD Sky Link is a standalone Iridium modem designed to integrate with other FMS Asset Tracking devices to support the increasing demands for dual modem data transmission. The FMS SBD Sky Link is a smart satellite antenna and modem solution. In addition to capturing and storing trip details, the FMS SBD Sky Link gives fleet managers the ability to customize events, set thresholds monitor vehicle performance and driving behavior at all times.

ProductGallery.Name: FMS Persona 200
ProductGallery.Description: FMS Persona 200 is a compact on-board computer with built-in GNSS and GSM modems for tracking real-time location of assets and uploading the recorded data to the FMS cloud. Along with the proprietary FMS Smart Mobility software, this device can help customers not only save time and effort, but also save on cost by providing complete transparency on their fleet operations.

Description:

Our business covers process and environmental analytics, scientific instruments, consultant and engineering project. We have a full set of R&D, supply chain, sales and service, provided products and services to metallurgy, refinery, chemical, agriculture and scientific research.

ProductGallery.Name: Compact Air Quality Monitoring System
ProductGallery.Description: The Compact system is the alternative solution against standard AQMS, it comes with an integrated shelter consisting of IPC, sampler, AC, and all necessary accessories.

ProductGallery.Name: Air Quality Monitoring System
ProductGallery.Description: FPI's ambient air monitoring system consists of a sampling subsystem, a gas dynamic calibration subsystem, a meteorological parameters monitoring subsystem, a standard parameters monitoring subsystem, and data acquisition and processing subsystem. It can monitor conventional air pollutants such as SO2, NO, NOX, CO, O3, PM2.5, PM10, etc. FPI also provides compact AQMS, micro AQMS, and mobile stations applicable to various customer needs.

ProductGallery.Name: Tunable Diode Laser (TDL) Gas Analyzer
ProductGallery.Description: The analyzer is based on Tunable Diode Laser Absorption spectroscopy (TDLAS) technology. It can detect and analyze gas concentrations in harsh environments such as dusty and high temperatures and corrosive areas while maintaining a high level of safety, quick response time, and high measurement accuracy.

ProductGallery.Name: In-situ Laser Gas Analyzer
ProductGallery.Description:
Utilizing proprietary technologies of Tunable Diode Laser Absorption Spectroscopy (TDLAS), FPI delivers the LGA system to satisfy in-situ measurements with high accuracy, fast response, strong reliability, and virtually maintenance-free.  

LGA-4000 is a highly reliable in-situ laser gas analysis system that monitors various toxic and hazardous substances (HF, NH3, H2S, HCI) from stack emission with high accuracy, strong reliability and is virtually maintenance-free.

ProductGallery.Name: Extractive Laser Gas Analyzer
ProductGallery.Description: LGA-4500, the bypass process gas analysis product, is based on the technology of diode absorption spectroscopy (DLAS), is able to make on-line analysis on carious process gases with high dust or high pressure after the bypass treatment.

ProductGallery.Name: Handheld Infrared Thermal Imager
ProductGallery.Description: Infrared thermal imaging cameras can capture infrared (IR) radiant heat emitted by objects that other methods cannot see. These images can show the temperature range represented by color and color change and monitor the object's heat distribution and temperature change.

ProductGallery.Name: V-3 Gas Leak Detecting Thermal Imaging Camera
ProductGallery.Description:
Cooled detector,capable of measuring temperature from 20 movable zones (input boxes or circles) and displaying maximum/minimum 
and average values.

ProductGallery.Name: F-3FD Explosion-Proof Dual-Spectrum System
ProductGallery.Description: Infrared detector of uncooled micro-pyrometer, supporting automatic line scan, preset point cruise and other functions.Capable of angle controlling, angle rotation.

Description: FET (Forum Energy Technologies) is a global company, serving the oil, natural gas, industrial, and renewable energy industries. FET provides value-added solutions that increase the safety and efficiency of energy exploration and production. We are an environmentally and socially responsible company headquartered in Houston, TX with manufacturing, distribution, and service facilities strategically located throughout the world.

ProductGallery.Name: Coiled Line Pipe
ProductGallery.Description: A proven solution for many oilfield applications. Global Tubing offers the widest range selection of coiled line pipe / coiled tubing pipelines in the industry. Sizes range from 3/4-inch to 5-inch OD with wall thicknesses ranging from 0.087 to 0.337 inches. The most commonly used applications for coiled line pipe include a variety of temporary and permanent onshore and offshore installations.

ProductGallery.Name: Coiled Tubing
ProductGallery.Description: Global Tubing offers the widest selection of coiled tubing products in the industry, utilizing proprietary steel chemistry, experienced manufacturing and technical personnel, state-of-the-art mill technology and digital control systems deliver consistently higher quality products. Typically used for work strings, coiled tubing drill strings, and permanent installations, Global Tubing delivers advanced coiled tubing solutions.

ProductGallery.Name: Hydraulic Latch Assembly (HLA)
ProductGallery.Description: Our HLA 15K is the #1 well head quick connection in the oilfield. Built off of the same dependable and field repair capable platform as our HLA 10K, our HLA 15K handles 15K pressures and comes with many OEM remote options to allow for more operational functionality from a safe distance.

ProductGallery.Name: SandGuard™
ProductGallery.Description: FET’s Multilift Solutions’ SandGuard™ ESP eliminates one of the leading causes of ESP failures worldwide: solids fallback. The unique patented design captures sand fallback saving operators from costly workovers and ESP replacements.

ProductGallery.Name: Packer Stage Collar
ProductGallery.Description: The Davis-Lynch packer stage cementing collar (PSC) helps ensure proper placement of competent cement in the intermediate casing string, while expanding the operating envelope. By combining an inflatable packer and a stage cementing collar, the PSC reduces NPT and well construction costs, while complying with regulatory requirements and minimizing HSE risks.

ProductGallery.Name: FR120 Iron Roughneck
ProductGallery.Description: With approximately 50 percent fewer components than others in its class, FET’s FR120 and FR120-C series of iron roughnecks offer a unique, simplified design that provides years of reliable service. With the lowest cost of ownership in their class, our roughnecks are known for their low maintenance and easy repairs.

ProductGallery.Name: Osprey™ Mud Pump Fluid End Systems
ProductGallery.Description: FET’s Osprey™ system is the proven leader in the technology and design of world-class mud pump components. The Osprey products are proven to reduce risks and improve safety records. Coupled with our highly-skilled technical team, Osprey products will help you Go Faster, Go Longer, and Go Harder.

ProductGallery.Name: Forum Arabia
ProductGallery.Description: FET’s long-term commitment to the region with a dedicated Middle East team and facility will provide customers with a broad portfolio of quality, safe and cost-effective solutions for the entire oil and gas lifecycle.

ProductGallery.Name: EDGE Desalters
ProductGallery.Description: EDGE solutions rank as the industry’s best desalters and dehydrators, built upon an AC-type electrostatic coalescing process that efficiently treats crude oil. Applying electrodes to oil-and-water mixtures creates high-voltage electrical fields that excite embedded brine droplets. As they separate and fall away from the crude, excess water and solids wash out and leave cleaner oil for downstream refining.

Description:
Fuji Electric contributes to decarbonising, saving energy and preserving the planet for a safe and sustainable society.

Fuji Electric helps industries produce cleaner energy by using state-of-the-art instrumentation solutions to measure their fluids and monitor their gas emissions.

The company optimizes processes for manufacturers to save money, and reduce operating costs and operation time while improving the overall efficiency of their plant in a cleaner and more sustainable way.

ProductGallery.Description:
High static differential pressure transmitter ideal for oil&gas applications and which is ideally suited to Topside and Subsea applications.

ProductGallery.Name: Differential pressure measurement with high performance features
ProductGallery.Description:

They are offered with a multitude of different process connections and threaded direct connections, or with or without remote seals, and are fitted with adequate marine offshore protection.

Using new and innovative polymer technology we aim to offer you intelligent and competitive alternatives for the traditional gas separation technologies.

ProductGallery.Name: APURA Gas Separation Membrane
ProductGallery.Description: Based on Fujifilm’s outstanding history in organic chemistry, thin film coating- and manufacturing excellence, we have developed a highly functional membrane element. Fujifilm Apura™ has proven itself for treatment of natural gas and distinguishes itself with high performance and robustness against contaminants like water and aromatics.

ProductGallery.Name: Apura™ 1.5XF & Apura™ 2.0C for Natural Gas Sweetening
ProductGallery.Description: With Fujifilm’s new gas separation element Apura™ our clients are able to sweeten their natural gas in an efficient and cost-effective manner. The elements can be used for bulk and fine removal of acid gas in natural gas processes. Apura™ gas separation membranes include two products: Apura-1.5XF and Apura-2.0C. Such products are designed to maximize the CO2 removal capacity and hydrocarbon recovery

ProductGallery.Name: Apura™ FG for Fuel Gas Conditioning

Guardian reduces the risk of costly damage and a negative impact on your business, people and the environment.

Description: For more than 160 years, GD Energy Products has pushed the industry forward with innovative pump designs, advanced manufacturing processes and a team dedicated to doing what’s right for our customers. Over our history, we have never stood still. We know that as long as we’re looking ahead, we can help everyone we work with stay ahead. Today, we put everything we’ve learned into a world-spanning resource capable of delivering unmatched applications, products and services.

ProductGallery.Name: GD 2500Q HDF
ProductGallery.Description: The GD 2500Q Heavy Duty Frame (HDF) quintuplex pump was designed to extend pump service life through an optimized power end frame design. Stable, robust, and durable, the GD 2500Q HDF features thicker skin plates and stronger welds to boost structural integrity.

ProductGallery.Name: Thunder 5000
ProductGallery.Description: The future of frac fleets is higher horsepower. Whether it be powered by electric motor, dual fuel, or gas turbine, our new Thunder 5000 pump is a force for nature – helping operators achieve the cost savings that come with its proven performance. An 11” stroke quintuplex rated for 5,000 HP, the Thunder 5000 reduces the number of trucks necessary in the fleet and allows for greater flow at slower operating speeds. With its electric, DGB and turbine direct capabilities, it can further reduce onsite energy costs and emissions. It does this all while meeting or exceeding competitor output capabilities and reducing the number of fatigue cycles – helping extend pump life and making the Thunder 5000 a true force for nature.

ProductGallery.Name: GD PZ 2400
ProductGallery.Description:
Built to meet the demands of the most severe drilling requirements, the PZ 2400 offers 10% more power (2,400 BHP), 30% less weight and a smaller footprint (20% less) of competing pumps in its class. It is, quite simply, a game changer for rigs looking to upgrade their existing equipment or for newer super-spec rigs requiring more power, flow and durability.

Rated at 7,500 psi, and with a 14” stroke, the PZ 2400 enables contractors to drill longer laterals with optimal flow and pressure. Combined with Redline consumables, customers can expect to see improved performance and decreased downtime, lowering customers' total cost of ownership.

The PZ 2400 features a Y-shaped module design, meaning less stress is placed on the pumps internal components and higher flow rates can be achieved with improved fatigue life.

ProductGallery.Name: GD 1000Q HD
ProductGallery.Description:
The GD 1000Q HD is designed and built to be the best 1000hp pump on the market. In the most severe well servicing applications, where longer laterals require stronger pumps to perform under higher pressures, you can rely on the GD 1000Q HD. Its robust design and the industry’s best fluid end technology, make the GD 1000Q HD the preferred pump for pump-downs, coiled tubing, cementing, acidizing, well kill and many other tough applications.

Suitable for any high pressure application, the GD 1000Q HD features GD Energy Products’ Thunder coated bearings and next generation of fluid end technology (GDNX), offering customers a premium pump at the lowest total cost of ownership.

ProductGallery.Name: GD COMPACT HD
ProductGallery.Description:
The GD Compact HD was designed to eliminate power-end contamination prevalent in other 600HP short/compact designs, and provide the longest pump life available in the market today.

Use of our proprietary extended life bearings reduces friction allowing the pump to run cooler and last longer. Capable of back-to-back mounting within the road legal 102” limit, the GD Compact HD is the best pump on the market today for your 600HP double pumping needs. Also, in keeping with our commitment to provide the highest level of support to our customers, the original GD Compact is still available.

ProductGallery.Name: GD 600
ProductGallery.Description:
The GD 600 is an evolution of the original OPI-600, and a mainstay for pumping units around the world. Rugged construction and rigid quality control ensure the most durable, long-lasting pump so you can get the job done right.

This versatile pump offers left or right side drive, multiple gear-box options, and an optional autofrettaged fluid end so you can have a pump specifically suited to your needs.

ProductGallery.Name: 2500-NX Fluid End
ProductGallery.Description:
Today’s pressure pumping applications demand more from pumps and equipment than ever before. That’s why GD Energy Products developed the NX – the next generation of fluid end technology. NX was specifically designed to further increase the operational service life of fluid ends used in a hydraulic fracturing, coil tubing, and other extreme duty applications.

Backed by GD Energy Products’ legacy of product innovation and superior product quality, the NX is a combination of our highest performing geometry, metallurgy and components.

ProductGallery.Name: Frac Valve and Seat
ProductGallery.Description:
GD Energy Products Redline valves and seats are designed for maximum performance, reliability, and to outlast the competition. Our full-open, bonded design provides optimal flow efficiency and maximum sealing. Featuring a proprietary urethane blend, our P-4 and P-5 valve is a field-proven performer in temperatures up to 250°F.

In field tests across multiple harsh environments, our valves and seats lasted an average of 42% longer than the closest competition.

ProductGallery.Name: GD Redline Consumables Packing

ProductGallery.Name: Model 170/270/370 | WECO® Hammer Union Pressure Transmitter

They are also available in multiple outputs, ranges, electrical connections, and area approvals to meet specific requirements.

ProductGallery.Name: Model 240/340-IM Series | Flush Mount Pressure Transmitter

The rugged, all-welded, Inconel design of the 40-IM series allows for greater compatibility with corrosive media. No zero offset is caused during sensor installation.

ProductGallery.Name: Haws OTS 4000 Overhead Tank Shower
ProductGallery.Description: Model OTS 4000 series indoor/outdoor, overhead tank drench shower and optional eyewash is housed within a 1.05 x 1.05 m all-weather galvanized structure and can be ordered with a 350L, 1200L or 1600L GRP or stainless-steel tank. The unit provides optional operating temperature ranges of -5° to +60° C. This unit comes with a water level indicator, water temp gauge, universal emergency signage, overflow drain exit, and 1-1/4" BSP male inlet.

ProductGallery.Name: Haws skid-mounted tempering system 8780
ProductGallery.Description: Model 8780 standard skid-mounted tempering system which may supply a number of drench systems or eyewash stations. ProductGallery.Name: Stainless steel combination emergency shower Haws 8330 AXION
ProductGallery.Description: The Haws® all stainless steel combination safety shower 8330 AXION consists of an emergency body shower with stainless steel head and an eyewash station with stainless steel bowl. It complies to the standards EN 15154-1, EN 15154-2 and ANSI Z358.1 and is the optimal solution for industrial applications where highest corrosion resistance is required. All components are made of stainless steel and makes this freestanding combination shower extremely corrosion resistant and very rugged.

ProductGallery.Name: Portable gravitiy fed eyewash station Haws 7500
ProductGallery.Description: The Haws portable eyewash model 7500 is ideal for remote locations or where a continuous water supply is not available. The model 7500 features a 60 liters tank providing a continuous flow for 15 minutes. When the yellow spray arm is pulled down, the model 7500 delivers instantly a soft stream that rinses both eyes. Wall or shelf mounted, this portable self-contained portable eyewash can be placed virtually anywhere on a working environment.

ProductGallery.Name: Portable Air-Charged Emergency Eyewash Haws 7603
ProductGallery.Description: The Haws 7603 is an ideal, cost-efficient solution for a facility's ANSI eyewash requirements in locations without access to a continuous potable water source. The pressurized 56.8 liter personal portable eyewash provides a reliable source of safety for the irrigation process.

ProductGallery.Name: EXP-J-14KS/1500
ProductGallery.Description: Effective in environments where a constant supply of water cannot be guaranteed. ProductGallery.Name: STD-68G
ProductGallery.Description: Where a fixed eye/face wash installation is not possible, this portable gravity fed unit can be table mounted or wall mounted. The 60 litre capacity eye wash station delivers three litres per minute of potable water for 15 minutes, conforming to European and International standards. Suitable for indoor use and with the addition of the optional heated cabinet, can also be installed outdoors.

ProductGallery.Name: STD-J-40K/45G
ProductGallery.Description: The popular STD-40K/45G mobile safety shower and eye/face wash is now available with a removable insulated jacket to offer protection to the unit from frost or direct sunlight. The soft polyester coated PVC jacket features a silicone glass cloth inner and a 25mm thick matt insulation. These mobile, self-contained models offer rapid response within easy reach of a hazard, and flexibility of location. They are designed to be a supplement to permanent plumbed-in safety showers

ProductGallery.Name: EXP-SD-18GS/45G
ProductGallery.Description: The perfect combination for hot climates, a self-draining safety shower and durable, UV resistant lidded eye/face wash unit. In extreme hot conditions the intensity of the sun can heat standing water left in the pipework following a shower activation to alarming levels. The self-draining models allow this water to drain away, rather than risk scalding the next operator. Meets EN15154 and ANSI Z358.1-2014 standards.

Description:

From this global footprint, the company’s sales, service, manufacturing and threading locations can meet virtually any customer requirement with a full range of applications above and below the wellhead.

ProductGallery.Name: Organic Oil Recovery
ProductGallery.Description: The Organic Oil Recovery Process is a unique form of microbial enhanced oil recovery which can optimise reservoir performance and recovery rates as well as reduced H2S.

ProductGallery.Name: 10K Sand Filter
ProductGallery.Description: Wellhead sand filtration is established as an industry standard technique for sand and solids removal upstream of the choke manifold during well testing, frac-flowback and well clean-up operations. The Hunting Dual Pot Sand Filters are available in a broad range of sizes and configurations, up to 20,000psi WP. These products are in service globally with major production testing companies.

ProductGallery.Name: ESSV and ESSV HD
ProductGallery.Description:
Hunting revolutionized well intervention operations with the original shear 
and seal valve and now offers the heavy duty valve to compliment the 
product family, offering an expanded range delivering safety, reliability and 
well integrity for Slickline, Braided Line, E-Line or Coiled Tubing operations.

ProductGallery.Name: OK Roller Kickover Tool
ProductGallery.Description:
‘OM’ Series Roller Kickover Tools use key components manufactured by Hunting to original Camco designs and specifications.

The ‘OM’ Series Roller Kickover Tools are wireline service tools that are used to install and retrieve 1 ½” OD side pocket subsurface control devices into Camco side pocket mandrels fitted with an orienting sleeve. A running or pulling tool must be attached to these tools in order to perform this operation

ProductGallery.Name: VariBall ® Roller System
ProductGallery.Description: The Hunting Slickline VariBall Roller System provides efficient and effective downhole roller chassis for use in high angle wells. The design delivers a system that minimizes frictional tool string drag, minimizes roller contact and self aligns during deployment. Roller contact is important whilst running in plastic and ceramic coated tubing strings as damage to these coatings can often result in accelerated tubing corrosion.

ProductGallery.Name: Cyclonic Wellhead Desander
ProductGallery.Description:
The Hunting Cyclonic Wellhead Desander offers a robust high pressure solids management solution upstream of the choke manifold during well testing, frac-flowback and well clean-up operations. 
Cyclonic de-sanders have a high efficiency of separation at high flow-rates with minimal pressure drop and can handle both a wider range of particle sizes and larger volumes of solids when compared to sand filters.

ProductGallery.Name: Efficiency Sub™
ProductGallery.Description:
Hunting’s Efficiency Sub™ assembly (ESUB) is the affordable plug and 
play solution for the conventional perforating gun.
The ESUB is easily installed into conventional guns, creating field ready plug-and-play perforating assemblies. ESUB utilizes Hunting’s Shorty ControlFire® Cartridge which houses the switch, detonator, and pressure bulkhead in a convenient wireless package. ESUB allows simple, wire-free arming and perforating gun assembly at the wellsite.

ProductGallery.Name: WellGripp™
ProductGallery.Description: The WellGripp™ Connector grips and seals on the outer diameter of coiled tubing, enabling the attachment of tools for coiled tubing operations.

Description: Industrial Scientific is on a mission to end death on the job through portable gas detection, hardware as a service, and advanced analytics that help prevent exposure to hazards and deliver unmatched clarity into safety and operational performance. Since 1985, Industrial Scientific has helped customers around the world automate critical safety workflows to ensure that their people go home safely each night. For more information, visit www.indsci.com.

ProductGallery.Name: *NEW* T40 II Rattler™ Portable Single Detector
ProductGallery.Description: The T40 II Rattler is robust and light, with an ingress protection ofIP68 and is suitable for working in the most challenging, hazardous area environments. The industrial leading, ultra-fast T90 response time can detect gas hazards on the job in real time, saving valuable time, to ensure worker safety. To meet the needs of long-term operation, the high-performance lithium battery can operate under extreme weather conditions continuously for 2 years.

ProductGallery.Name: *NEW* Ventis® Pro5 Portable Connected Multi-Gas Detector
ProductGallery.Description:
The Ventis Pro5 multi-gas detector gives you the power to detect up to five gases simultaneously and manage worker safety any time, anywhere. Connect workers for live monitoring to instantly receive real-time location data, man-down alarms, and gas alerts so that your team always has help.

Available now with WiFi capabilities and PID sensor

ProductGallery.Name: iNet Platform
ProductGallery.Description: Whether you need live monitoring with real-time alerts, gas detection management with historical reports, or automatic instrument exchanges, our iNet® platform will help you to be safer and more productive. This showcases our iNet Exchange, iNet Control, iNet Now and Safer One.

ProductGallery.Name: Tango® TX1 Portable Single-Gas Detector
ProductGallery.Description: Eliminate distractions with a lightweight and wearable personal detector that offers maintenance-free gas detection. A two-year runtime and patented DualSense® Technology increase worker safety, regardless of bump test frequency, while reducing overall costs.

ProductGallery.Name: GasBadge® Pro Portable Single-Gas Monitor
ProductGallery.Description: Built to Industrial Scientific’s highest quality and reliability standards, GasBadge Pro provides a lifetime of gas hazard protection. A wide range of sensor types makes it easy to monitor unsafe levels of gases specific to your site.

ProductGallery.Name: Tango® TX2 Two-Gas Monitor
ProductGallery.Description: Protect workers, reduce false alarms, and spend less time managing your gas detector fleet with the Tango TX2. Unlike other two-gas monitors that use combination sensors, the Tango TX2 uses individual sensors to increase alarm accuracy so you can reduce unnecessary shutdowns and improve incident data quality.

ProductGallery.Name: Ventis® MX4 Portable Multi-Gas Detector
ProductGallery.Description: Get the simple, reliable gas detection you need with the Ventis MX4, a four-gas detector designed to be rugged yet lightweight and easy to wear. The Ventis MX4 eliminates the need for extra monitors by transitioning seamlessly from personal monitoring to confined space entry with a slide-on pump.

ProductGallery.Name: MX6 iBrid® Portable Multi-Gas Detector
ProductGallery.Description: Take your gas detection capabilities to new heights with the MX6 iBrid®. With the ability to monitor up to six gases at once, twenty-four sensor options, and a robust list of configurable settings, the MX6 iBrid easily adapts to your safety needs.

ProductGallery.Name: Radius® BZ1 Area  Monitor
ProductGallery.Description: Trust the area monitor designed for the world’s harshest environments. Alarms that sound at 108dB, bold LED lights, and clear alarm action messages like “EVACUATE” cut through even the busiest work areas. With local and remote monitoring options, everyone from teams working nearby to safety managers off site will know there’s a hazard and how to respond.

ProductGallery.Name: DSX™ Docking Station
ProductGallery.Description: The DSX Docking Station easily maintains the gas detectors that keep your people safe in hazardous environments. Our docking station is available in three configurations.

ProductGallery.Name: INNOWRAP
ProductGallery.Description: Innowrap cold applied tape is designed to prevent corrosion outside the pipelines and is applied to various types of pipelines used in oil, gas, chemical, and water supply markets to play an important role in corrosion prevention. ProductGallery.Name: KOWRAP
ProductGallery.Description: Kowrap is a heat shrinkable sleeve for corrosion protection that uses strong heat shrinkage force and is applied to buried and exposed steel pipelines. Its strong adhesion and long-term durability guarantee long-term corrosion protection under various buried conditions and a high-stress environment. It is certified and exceeds the KOGAS GSM-2113 Heat shrinkable material standard, German Gas and Water Association (DVGW), and European EN12068 standards.

ProductGallery.Name: INNOPLUS
ProductGallery.Description: Innoplus heat-shrink casing system is a finishing material for pre-insulated pipelines consisting of an erupted-cross linked tubular heat-shrink casing and accessories used for effective sealing and protection. This product has passed the EN489 European standard soil stress test and has been approved by the Korea District Heating Corporation.

INTERTEC FIRE SHELTERS keep safety equipment in operation in the event of a fire. They ensure a comparatively low internal temperature - even after 120 minutes of exposure. FIRE SHELTERS are made of a special multi-layer sandwich construction of GRP and
mineral wool. Special access points allow maintenance of the instruments without disassembly. The protective solution itself, on the other hand, is completely maintenance-free.

ProductGallery.Name: ENCLOSURES
ProductGallery.Description: INTERTEC offers various standard enclosures to protect field-mounted process equipment. Having the broadest range on the market - in sizes and designs - allows us to offer the right enclosure to provide optimal and cost-effective solutions for each application.

ProductGallery.Name: Explosion-proof heating systems
ProductGallery.Description: INTERTEC offers the world's largest selection of explosion-proof heaters, certified for almost all regions of the world: ATEX, IECEx, CSA, EACEx. The solution to a heating task is the interplay of thermal insulation, mounting position, heater type and the control devices or temperature switches. And the heating tasks have very different requirements. Only the wide spectrum makes it possible to configure the perfect solution with the optimum heat transfer, the best mounting, etc.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon EZ-Spray Ceramic Coating
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon EZ-Spray Ceramic is a sprayable, solvent-free, high performance ceramic-filled epoxy for sealing, protecting and repairing surface subject to erosion, corrosion and wear.  Significantly reduces equipment repair time with easy to use delivery system. Available in Red & Blue this product is ideal to protect pumps, tanks, and processing equipment. An easy to apply product which will generate a smooth finish.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon Wear Guard 300 RTC
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon Wear Guard 300RTC (Room Temperature Cure) is a revolutionary wear and abrasion protection epoxy compound formulated to significantly outlast traditional wear and abrasion products under elevated temperatures. This unique formulation enables a durable, long-lasting compound in harsh environments which include chemical corrosion. Providing durable protection in wet and dry conditions up to 150 C.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon Epoxy Coat 7000 AR (Acid Resistnant)
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon Epoxy Coat 7000 AR is a two part epoxy novalac system designed to protect surfaces from severe acid and chemical attack. This 100% solids comes in a non-VOC version as well providing options when installing. Providing excellent adhesion to concrete surfaces and resistant to acids this product is ideal for chemical storage tanks, dike walls, and secondary containment areas.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon Ultra Quartz
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon Ultra Quartz is a chemically resistant, heavy duty concrete repair system.  Providing outstanding resistance to acids, alkalis, water, oils, solvents, and most chemicals makes this an ideal product anywhere harsh chemicals are used. Protecting concrete floors, tanks, and secondary containment, Devcon Ultra Quartz provides long lasting results. This easy to apply product can be applied with a trowel in horizontal or vertical applications.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon Plastic Steel Putty A
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon Plastic Steel Putty A is the original metal-filled epoxy putty used for hundreds of routing maintenance, production, and tooling applications. Developed in the 1950s as an alternative to welding this product has provided safe solutions to hundreds of thousands of applications.  This highly versatile product bonds to most metals, concrete, and plastics; has high resistance to many chemicals, and is machinable.

ProductGallery.Name: Chockfast Red Versaflow
ProductGallery.Description: Chockfast Red Versaflow is a breakthrough pumpable, high flow grout designed to bring versatility and efficiency to the most challenging installations of critical equipment. Chockfast's continual effort toward product optimization has resulted in the introduction of Chockfast Red Versaflow, offering enhanced working and placement properties while maintaining the robust, long-term performance the Chockfast products are proven to deliver under the most demanding operational conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: Chockfast Orange
ProductGallery.Description: Chockfast Orange is a specially formulated 100% solids, two component inert filled casting compound developed for use as a chocking or grouting material. Chockfast is designed to withstand severe marine and industrial environments involving a high degree of both physical and thermal shock.  The compound is non-shrinking and has very high impact and compressive strength.  Years of successful installations have demonstrated the superior and cost effective precision aligning product.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon R-Flex Belt Repair System
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon R-Flex is formulated to quickly repair tears, holes and gouges as well as protecting clips in styrene-butadiene rubber heavy weight conveyor belts. Offering excellent abrasion resistance as well as superior adhesion, the R-Flex urethane compound is easy to mix and cures quickly.  The repaired belt can be back in service just 90 minutes after application.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon Flexane General Purpose Putty
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon Flexane General Purpose Putty is a putty applied by trowel for repairing, coating, molding, and lining equipment and components exposed to impact, abrasion, vibration and movement. Bonding to most common substrates the Devcon General Purpose Putty provides a SAG free application allowing the product to be applied vertically with no mess.

ProductGallery.Name: Devcon Plastic steel 5 Minute Putty (SF)
ProductGallery.Description: Devcon Plastic Steel 5 Minute Putty is a fast-curing steel-filled epoxy for dependable emergency repairs. This product bonds to many metals, is easy to apply and has high durability.  This product hardens in 5 minutes and fully cures within the hour.  This fast working product provides the strength and resiliency needed to protect equipment and is applied in the fraction of the time as other metal repair systems.

ProductGallery.Name: Modified-LZF™ (Lead/Zinc-Free High-Pressure Thread Compound)
ProductGallery.Description: MODIFIED-LZF our most recently introduced high-pressure sealant and drilling compound is patented and designed as a lead-free alternate for API-MODIFIED. MODIFIED-LZF contains copper flake and graphite as well as other nonmetallic, inorganic, extreme pressure, and anti-wear additives. It contains a balanced package of rust, corrosion, and oxidation inhibitors blended into a high-quality aluminum complex base grease.

ProductGallery.Name: Kopr-Kote® (Drill Collar & Tool Joint Compound)
ProductGallery.Description: A premium quality, unleaded compound containing copper flake, graphite, and other natural extreme pressure and anti-wear additives. KOPR-KOTE’s solids package is formulated to prevent excessive circumferential makeup by increasing the coefficient of friction under compressive forces. As stress levels rise above 50% of yield, the friction factor increases, limiting downhole makeup. Full hydraulic joint efficiency is maintained allowing joint shoulder faces to mate completely without standoff or deformation.

ProductGallery.Name: Jet-Lok® III (Threadlocker / Two-Part Epoxy)
ProductGallery.Description: JET-LOK III is a two-part, ZINC-FREE epoxy with largely non-metallic fillers that can be used to permanently lock threaded connections under normal operating conditions. Both the handy-pak and kit use a new catalyst for added pot life and durability with lower toxicity and less heat generation making it the optimum choice for any application. It is designed for use on all threaded joints or fasteners where an exceptionally strong and durable bond is required.

KeyDrill Technology supplies reliable high-tech Measurement-While-Drilling (MWD) systems for the global oil and gas drilling market. KeyDrill is a leader in MWD system design and manufacture. KeyDrill is committed to ongoing research and development of state-of-the-art MWD technology that is rugged, modular, and customizable. From intuitive and dynamic surface decoding to the most feature driven directional modules, azimuthal gamma and pressure while drilling, KeyDrill can provide your company with the ultimate advantage.

ProductGallery.Name: 185C/175C MUD PULSE MWD KIT
ProductGallery.Description: We offer high-temperature (185C) and (175C) tools, which are retrievable and compatible with QDT legacy tools. Our high accuracy continuous inclination and continuous azimuth measurements provide early warning for directional corrections. The KeyDrill MWD system is an open platform with up to 36 Generic Variables to support third-party tools. Our surface system offers advanced automated filtering and signal detection providing the most reliable decoding technology on the market today.

ProductGallery.Name: KeyDrill Mini Decoding Unit (KDU-Mini)
ProductGallery.Description: The KDU-Mini is a 12” fully integrated wireless decoder that features the perfect size touchscreen display for the rig floor and a paired programming box/Radio for the MWD Quarters. MWD Hands and Directional Drillers alike love the small, yet powerful, KDU-Mini. KeyDrill’s intuitive decoding filters can help eliminate a large variety of variables that traditionally cause decoding issues. With an “Evergreen” philosophy our decoders are updated as the industry demands change.

ProductGallery.Name: KeyDrill Azimuthal Gamma (KRG)
ProductGallery.Description: This unit has singlehandedly displaced the “Majors” at an unprecedented rate.  By choosing the KRG advantage your company can reduce operator liability, increase tool availability, and offer Dynamic Imaging Logs at a very aggressive price point.  To see field data and schedule a shop demo please contact us today.

ProductGallery.Name: KeyDrill Pressure While Drilling (KPWD)
ProductGallery.Description: Downhole mud pressure is one of the most important pieces of information the driller can have to gain a sense of what is happening while drilling. The KeyDrill Pressure While Drilling tool measures the annular, drill pipe, and differential pressures, as well as the downhole temperature during no-flow, drilling, wiping, or tripping out of hole. With this crucial information, the driller can make better decisions in real-time to improve drilling efficiency and improve Rig safety.

ProductGallery.Name: Automated Survey Correction While Drilling
ProductGallery.Description: KeyDrill has teamed up with the most widely used survey experts such as H&P (MagVAR), Superior QC, roundLAB, and K&M Technology Group to create automated survey corrections for efficient workflow. Automated survey correction procedures help avoid human errors by eliminating manual data entry, saving man-hours, and improving wellbore placement accuracy without loss of rig time. The correction procedures run in the background and can automatically synchronize with survey correction cloud stations.

ProductGallery.Name: KeyDrill Downhole Bus Bridge Module (BBM)
ProductGallery.Description: Tools such as a secondary or backup Gamma module, Rotary Steerable like Extreme Orbit via Babel Fish, Resistivity, Near-Bit, Azimuthal Gamma, or Pressure While Drilling can be easily integrated. The KeyDrill Bus Bridge Module can be configured to communicate via UART, RS485, or CANBus protocols. Measurements from these additional tools are acquired and then translated (commonly a QDT-compatible signal) to your MWD string for transmission to the surface.

ProductGallery.Name: KeyDrill Top Mount Pulser (KTMP)
ProductGallery.Description: The KeyDrill Top Mount Pulser is a servo-controlled design that provides reliable performance in tough drilling conditions. The design provides great power efficiency and a rapid valve response. This allows for higher data rates while minimizing the effect on battery life. Due to the wide flow range with consistent pulse amplitude, field component changes are a thing of the past. The Top Mount Pulser can be customized for your existing MWD fleet.

ProductGallery.Name: KeyDrill Universal Pulser Driver (KPD)
ProductGallery.Description: The KeyDrill Pulser Driver is a universally designed driver that is compatible with most mud-pulse pulsers on the market. Its low power consumption can extend the battery life. The hall sensor failure mode reinforces the reliability and stability of the pulser driver even when one or more hall sensors fail to function downhole. The pulser continues to operate, eliminating the need to trip. The onboard flash memory can record up to 800 circulation hours.

ProductGallery.Name: Krucial CONNECT

If the cell network fails, satellite takes over. If the power goes down, or mains power isn’t an option, there’s a wide choice of built-in power sources. This is the secure, reliable bridge you need between your enterprise systems and IoT devices.

PressReleases.Name: Spacetech innovator announces rebrand as Krucial
PressReleases.Description:
Satellite-enabled connectivity scale-up R3-IoT has announced a bold, forward-looking full rebrand as Krucial and officially launched its game-changing new flagship product, Krucial CONNECT, to market.

Krucial CONNECT connects IoT devices, such as sensors, to automatically and securely transmit data using LoRaWAN from assets, infrastructure and buildings even from the most remote, hard-to-reach and off-grid sites.

PressReleases.Name: Satellite-enabled connectivity start-up Krucial (formerly R3-IoT) secure £3.1M investment
PressReleases.Description:
Spacetech connectivity start-up, Krucial (formerly R3-IoT) is gearing up for international expansion after closing a £3.1million ($4.3m) seed investment round led by US-based VC Space Capital, joined by the Scottish National Investment Bank.

Other investors include the University of Strathclyde, alongside North American-based Ryan Johnson, former CEO of BlackBridge, Nathan Kundtz, CEO of Rendered.ai, and Loren Padelford, former GM of Revenue at Shopify. Scottish Enterprise also become shareholders and continue to support the company.
