The LISEGA group is the world’s leading specialist for industrial pipe support systems with a product range of more than 16,000 standardized items.

ProductGallery.Name: Constant hangers
ProductGallery.Description: Constant hangers are used for piping and related components where higher levels of vertical travel occur. Their job is to transfer the working load over the whole travel area while keeping it constant, i.e. without any considerable deviations. The functional precision of the constant hangers is decisive for favorable long term behavior of the components involved.

ProductGallery.Name: Spring hangers
ProductGallery.Description: Spring hangers and spring supports are used to balance slight vertical displacements in the pipe system. These components work on the basis of pre-set helical coil springs which exert a variable supporting load over the range of movement in accordance with their specified spring characteristics. Load variations resulting from this are limited through the stress analysis calculations, depending on the sensitivity of the piping.

ProductGallery.Name: Snubbers
ProductGallery.Description: The use of snubbers is preferred in thermally operated plants. In a dynamic event, snubbers instantaneously provide a fixed, practically rigid connection between the component to be secured and the surrounding structure. In this way the dynamic energy from abrupt displacement can be absorbed at once and harmlessly dissipated. The thermal movements during routine operation remain free of any significant resistance thanks to the specialised operating principles of the snubbers.

ProductGallery.Name: Pipe clamps
ProductGallery.Description: Due to the requirements of operating at elevated temperatures, pipe clamps and pipe bearings are the most vulnerable components of the support chains in heat conducting piping. At the same time their surrounding insulation makes regular inspection very difficult. Particular attention must therefore be paid to the design of these critical components.

ProductGallery.Name: Cryoganic supports
ProductGallery.Description: Our complete product range of insulated cryogenic pipe supports is designed to suit all kinds of low temperature pipe systems. These products are normally used in industrial processes for the production, transport and distribution of liquefied gases.

ProductGallery.Name: Threaded connecting elements
ProductGallery.Description: The connections are specially designed components for connecting rods to other support components. They connect components in the load chains with their counterparts, such as lugs, U-bolts or eyelets. Threaded rods connect the support components to each other in order to bridge installation heights. They can be used as rigid supports and in spring-mounted load chains with spring and constant hangers.

ProductGallery.Name: Structural attachments
ProductGallery.Description: Special components for welding or clamping are available for connecting the pipe supports to the supporting structure.

ProductGallery.Description: With an unparalleled fleet of equipment, Mammoet provides safe and cost effective ways of transporting large and heavy objects. Our roots are in transportation, the origins of our company date back to 1807 when a visionary entrepreneur foresaw the increasing demand for the transportation of heavy loads. Since then, Mammoet has developed extensive global expertise in virtually every type of heavy transport, bringing solutions to customers in each major industry around the world.

ProductGallery.Name: Heavy lifting and installation
ProductGallery.Description: Our heavy lifting solutions support clients in every major industrial sector. With a combination of specialized equipment and in-depth, sector-specific engineering experience, we help clients benefit from greater safety and efficiency. Whether it’s a capital project or ongoing maintenance, Mammoet can often find ways of shortening the critical path through carefully planned and executed lifting operations. The result is facilities can come into production on or ahead of schedule, ensuring maximum uptime.

ProductGallery.Name: Marine transport
ProductGallery.Description: Our state-of-the-art equipment, extensive expertise in marine engineering and dedicated team of in-house naval architects, we can offer a complete package of marine and land transportation services, from port to foundation, for any project at any location.

ProductGallery.Name: Load-out and load-in operations
ProductGallery.Description: Mammoet is an authority on the design and development of safe and efficient load-out and load-in systems for a wide range of cargo: modules, platforms, jackets and many more. Our customers can be assured that their components are handled in the safest way, using the best engineering solutions available.

ProductGallery.Name: Sitewide construction solutions
ProductGallery.Description: Large construction projects are highly complex operations. Multiple activities have to be performed by a diverse range of subcontractors, in parallel or in sequence, making it difficult to manage the critical path. The transport and installation of large and heavy components are key to construction schedules, therefore a well planned and executed heavy lifting and and transport operation can deliver efficiencies and cost savings for the entire project.

ProductGallery.Name: Turnarounds / Maintenance
ProductGallery.Description: Mammoet has in-depth experience carrying out heavy lifting and transport work for a range of major industries. Among others, we are known for carrying out world record setting lifts and our engineering innovation. But the real value in partnering with us is that we can optimize lifting and transport services in any given situation – particularly when it comes to maintenance activities that are set up in a way that minimizes downtime.

ProductGallery.Name: Offshore services
ProductGallery.Description: Mammoet’s creative engineering delivers safe and efficient operations for the construction, installation, maintenance and decommissioning of offshore oil and gas facilities around the world.

PressReleases.Name: Smart approach loads-out modules three days early
PressReleases.Description:
2,200t moves engineered in short timeframe, protecting project schedule

Offshore construction specialists Estaleiros do Brasil Ltda. (EBR) needed the load-out of seven modules to be engineered, planned, and executed in the space of just a few weeks. These modules were being built in Brazil destined for FPSO integrations abroad; the challenge was on to have the modules in active production as soon as possible.

PressReleases.Name: Offshore expertise ensures 53,403t loadouts in South Korea
PressReleases.Description: Offshore expertise and exemplary safety management enabled Mammoet to perform the efficient load-out of four modules, weighing a total of 53,403t, for the Johan Sverdrup project in South Korea. Mammoet completed three of the loadouts on the same quay in just two weeks.

PressReleases.Name: Our petrochemical experience in Abu Dhabi
PressReleases.Description: Having worked in Abu Dhabi for five decades, Mammoet has played a part in numerous key projects.

PressReleases.Name: Mammoet supports Qatar LNG Production through an epic 16-Year Program
PressReleases.Description: In 1971, natural gas was discovered in the North Field; a 6,000 sq. km area off the northeast coast of Qatar. Following multiple drilling appraisals, in the mid-1990s Qatar invested to develop its port facilities and associated infrastructure at Ras Laffan, to facilitate the exploration, storage and export of this massive natural gas resource.

Description: Our measuring devices are designed for conductivity measurements in light mineral oils (such as kerosene or Jet A-1) or cutting oil, and listed, certified and approved by ASTM2624. Established in 1914, MSA Safety is the global leader in the development, manufacture and supply of safety products that protect people and facility infrastructures.

Many MSA products integrate a combination of electronics, mechanical systems and advanced materials to protect users against hazardous or life-threatening situations.

MSA's core products include self-contained breathing apparatus, fixed gas and flame detection systems, portable gas detection instruments, industrial head protection products, firefighter helmets and protective apparel, and fall protection devices.

ProductGallery.Name: General Monitors S5000 Gas Monitor
ProductGallery.Description:
The General Monitors S5000 Gas Monitor is the ultimate gas detector for extreme environments needing to detect oxygen, toxic and combustible gases.

It operates over a wide temperature range using a variety of gas sensing technologies. Breakthrough XCell® gas sensors with TruCal® technology extends calibration cycles up to 24 months and actively monitors sensor integrity for ultimate peace of mind.

ProductGallery.Name: ALTAIR io™ 4 Gas Detection Wearable
ProductGallery.Description: The ALTAIR io 4 is a secure, smart gas detector with out-of-the-box connectivity packed into an ultra-rugged design - featuring our XCell sensor platform which continues to lead the industry in lifetime & durability. The ALTAIR io 4 was designed from the ground-up to work seamlessly with the MSA Grid and the ALTAIR io Dock, providing hassle-free compliance, effortless fleet management & incredible visibility into your worker safety that you've never had before.

ProductGallery.Name: M1 SCBA
ProductGallery.Description:
The M1 SCBA  is fully customizable and can be configured to meet a broad range of firefighter needs. Buy per your budget needs and upgrade later – directly in the field.

Overall, the M1 breathing apparatus represents the most advanced, ergonomic and modular SCBA system on the market which was designed and developed side-by-side with ﬁreﬁghters. This all-new breathing apparatus platform includes several innovative and customizable features that help to enhance hygiene and improve comfort.

ProductGallery.Name: LUNAR
ProductGallery.Description:
LUNAR is a handheld, wireless device to help keep a crew connected when it matters most, in the most unpredictable situations.

LUNAR can be used by every firefighter on-scene, on or off air, and is equipped with Firefighting Assisting Search Technology (F.A.S.T), edge detection enhanced thermal imaging and connectivity to provide an “all in one” safety solution.

ProductGallery.Name: Fire Grid
ProductGallery.Description:
FireGrid – a cloud-based software platform easily accessible from anywhere – is a key component of MSA’s Connected Firefighter ecosystem. It helps to improve firefighter safety by collecting smart data to increase a department’s capability for managing products, people, and processes. 

On-scene information is aggregated from products and is available for immediate usage or stored for post-scene data reporting. FireGrid can be used by the incident commander, someone monitoring off-scene remotely, a fleet maintenance manager,

ProductGallery.Name: V-TEC™ Self-Retracting Lifeline
ProductGallery.Description:
With premium  stainless steel components and innovative engineering, the V-TEC Self Retracting Lifeline incorporates a precision-made spring radial energy absorber that requires zero calibration or adjustment.  

The retraction dampening feature controls cable retraction speeds preventing pre-mature and accidental load indicator deployment.

ProductGallery.Name: V-FORM™ Safety Harness
ProductGallery.Description:
The V-FORM™ full body harness allows you to focus on your job - not your harness.

Featuring a patent-pending RaceFORM™ buckle, bulky chest straps are eliminated for a close and comfortable fit. The athletic cut of the V-FORM harness contours to the body improving upper torso movement on the job, while its downward adjusting design allows you to quickly adjust your harness for a fit that lasts throughout the day.

ProductGallery.Name: NEW! V-Gard® C1™ Cooling Hard Hat
ProductGallery.Description:
The V-Gard C1 Hard Hat helps alleviate heat stress for workers in sunny conditions with the MSA-exclusive ReflectIR™ Thermal Barrier technology that keeps the hard hat interior up to 11°C cooler*. This comfortable and durable hard hat is now here to complete your heat stress prevention plan.

*Compared to a hard hat without the ReflectIR Barrier in sunny conditions; testing done with black, non-vented, V-Gard C1 Hard Hats.

ProductGallery.Name: Vertical Lifeline Systems
ProductGallery.Description:
MSA's range of Latchways® Engineered Vertical Lifeline Systems for ladders provide outstanding personal safety for individuals working on any type of fixed tower ladder, industrial ladder. Applications include cranes and silos.

MSA's Latchways Engineered Vertical Lifeline Systems for towers, have the inherent flexibility to be configured for use on virtually any design of power transmission tower.

PressReleases.Name: NNPC Limited Acquires OVH Energy Downstream Assets  …As Company Sets to Become Biggest Petroleum Products Outlets in Africa
PressReleases.Description:
In line with its vision to maintain leading position in the Nigerian petroleum downstream sector, the Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) Limited has acquired OVH Energy Marketing (OVHEM), owner and operator of the Oando downstream assets.

Through this acquisition, NNPC Retail Limited will build on the existing success of OVH and operate model service outlets leveraging OVH’s extensive asset base and commercial capabilities.

PressReleases.Name: Nigeria, Morocco Gas Pipeline Kick Off  ... As NNPC, ONHYM, ECOWAS Sign MoU in Morocco
PressReleases.Description:
The much-awaited Nigeria-Morocco Gas Pipeline (NMGP) Project has officially taken off, following the signing of a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between the two countries and the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) in Rabat, Morocco, on Thursday.
The NMGP is a 5,600km gas pipeline project, traversing 13 African countries, which, when completed, will provide gas from Nigeria to the West African countries through to the Kingdom of Morocco and subsequently to Europe.

ProductGallery.Name: ID5001P Ultrasonic Signaller

ProductGallery.Name: EMRx Onshore Multifrequency Electromagnetic Receiver
ProductGallery.Description: The Online Electronics EMRx Onshore receiver is a robust, state of the art, multi-frequency electromagnetic (EM) receiver used for locating lost or stalled pigs and tracking pigs fitted with any EM pig transmitters.  It can also be used to confirm if a pig has left or arrived at a particular location and for general monitoring of pig movements.

ProductGallery.Name: EMRx Subsea Multifrequency Electromagnetic Receiver
ProductGallery.Description: The EMRx Subsea is a robust, state of the art, multi-frequency, electromagnetic (EM) receiver used for locating lost or stalled pigs and tracking pigs fitted with any EM pig transmitters. ProductGallery.Name: 6000SD Pressure & Temperature Subsea Data Logger

The display can be monitored for any changes by an ROV or diver or changes can be communicated remotely.  Once the test is complete, the log can be downloaded and presented to the client as supporting evidence of the result of the hydrotest.

Density, pressure and temperature data is displayed and logged for later analysis.

Description: Ex / Non-Ex cable gland, junction box, flexible conduit

OsecoElfab is a leading global provider of pressure relief solutions to the chemical processing, petrochemical and pharmaceutical industries. Our purpose is ‘Protecting life. Solutions for a safer, cleaner world.’
Following this purpose, we manufacture rupture discs, explosion vents and burst detection systems that protect people, plant and the environment. Our services include specialist engineering and design, product seminars, site surveys and stock consolidation services. OsecoElfab is part of the FTSE 100 company, the Halma Group.

ProductGallery.Name: Oseco Safety Cartridge
ProductGallery.Description: The Oseco Safety Cartridge combines the traditional three components of a rupture disc system into one hermetically sealed component. The patented welded design guarantees leak protection by completely removing the need to seal your rupture disc within a holder. It provides worry-free installation for your critical applications, while eliminating maintenance complexities, expenses and time requirements. The patented one-piece unit is easier to fit, simpler to inspect and 75% quicker to install than traditional bursting discs.

ProductGallery.Name: LoKr
ProductGallery.Description: The LoKr rupture disc's advanced design delivers a best-in-class Flow Resistance Factor (FRF), or KR value, to maximize pressure relieving performance while providing superior reliability and extraordinary service life. The dimple design supports full-bore opening with exceptionally accurate burst ratings to support operational efficiency, especially at low flow rates. The disc's architecture has been refined and optimized, making it suitable for the widest range of pressures, temperatures, and line sizes possible.

ProductGallery.Name: Opti-Gard
ProductGallery.Description: This high-performance reverse acting rupture disc acts as a single disc solution to support a reduction in stock costs. Performing equally well with liquid, gas or vapour, Opti-Gard is the ideal multi-purpose pressure relief solution. It is non-fragmenting and can be used alone or in combination with a safety valve. Opti-Gard can reduce stock holdings by up to 65%, offering significant cost savings with reduced variance in inventory and installation, without affecting quality.

ProductGallery.Name: Flo-Tel
ProductGallery.Description: Flo-Tel offers a practical, reusable solution for detecting when a rupture disc has functioned. Flo-Tel is non-invasive to the process and is therefore unaffected by downstream pressure fluctuations or corrosion. This feature also eliminates leak paths and the risk of false alarms associated with traditional membrane-type detection systems. After rupturing, the disc is the only element that needs replacing, which eliminates the need for expensive re-wiring costs and maintenance planning.

PressReleases.Name: Oseco and Elfab combine forces to create global pressure safety business
PressReleases.Description: Oseco and Elfab have combined forces to capitalise on joint strengths, offering turnkey pressure relief solutions and services worldwide. The combined company is named OsecoElfab. Oseco, based in Oklahoma in the USA, and Elfab, based in Newcastle upon Tyne in the UK, have merged to better serve global customers and offer an expanded product portfolio. Companies requiring pressure safety products will benefit from a wider choice of solutions, expedited logistics, and greater local support.

PressReleases.Name: OsecoElfab launches Oseco Safety Cartridge in Europe
PressReleases.Description: In March 2021, OsecoElfab released the Oseco Safety Cartridge to the EEA and UK markets. The innovative, welded rupture disc cartridge solves several problems associated with pressure safety in chemical processing plants. By uniting the bursting disc with the holder in a one-piece, welded design,  the cartridge solves the top three reported problems associated with the use of rupture discs: installation difficulties, leaking, and the need for specialist knowledge for correct installation and maintenance.

PressReleases.Name: New rupture disc design improves process performance and efficiency
PressReleases.Description: OsecoElfab launches the technically advanced LoKr reverse rupture disk for chemical process and petrochemical plants. The new disk design delivers a best-in-class Flow Resistance Factor, or KR, to maximize pressure relieving performance while providing superior reliability and extraordinary service life. The disk's architecture improves performance in three areas: keeping pressure drops in relief lines to a minimum, providing maximum reliability and accuracy, and being suitable for the widest range of pressures, temperatures, and line sizes.

2009 Frost & Sullivan Award Winning sensor simultaneously measure strain and temperature along the entire fiber length with high-resolution. By wrapping or embedding standard telecom fiber inside a power lines/pipeline, users can detect when & where the structures is being strained or heated and correct the problem before failure occurs. It is ideal for monitoring pipelines or power lines. The sensor could also be used in detecting fire and corrosion/erosion.

PressReleases.Name: Fiber Optic Distributed Strain and Temperature Sensors (DSTS)
PressReleases.Description: OZ Optics’ Foresight™ series of fiber optic Distributed Strain and Temperature Sensors (DSTS) BOTDA modules are sophisticated sensor systems using stimulated Brillouin scattering in optical fibers to measure changes in both strain and temperature along the length of an optical fiber. By deploying a sensing cable that includes standard telecom single mode fiber, users can detect when and where the strain or the temperature of the object has changed and correct potential problems before failure

PressReleases.Name: Fiber Optic Distributed Strain and Temperature Sensors (DSTS)
PressReleases.Description: OZ Optics’ ForeSight™ family of fiber optic Brillouin distributed strain and temperature sensors (DSTS) are sophisticated optical sensor systems employing Brillouin scattering. Distributed sensing provides a direct method of measuring the changes in strain and temperature along the entire length of an optical fiber. A new BOTDR (Brillouin Optical Time Domain Reflectometer) module based on spontaneous Brillouin scattering is now available.

PressReleases.Name: Fiber Optic Distributed Strain and Temperature Sensors (DSTS)
PressReleases.Description: OZ Optics’ ForeSight™ family of fiber optic Brillouin distributed strain and temperature sensors (DSTS) are sophisticated optical sensor systems employing Brillouin scattering. Distributed sensing provides a direct method of measuring the changes in strain and temperature along the entire length of an optical fiber. A new unit combining BOTDA (Brillouin Optical Time Domain Analyzer) and BOTDR (Brillouin Optical Time Domain Reflectometer) capabilities is now available.

PressReleases.Name: Fiber Optic Distributed Temperature Sensors (B-DTS)
PressReleases.Description:
OZ Optics’ Foresight™ family of fiber optic Brillouin distributed temperature sensors (B-DTS) are sophisticated optical sensor systems
employing stimulated Brillouin scattering. Distributed sensing provides a direct method of measuring changes in temperature along the
entire length of an optical fiber. Maximum sensing length utilizing
Brillouin analysis is 100 km, a significant improvement over Raman

Description: PAMAS develops, manufactures, distributes, services and maintains liquid particle counters for fluid contamination control, filter testing and component testing.

ProductGallery.Name: PAMAS SBSS WG
ProductGallery.Description:
Within the oil&gas sector, hydraulic fluid cleanliness is
reported in compliance with the cleanliness standards
SAE AS 4059 and NAS 1638. The PAMAS SBSS WG
is also delivered with three pre-installed channels
settings. With this feature, the user is able to select the
required cleanliness standard for the report of
measurement results.

ProductGallery.Name: PAMAS S4031 GO WG
ProductGallery.Description: The PAMAS S4031 WG and PAMAS S4031 GO WG portable units are designed for mobile analysis of waterglycol fluids and can be used directly on-site. In the offshore oil&gas sector, hydraulic systems are usually operating using biologically degradable hydraulic fluids, as these cause less harm than oil-based hydraulic fluids, if they accidentally flow into sea water. The further benefit of PAMAS portable particle counters is their ability to measure both offline and online.

ProductGallery.Name: PAMAS FastPatch 2GO
ProductGallery.Description: The PAMAS FastPatch 2 GO is used within the oil&gas sector when microscopic analysis according to ISO 4407 is requested. The microscope measures particles which were filtered in beforehand through a membrane patch.

Description: Manufacture of Downhole Tools for Wireline Intervention

Paradigm Group was established in The Netherlands 2009, to develop & commercialize new technologies & innovations for the upstream Oil & Gas Industry. With a broad width of market participation, consisting of four specialisms.

Drilling Optimization| Production Efficiency |Well Intervention |Fire Protection.

Each area of expertise boasts unique technologies supported by strong Intellectual Property positions. Even in this challenging business climate, an aggressive R&D effort continues including joint development partnerships with major O&G operators.

ProductGallery.Name: Revolution Series
ProductGallery.Description:
The Revolution Series tools is reengineered, redesigned and redefined and celebrates our ability to tackle any drilling requirement. They are more efficient and focused than ever before - paving the way to further cost reductions and
highly optimized drilling operations.

ProductGallery.Name: Driver®
ProductGallery.Description:
The Driver® meets the challenges that these demands place on the drilling process by:

- Providing active downhole traction and torque reduction
- Reducing lateral and axial vibration in the lower drilling assembly
- Maintain controlled weight on bit
- Reducing compressive buckling in the lower drill string
- Generating downhole tension
- Reducing the risk of Stick-Slip through constant motion

ProductGallery.Name: Reamer®
ProductGallery.Description: Paradigm Drilling's Reamer® tools have been designed to offer all the performance benefits of a Roller Reamer – (Low torque “point stabilization”) 75-80% less contact area compared to conventional stabilizer, capability to remove micro dog legs / ledges and torque reduction with the use of Domed Diamond Inserts (DDI) technology.

ProductGallery.Name: Runner®
ProductGallery.Description: Paradigm Drilling's Runner® have been designed by Paradigm Drilling Services as a solution to the problem of excessive drill string torque often encountered in formations with high friction factors, short radius well designs, as well as high angle and horizontal wells.

ProductGallery.Name: Extreamer®
ProductGallery.Description: Paradigm’s Extreamer® is a hydraulically activated expandable reaming tool that can be used to increase hole size while drilling ahead or after a pilot hole has been drilled. The tool can withstand high side loads often seen in highly deviated wells, however, the three blocks close when pumps are stopped to ensure clean retrieval from the wellbore.

ProductGallery.Name: Rebel®
ProductGallery.Description: Paradigm Drilling's Rebel® is designed specifically to enhance cuttings bed removal in horizontal or highly deviated wells and is part of an ongoing development process based on knowledge learned from over 500 ERD wells around the world.

PressReleases.Name: Paradigm's All-Electric Winches contribute to Operational Performance Seafarer
PressReleases.Description:
It was nice to hear AKOFS’ Magne Nygard, Vice President of Projects & Technology, speak at OWI Europe recently about their operational performance with the Seafarer Vessel. As supplier of the four all-electric double drum wireline units, we’re proud to be playing a small part in enabling their success, whilst helping drive down CO2 emissions with the e-Winch® technology.

With an average of 6.5 days per well, and completing work on 52 wells during 2021 alone, the efficiencies and CO2 reductions are beginning to stack up. Congratulations to Archer (Deepwell), AKOFS, and thanks to the Paradigm Team.

PressReleases.Name: Paradigm Flow Services Appoint Managing Director to Accelerate Growth.
PressReleases.Description:
Paradigm Flow Services (Aberdeen, UK), a global player in flow remediation technologies, has appointed Ryan Sangster as Managing Director of its business.

Ryan will focus on the commercialization of Paradigm Flow Services Production Enhancement technologies and their target markets on a global scale, based out of their Aberdeen office.

Ryan has over 20 year’s experience in the industry including roles with GE Oil and Gas, DES Operations, OneSubsea, Proserv, and Enpro Subsea. Ryan brings a wealth of subsea engineering and operations experience and is particularly adept with business development, sales and growing businesses that are in scale up mode.

Commenting on his appointment, Ryan said he is “excited” to be joining the Group and is eager to begin this new challenge. “I’ve been aware of and worked with some of the Paradigm team in the past. I’ve always admired how they have adapted technologies to suit the needs of the customer. Not afraid to scale back to the drawing board for a better, more cost-effective, and often safer and greener outcome. It’s refreshing, I’m looking forward to being a part of it.”

Paradigm Group’s CEO Julian Manning added, “The Flow Services team has experienced a period of distinct growth in the past year. Ryan’s global network and knowledge combined with his entrepreneurial spirit and drive, will bring strength and depth to our growth ambitions. This key appointment will allow us to implement our production enhancement technologies in solving operational challenges for our customers. Ryan Sangster can be contacted via the Paradigm Flow Services Offices in Inverurie, Aberdeen. To find out more about Paradigm Group and their services please contact info@paradigm.eu

PressReleases.Name: Slick-E-Line® System, branded Real-time Slickline (RtS) by Altus Intervention Ltd, sets a world record
PressReleases.Description:
Paradigm’s Slick-E-Line® System, branded Real-time Slickline (RtS) by Altus Intervention Ltd, sets a world record for the longest real-time acquisition of multi finger calliper (MIT40) data on mechanical slickline.

In both a world and region first, Altus Intervention logged a record 10,880ft continuous section using a forty finger calliper on Paradigm’s Slick-E-Line® System, the first operation of its kind in the European region.

Paradigm and Altus Intervention have successfully collaborated to deploy Real-time Slickline (Slick-E-Line® System) for multi finger calliper logging across multiple wells, for both well integrity analysis and suitable joint selection for barrier placement as part of an abandonment campaign. Cumulatively, 19,920ft of multi-finger calliper was logged on the platform during the campaign. Furthermore, all mechanical slickline runs prior to running the calliper were undertaken utilizing the Slick-E-Line® System, as well as all subsequent electro-mechanical plug setting operations, with correlation and plug setting utilizing the Slick-E-Line® System’s high frequency CCL, pressure, temperature and vibration sensors as part of the assets permanent abandonment strategy. Performing all operations with a single unit brought the added advantage of having to mobilize only one unit offshore. This achievement marks a world first for the market-leading intervention company, Altus Intervention, and Paradigm’s premiere digital slickline technology, Slick-E-Line®.

William Ash, Paradigm’s Well Intervention business Managing Director explains, “Our Slick-E-Line® System offers a cost-effective way to log the multi finger calliper (MIT40) with real-time motor control and real-time acquisition confidence. Active collaboration with our technology’s end user, Altus Intervention, in conjunction with their first class operational execution has delivered this world first in data driven decisions from a slickline footprint.”

Frankie Calder, VP Logging & Well Intervention Technologies, Altus Intervention UK continues, “Our relationship with Paradigm has given us the ability to offer our client the opportunity of data confidence, fast decision making and accurate barrier placement, saving a significant amount of operational time and cost. All from a slickline spread. It was a win win win solution for all!”

Ash concludes, “This collaboration has highlighted the power of the Slick-E-Line® System to deliver real-time surface readout data over a slickline conveyance system, ultimately driving quicker and more accurate decision making for the realization of more efficient operations.”

For all enquiries, please mail intervention@paradigm.eu or expert.uk@altusintervention.com, or visit paradigm.eu or altusintervention.com for more information

PressReleases.Name: Paradigm Group Promotes Technical Director of Drilling Ahead of Major Growth in Sales
PressReleases.Description:
Paradigm Drilling Services (Aberdeen, UK) has promoted Adam Bennett to Technical Director of Drilling for the Group. The promotion supports an expanded global uptake of its drilling technologies.

Commenting on the promotion, PDS Managing Director Kevin Langan comments, “Adam has made a significant contribution to our drilling technologies and services in the relatively short time he has been with Paradigm. After little over a year, Adam’s tenacious approach to communicating our technologies and benefits to our client base, on a global scale, has encouraged significant growth.

Bennett adds, “I am delighted to have been promoted to Technical Director of Drilling at Paradigm, I recognise the operational efficiencies that our products and services offer to our clients and can see the time and money we save.”

Bennett continues, “I’m fortunate to have a career that has served me a broad skill set in the oilfield industry, including experience in operations and engineering jobs in Saudi Arabia, Norway and the US. This experience has enabled me to see all sides of operational projects and where technology really can be used to troubleshoot projects.”

Langan concludes, “As we continue to expand our technologies with a focus on reducing carbon emissions, we have Adam at the forefront investigating how we can offer more cost-effective drilling solutions for our clients.”

Adam can be contacted via the Paradigm Drilling Team in Inverurie, Aberdeen. To find out more about Paradigm Group and their services please contact info@paradigm.eu

PressReleases.Name: Paradigm Group Appoints Product Line Director for their Well Intervention Technologies
PressReleases.Description:
Paradigm Group (Aberdeen, UK) has promoted Arthur Merrick to Product Line Director for their Well Intervention Technologies. The promotion supports an expanded global uptake of its well intervention technologies.

Commenting on the promotion, CEO Julian Manning comments, “Arthur has made significant contribution to our well intervention technologies, and we truly value him being part of our leadership team. Promoting Arthur was the next step in further expanding our customer reach whilst leading the implementation of our well intervention technologies into global markets”.

Merrick adds, “I am passionate about the operational efficiencies that Paradigm’s products and services offer to the industry and very happy to be given the opportunity to lead the Well Intervention segment”.

Merrick concludes, “As we continue expand our technologies to accommodate more tooling and applications, we have a greater than ever focus on reducing operational carbon emissions for end users. This is driven from maximizing operational efficiencies to take out time, cost, and resource during all types of well intervention campaigns. Making a true difference in these areas is what excites me about my new role.”

Arthur can be contacted via the Paradigm Well Intervention Offices in Inverurie, Aberdeen. To find out more about Paradigm Group and their services please contact info@paradigm.eu

PressReleases.Name: Paradigm Drilling Services Appoint Vice President of Business Development
PressReleases.Description:
Paradigm Drilling Services (Aberdeen, UK) has appointed Jim Profit as VP of Business Development to further accelerate its impact on the global oil, gas, and geothermal drilling markets.

Jim brings with him 20+ years Oil and Gas experience, both locally and internationally. Specializing in technology and monitoring systems to improve well operations both on and offshore, in various BD sales director, country manager and VP sales roles with firms including Ulterra, Reed Hycalog, Salunda and NOV. He brings experience from working and living in varied geo-markets including North America, Europe, West Africa, Middle East, and APAC. Through his experience, Jim has honed an impressive sales track record, and business development style, which Paradigm intend to flourish further in line with their growth plans.

Mr Profit said he is “delighted” to be joining the firm, having spent most of his career executing commercial sales strategy. “With a conscientious, high clock speed, hunter mentality, I want to be part of a downhole tool company that adds real, tangible value to drilling operations which is in turn supported by an intuitive, service orientated team. It is speed and simplicity that brings value in today’s oil field and Paradigm aligns perfectly with these standards.”

Managing Director, Kevin Langan, said: “Jim joins us at an important inflection point as we accelerate the growth of our global business. I am very pleased to see Jim join our Paradigm Drilling Services team as the Vice President of Business Development at such a crucial point in our growth journey. Jim’s initial port of call will be to communicate our improved and emerging technologies that need globalising.”

Mr Langan concludes, “We are excited for Jim to share his extensive knowledge of drilling issues and how to solve them with our customers, and his international experience will benefit the company immensely in the adoption of our value-added technologies through new and existing customers partnerships.”

Jim can be contacted via the Paradigm Drilling Services Offices in Inverurie, Aberdeen. To find out more about Paradigm Group and their services please contact info@paradigm.eu

PressReleases.Name: Strategic Alliance for Paradigm Drilling Services and ProGroup in Middle East
PressReleases.Description:
Paradigm Drilling Services, part of the Paradigm Group headquartered in Rotterdam, Holland, have announced their strategic alliance with UAE oil service company ProGroup MENA to manage sales and rentals across the Middle East. The agreement will see ProGroup MENA exclusively managing supply, sales and rental of Paradigm Drilling products and services in the region as business and demand grows.

Kevin Langan, Managing Director at Paradigm Drilling Services comments, “This strategic relationship strengthens our relations in the Middle East, allowing mutual growth opportunities for both us and ProGroup. Our product line and outlook for growth also compliments our partner which we are confident adds leverage to our offering”.

Given the challenging times we are still in, we are responding to the need for companies to keep operating costs down and the requirements to reduce carbon contributions where possible. For this reason, we are also very happy to partner with ProGroup because we share a vision that innovation and technology are the answer to making this possible. For example, our Rebel® tool has been developed to increase cleaning efficiency in drilling operations which results in reduced production time. We are continuously looking at ways in which we can develop our technologies to pass on these cost savings where possible”.

ProGroup MENA’s Managing Director, Mohamed Galal comments, “What attracted us most to partnering with Paradigm Group was, the durability and reliability of their downhole tools and their overall knowledge and appreciation of the market in this region. Paradigm’s solution-based ethos of reducing total operating costs entirely fits within ProGroup’s way of business operations. We strive to provide our clients with the best value and are always looking to improve our offering”.

Langan concludes, “ProGroup has a considerable client network and well-respected reputation in the region, so we are confident we can bring new and exciting opportunities to our existing and new client base”.

For more information about Paradigm’s products and services in the Middle East, please contact ProGroup MENA’s, Mohamed Galal or visit http://progroupmena.com

Description: PGI offers tailor made products & services such as Gas Treatment and Regulating systems, Oil & Gas Metering Solutions, CNG Refueling Stations, Skid mounted systems, Valves, Gas Regulators, Pressure Vessels, Direct and Indirect Heat Exchangers, Filters, Cyclone Separators, Quick Open Closures, Water Bath Heaters, Sludge Catchers, Knock-Out Drums, Insulation Joints, Relief Valves, and related accessories for energy industry. PGI provides professional services such as design, engineering, procurement, manufacturing, construction of energy infrastructure since 1995.

ProductGallery.Name: PRESSURE REGULATING &  METERING STATION  ( PRMS)
ProductGallery.Description:
PGI is a supplier of bespoke PRMS systems, tailored to the precise requirements of our customers. Our skid mounted solutions incorporate all major, primary flow elements, including; ultrasonic, turbine, orifice, positive displacement meters to meet clients’ preferences, but also ensure the most economical solutions. 

The stations utilized in transmission lines: 
• Border Stations
• City Gate Stations 
• Gas Fired Power Plant Stations 

The stations utilized in distribution lines: 
• Industrial Stations 
• Residential District

ProductGallery.Name: CYCLONE SEPARATORS
ProductGallery.Description: PGI cyclone separators are the most suitable answer to liquid and dry gas impurities. They are used both at wellhead and at inlet to compression station, in distribution systems and in many other industrial processes. Even at the presence of wide flow rate variations, they have a very high efficiency of filtration.

ProductGallery.Name: DRY GAS FILTERS
ProductGallery.Description: PGI offers customized dry gas filter separators based on project requirement with a variety of fabrication options; size, capacity, material type, wall thickness and corrosion allowance. Dry gas filter separators can be manufactured horizontally and vertically, and certified in accordance with ASME Section VIII, Division 1.

ProductGallery.Name: HIGH INTEGRITY PRESSURE PROTECTION SYSTEMS
ProductGallery.Description:
The High Integrity Pressure Protection System is a sophisticated, safety instrumented system for pressurized vessels or stations in plants, which PGI designs and manufactures in-house. ​
 
Such systems are sometimes requested where use of a pressure relief device is either impractical or simply not permitted, due to environmental reasons. The HIPPS design ensures that the high-pressure source of the fluid shut down before the design pressure of the local system is surpassed.

ProductGallery.Name: COALESCER FILTERS
ProductGallery.Description: PGI in-house coalescing filter-separators are multi-stage separator that provides maximum solid and liquid removal. The primary stage of separation is designed for removal of large particulate and liquid loads through gravitational and centrifugal force. If a high solid or liquid load (slugging) is present, additional separation internals are available to provide bulk removal and extend the life of the coalescing element.

ProductGallery.Name: HEAT EXCHANGERS
ProductGallery.Description: In the gas pressure reduction/regulation process, temperature decrease considerably (Joule Thomson Effect), and this can cause damage due to formation of "ice" produced by water wapor in the gas. Natural gas has to be heated before pressure reduction. PGI’s tube bundle heat exchangers can be used with natural gas, air, propane or any other non-corrosive gas for that purpose.

ProductGallery.Name: WATER BATH HEATERS
ProductGallery.Description:
PGI's indirect gas heater consist mainly of fire-tubes enclosing burners and a tube bundle containing gas to be heated.  

 Applications

• Gas heating in gathering lines to prevent stoppage due to hydrates.
• High viscosity fuels heating to reduce pumping pressures, thereby increasing pipeline capacities.
• Gas heating at city gas take-offs from main gas pipelines.
• High pressure gas and/or oil heating in oilfield production.

ProductGallery.Name: PRESSURE CONTROL SKIDS
ProductGallery.Description:
Natural Gas pressure control systems are one of the most critical parts of natural gas networks. They are used in city gates, factories, public buildings, by the roadside and even in our homes. ​ 

PGI has designed, manufactured and commissioned more than 150 units of medium to high pressure control systems and more than 1500 units of district, medium pressure control stations.

ProductGallery.Name: ANALYZER SYSTEMS
ProductGallery.Description: PGI designs gas analyzer systems, ranging from a single gas chromotograph, up to a fully developed system that may include moisture measurement, hydrocarbon dew point measurement, H2S and sulphur content analysis, O2 content, specific gravity or density measurement.

ProductGallery.Name: JETTY LOADING-OFFLOADING SYSTEMS
ProductGallery.Description:
PGI can provide types of skids for liquid metering that are typically designed for batching, rather than continuous operation, as required on ship loading or unloading facilities, such as jetties.

The difficulty in the design of such integrated systems lies in the complexity of typical jetty projects, due to the specifications approximating offshore design and the rather strict constraints regarding space and weight of any installed equipment.

ProductGallery.Name: PLEUGER Submersible Pump
ProductGallery.Description:
PLEUGER submersible pumps, also known as deep well pumps, are durable and 
maintenance-free products that meet all performance requirements in the oil and 
gas industries. Next to units in standard configuration, PLEUGER also offers 
custom-made units to ensure the highest level of operational reliability and 
performance in all applications even under the most difficult conditions. Available 
from 6"-50", water-filled motors as standard, oil-filled motors on request, power 
output 0.37 kW - 5 MW.

ProductGallery.Name: PLEUGER Bottom Intake Pump
ProductGallery.Description: Pleuger Bottom Intake Pump units are single or multi-stage centrifugal pumps, which are coupled with water-filled motors. The motor is arranged above the pump in a special bypass shroud and the pump intake is located in the lower part of the unit. The design allows to reduce the water line to a very low level. Bottom intake pump units are designed for vertical or slightly inclined installation.

ProductGallery.Name: PLEUGER Booster Pump
ProductGallery.Description:
Pleuger’s booster pump units are equipped with booster casings and are 
integrated horizontally or vertically into the system to increase pressure in the

ProductGallery.Description:
The ALDRICH Reciprocating Pump range includes vertical and horizontal plunger pumps that meet the highest performance requirements. These high-performance, positive displacement pumps are designed for high loads and reliability, delivering a constant volume flow regardless of pressure.
The ALDRICH product line provides maximum operating flexibility and is available in horizontal and vertical configurations and customer-specific materials. ALDRICH Pumps are engineered individually to meet the application's actual performance and installation requirements while reducing maintenance costs.

ProductGallery.Name: ALDRICH Aftermarket Services & Spare Parts
ProductGallery.Description: ALDRICH reciprocating pumps with relationship-driven service and exceptional subject matter expertise, delivered around your needs. The ALDRICH support services cover all aspects of support and consultancy that might be needed during your installation's life cycle. ALDRICH Pumps are designed for extended service life, often running for decades. If you need spare parts for your ALDRICH product or system, you can obtain these quickly anywhere in the world.

Description: Prisma Photonics helps keep the most critical large-scale infrastructure up and running using advanced Hyper-Scan Optic Fiber-Sensing™ technology. With easy deployment, utilizing the existing optical fiber laid along the infrastructure, our monitoring solutions are effective on the installation day, providing a quantum leap in assets protection. We enable pipeline operators to accurately monitor their transmission lines for hundreds and thousands of kilometers in real-time without installing additional sensors - 24×7, anywhere, anytime, in any condition.

ProductGallery.Name: PrismaFlow Appliance
ProductGallery.Description: PrismaFlow appliance connects to one single dark fiber at a substation, sensing the entire pipeline. PrismaFlow’s machine learning algorithms take the detailed data collected on the pipe to detect and classify events, pinpointing them to exact locations in real-time. As a result, alerts have unprecedented accuracy – removing the nuisance of false alarms.​

ProductGallery.Name: PrismaFlow Use Cases
ProductGallery.Description:
Leak Detection

3rd Party Intrusion:
Illegal tapping (Theft)
Mechanical digging
Manual digging
Pedestrian activity
Vehicle movement

Inline pigging devices
Ground movement

ProductGallery.Name: PrismaFlow Solution Architecture
ProductGallery.Description:
For many years, transmission pipeline operators have deployed fiber optic cables along their pipelines. PrismaFlow turns the existing optical fiber into a set of highly sensitive distributed sensors extending for hundreds and thousands of kilometers.
Each unit covers 100km of pipeline, concentrating all the information and alerts into one command and control center. This way, PrismaFlow can continue scaling with the pipeline system.

ProductGallery.Name: AIR RELEASE & VACUUM BREAKER VALVE
ProductGallery.Description: There is two critical time in the operation of a pipeline. During filling, air occupied in the empty pipe must be evacuated ahead of the incoming liquid in a controlled and efficient manner so that surge and water hammer can be minimized and liquid can completely be filled in the pipe.

ProductGallery.Name: SURGE RELIEF VALVE
ProductGallery.Description: SRV is installed in the place that require fast responding performance to protect the piping system from the surge(water hammer) by sudden flow change and pump sudden stop. Model SRV-PH consists of a main valve, solenoid valve, and N2 bottle, which is completely assembled and tested as a unit and ready for field installation. Main Valve is closed tightly when normal operation is in state.

ProductGallery.Name: BREATHER VALVE (PRESSURE & VACUUM RELIEF VALVE)
ProductGallery.Description: The model BV/BS pressure/vacuum relief valves designed, manufactured and tested according to the API 2000 standard. The model BV/BS pressure/vacuum relief valves are used to relieve excess pressure and vacuum that has developed in a tank. To avoid product loss, BV/BS pressure vacuum relief valves are recommended for use on atmospheric storage tank.

ProductGallery.Name: FLAME ARRESTER
ProductGallery.Description: The flame arrester is designed to prevent flame transmission when flammable gas/air- or vapor/air-mixtures are presented. The model FA in-line flame arrester is designed, manufactured and tested according to API 2000, EN 12874 and ISO 16852. Body material of arrester is available for nodular cast iron, cast steel, stainless steel grade 304, 316, 316L and special alloy steel for chemical resistance.

ProductGallery.Name: Breather Valve Pilot Operated Type
ProductGallery.Description: Pressure and/or Vacuum Relief valves are used for dangerous oil, gas or petrochemical storage tanks and other process vessels or systems to prevent structural damage due to excess pressure or vacuum incoming. Pilot-operated Pressure/Vacuum Relief Valve is the most suitable for pipe line where high or fluctuating back pressure. Pilot operation is also recommended for equipment to be used when low accumulation rates are required.

ProductGallery.Name: EMERGENCY VENT COVER
ProductGallery.Description: Emergency Pressure Relief Valve is designed to provide emergency relief capacity beyond the normal operating pressure relief valve on the tank. The valve helps protects the tank against rupture or internal pressures caused by fire exposure and other emergency events. It is designed to be self-closing, while Groth’s special fluoropolymer cushioned air pallet and peripheral guiding insures proper alignment and integrity of seating.

ProductGallery.Name: PROTEGO®  Detonation Flame Arrester
ProductGallery.Description: The in-line detonation flame arresters type PROTEGO® DA-SB are the newest generation of flame arresters. Based on flow and explosion dynamic calculations as well as decades of field tests, a product line was developed that offers minimum pressure losses with maximum safety.

ProductGallery.Name: PROTEGO® Floating Suction Unit
ProductGallery.Description: PROTEGO® Floating Suction Units, FSU, are used in storage tanks with very high purity requirements of the substances, e.g., aviation or fossil fuels. They are designed to ensure that product in a storage tank is drawn off just below the surface of the liquid where it is cleanest. This prevents the settled water and residuals at the bottom of the tank from being sucked in.

ProductGallery.Name: PROTEGO® Pressure and Vacuum Relief Valve
ProductGallery.Description: The VD/SV type PROTEGO® valve is a highly developed pressure and vacuum relief valve with excellent flow performance. Typically, the valve is installed in the in-breathing and out-breathing lines of tanks, vessels, and process equipment to protect against unallowable overpressure and underpressure. The valve prevents emission losses almost up to the set pressure and prevents air intake almost up to the set vacuum.

ProductGallery.Name: Pressure/Vacuum Relief Valve atmospheric deflagration-proof
ProductGallery.Description: The atmospheric deflagration-proof VD/TS type PROTEGO® valve is a highly developed combined pressure/vacuum relief valve for high flow capacities with an integrated flame arrester unit. It is primarily used as a device for flame transmission proof in-breathing and out-breathing on tanks, containers, and process equipment. The valve offers reliable protection against overpressure and vacuum, prevents the in-breathing of air and product losses almost up to the set pressure, and protects against atmospheric deflagration.

ProductGallery.Name: PROTEGO® Pilot-operated Pressure/Vacuum Relief Valve
ProductGallery.Description: The PROTEGO® Type VN-A-PCPF pilot-controlled diaphragm valve is a newly developed valve for pressure and vacuum relief. It is primarily used as a device for out-breathing in tanks, containers, and process equipment. It provides protection against vacuum and overpressure and prevents the intake of air and unallowable product vapor loss up to the set pressure.

ProductGallery.Name: PROTEGO® Deflagration Flame Arrester
ProductGallery.Description: The PROTEGO® FA-E series of in-line deflagration flame arresters is designed with an eccentric housing to automatically drain condensate build up in the housing. Due to its eccentric design, the device can be installed in pipelines that run close to floors or walls and low points to prevent the build-up of condensate.

ProductGallery.Name: Choke Valve
ProductGallery.Description: Choke Valves are control devices, mostly used in Oil & Gas production wells to control the flow of well fluids being produced. They allow the fluid to flow through a customized trim to optimize and regulate the well production. QUAM’s Choke Valves are available with fully-customized multistage trims, designed to handle the most critical process conditions and severe service in high pressure and high temperature applications.

ProductGallery.Name: HIPPS
ProductGallery.Description: HIPPS (High Integrity Pressure Protection Systems) are SIL-3 or SIL-4 -certified Systems used to protect downstream equipment against overpressure or upset conditions coming from the Upstream. The complete system is fully internally engineered and certified: it is composed of QUAM’s Gate Valves, QUAM’s actuator and QUAM’s control system and it is designed to open against full differential pressure. QUAM designs and manufactures two HIPPS models: the electronic one and the mechanical one.

ProductGallery.Name: Gate Valve
ProductGallery.Description: Gate Valves are on/off devices that open and close the flow of a fluid through a pipe. They typically have a linear movement, perpendicular to flow direction. This kind of valves have excellent shut-off characteristics. One of the main applications of these valves is for Safety function. QUAM’s SSV (Surface Safety Valve) is used to protect downstream equipment against abnormal flowline pressure conditions. These valves are suitable to be installed on remote locations.

Description: REMBE® is a safety specialist in explosion safety and pressure relief. The independent family enterprise, founded in 1973, employs a global workforce of around 340. It provides customers in all industries with safety systems for their plants and equipment. All products are made in Germany and meet the requirements of national and international regulations. Its most important proprietary products and processes include the KUB® reverse acting buckling pin rupture disc and flameless venting technology.

ProductGallery.Name: Rupture Disc KUB®
ProductGallery.Description:
The KUB® is the only rupture disc to be manufactured
using Euler's critical load formula to determine the
burst pressure, creating the most robust,
highperformance rupture disc available. Unlike other
rupture disc solutions where a weak point is created in
the metal, the KUB® is a unique, highly engineered
solution, benefiting from a series of buckling pins which
accurately collapse for reliable, full bore, opening.

ProductGallery.Name: Rupture Disc ODV
ProductGallery.Description:
The ODV is a triple-section, forward acting, rupture
disc design suitable for a range of low to medium
pressure applications. This cost-effective solution
comprises three rupture disc elements, a top section
burst element, a sealing membrane and an integrated
vacuum support, ensuring superior performance and
durability across a wide range of process conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: Rupture Disc IKB®
ProductGallery.Description:
Suitable for a wide range of process conditions, the
IKB® is a cost- effective, reverse acting rupture disc
that is suitable for a variety of applications. A truly
versatile solution to meet the needs of your entire
plant, the IKB® was specifically designed to provide
reliable protection against overpressure across an
extensive range of industries in equipment such as
pressure vessels, piping systems, gas cylinders and
reactors among others.

Address: Via Lancetti 43 - Palazzo B, Scala 1, 4° piano
Description: REPCo is a comprehensive multisystem end-to-end process design house, able to provide in-house facilities that cover the wide process engineering needs of Multi-gas industries, all under one roof. Based in Milan, it offers stand-alone equipment and modular process plants for energy and power project of any size. In particular, it covers the design, supply and start-up site support of packaged gas, oil and power related systems, together with associated equipment for the international marketplace.

Resato is a Dutch provider of smart high pressure solutions with the aim to increase the productivity of its worldwide customers. We develop and manufacture waterjet cutting systems as well as components and systems for testing, injection, and controlling up to 14,000 bars with the mission to meet and exceed the expectations of our customers.

Resinex is one of the world leaders in the marine equipment industry. We design and produce in Italy every kind of floating equipment and we have a 60 years experience in the Oil and Gas field. We produce and supplie buoys to the major players in the market supporting them in the realization of important projects of global resonance.

ProductGallery.Name: Catamaran Mooring Buoy
ProductGallery.Description:
A catamaran buoy is a mooring buoy, patented by Resinex at the end of 80’, designed with a unique leverage system (Multi-Lever System) that balance the ship mooring tension so that the buoy always mantains a perfect horizontal position.

The modular composition of Resinex catamaran buoys allows the creation of huge floating platforms that guarantee an excellent stability even in extreme sea conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: Tie-in float
ProductGallery.Description:
Pipe deployment floats, the so-called “tie-in”, are used to support the weight of pipes during the launch of a pipeline. It is possible to combine the modules in order to obtain buoys with different buoyancies.

Buoys can be fixed on pipes with different types of straps according to necessity: steel straps, steel and textile straps, special plastic material straps.

ProductGallery.Name: Anti-Pollution Booms and Anti-Intrusion Barriers
ProductGallery.Description: Resinex booms are usually used for containment and retrieval operations in case of spillage of hydrocarbons, for solid floating wastes, seaweed and micro-organism. These booms, used for the safeguard of sea coasts, beaches, rivers and lakes are made of PVC or polyurethane with polyester reinforcement (high mechanical and chemical resistance). Besides antipollution barriers, Resinex develops and produces anti-intrusion and delimitation barriers.

ProductGallery.Name: Dredging floats
ProductGallery.Description: Dredging floats and surface pipe floats are usually composed of two empty half shells and can be filled with closed cell polyurethane foam on request. Extremely versatile, they are made of roto-moulded polyethylene modules.

ProductGallery.Name: Light and Marker Buoy
ProductGallery.Description: Unsinkable and resistant to chemical agents, light buoys for maritime signalling usually have an external part of linear polyethylene filled with polyurethane foam. The buoys are fitted with radar reflectors and fed by a solar panel system. Led lamps are used for luminous signalling up to 15 nautical miles.

Description: Headquartered in Trondheim, Norway, RESMAN IS THE WORLD’S LEADING PROVIDER OF WIRELESS RESERVOIR SURVEILLANCE. With a complete portfolio of reservoir tracer solutions, we are committed to help you gain valuable understanding about your reservoir to ultimately improve the effectiveness of reservoir management decisions.

Resolute are a technical solutions provider to the energy industry.
Founded in 2016, they have developed materials and methodologies to improve the barriers in oil and gas wells with clear targets of extending the financial life of field through well integrity reinstatement, improving well abandonment, and reducing the chances of producing or abandoned wells leaking and damaging the environment.

Description: Restrata helps organisations accelerate their transition to connected resilience, providing a SaaS-based, unified operating view across people, assets, supply chain and risk in real time. Unify situational awareness to enhance duty of care and security within your organisation. Improve action and response to ensure people safety, mitigate disruption and coordinate a more effective outcome. Understand risk to ensure people safety, eliminate avoidable impact, minimise unplanned shutdowns, and improve operational efficiency.

ProductGallery.Name: Restrata Platform
ProductGallery.Description: Connecting people, assets, supply chain and risk in a single operating view across the organisation. View, analize, act on information in real time at site, regional or gloabl level.

Description: With highly accurate measurement performance and extreme capabilities, Rheonik meters are a natural choice for many applications and quickly provide payback through improved product quality and greatly reduced maintenance. Whether used for transfer, batching, process feed or control, Rheonik meters can provide online flow and density measurement.

With more than 50 years of experience and history in petrochemical industry developing and manufacturing safety valves.
We offer a wide range of Quick Dry and API couplings, overfill prevention valves, shut-off valves, check valves, vapor stop devices, pressure vacuum vents and flame arresters.
Our range of safety devices is designed to protect the tanks from over pressure and the dispersion of liquids in both normal and emergency conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: Pressure-vacuum valve, with END OF LINE DEFL. FLAME ARRESTER Mod.197 ENP-SS
ProductGallery.Description: Mechanical safety device to be installed on vents pipe fuel plants or chemical products (technical data sheet available on our website). It guarantees the protection of the tank without letting the flames enter in case of external fires. The flame stop is classified as END-OF-LINE, meaning that installed on piping in the presence of flammable vapors it allows to isolate the protected side in case of deflagration (DEF) in the other part of the duct.

ProductGallery.Name: PRESSURE VACUUM VENT WITH END OF LINE DEFLAGRATION FLAME ARRESTER
ProductGallery.Description: Pressure vacuum vent model 197 can be manufactured both with flame arrester or without it. End-of-line flame arresters contain ribbon coil, an element made of stainless steel that prevents the propagation of the flame inside the tank. Pressure vacuum vent is normally used in the vapour recovery system (Stage 1) and it is designed to regulate the pressure inside the storage tank and to protect it in case of overpressure.

ProductGallery.Name: IN LINE DEFLAGRATION FLAME ARRESTER VALVES MOD.330 ENP
ProductGallery.Description: The In Line Flame Arrester Ridart is a Protection System with stainless Steel ribbon coil: deflag. in-line flame arrester in according with Directive 2014/34/EU and harmonized standard EN ISO16852:2016. During the filling of a tank, the free vent discharge vapours that may ignite due to atmospheric or accidental causes. The tank shall be protected to prevent the propagation of flames into the container. Inside there are two ribbon, which allow the dissipation of flames

ProductGallery.Name: OVERFILL PREVENTION VALVES MOD.442B
ProductGallery.Description: The Overfill Prevention Valve Ridart is designed to prevent the overfill of underground storage tanks by providing a positive shut-off of product delivery

ProductGallery.Name: OVERFILL PREVENTION VALVES MOD.446
ProductGallery.Description: The Overfill Prevention Valve Ridart is designed to prevent the overfill of underground storage tanks by providing a positive shut-off of product delivery

ProductGallery.Name: API ADAPTER FUEL TRANSFER VALVES MOD.1527 L WITH LEVER API ADAPTER MALE
ProductGallery.Description:
The adapter API RP 1004 is used to prevent any possible leaking during the process of transferring fluids during the loading/discharge of tank trucks.
There are different versions of the adapter, with and without a lever for manual opening and different sizes.

ProductGallery.Name: QUICK DRY COUPLER FUEL TRANSFER VALVES MOD. 1605 QUICK DRY FEMALE
ProductGallery.Description:
The RIDART QUICK DRY is used to prevent any possible leaking during the process of transferring fluids during the loading/discharge of tank trucks.
There are different materials and sizes.

ProductGallery.Name: VAPOR RECOVERY ADAPTER CAMLOCK COUPLINGS MOD. 1524 ENP 3"FX4"M CAMLOCK
ProductGallery.Description:
RIDART VAPOR RECOVERY ADAPTER are normally used in the vapour recovery line (Stage 1). Upon its connection with a camlock coupling, the valve opens allowing the vapor to return to the tank truck.
There are different sizes and models also with flame arrester. Flame arrester element is designed to isolate flames and protect a circumscribed area.

ProductGallery.Name: BALL FLOAT VENT VALVES - VAPOR RECOVERY LINE STAGE II MOD. 1010 EN P ALUMINIUM e PTFE
ProductGallery.Description:
The RIDART BALL FLOAT VALVE is normally used in the vapor recovery line (Stage 2). It is designed to protect the vapor recovery line from fuel overfilling hazard during loading operation.
There are different sizes and models also with FLAME ARRESTER. Flame arrester element is designed to isolate flames and protect a circumscribed area.

ProductGallery.Name: EMERGENCY SHEAR VALVES  MOD.23/26
ProductGallery.Description:
The single and double poppet emergency SHUT-OFF VALVE is installed in the fuel delivery line and is designed to protect from danger of product loss by closing the flow of fuel in case of accident, damage or fire.
Double poppet shut-off valve allows the closure of both lines from the underground storage tank (inlet) and to dispenser (outlet).
The valve allows full flowing capacity with normal operation.

PressReleases.Name: FOR USE WITH SPECIAL FUEL WITH ADDITIVES AND CHEMICALS INOX OR PTFE COATED OR INOX
PressReleases.Description:
WE HAVE BENN A LEADING COMPANY IN MANUFACTURING VALVES FOR OVER 50 YEARS.
WITH THE WORK AND PASSION OF THE STAFF AND GREAT CONSOLIDATED EXPERIENCE IN THE SECTOR WE ADDRESS TO GLOBAL MARKETS OFFERING OUR CLIENTS CUSTOM MADE SOLUTIONS AND RELIABLE PRODUCTS.

PressReleases.Description: The Atex “workplace” Directive 1999/92/EC deals with the minimum requirements for improving the level of health and safety protection. A potentially explosive atmosphere exists when a mixture of air gases, vapors, mists, or dusts combine in a way that can ignite under certain operating conditions.  Equipment and protective system intended for use in potentially explosive atmospheres (ATEX) cover a range of products, including those used on fixed offshore platforms, petrochemical plants, mines....

RKI calibration gas, gas regulators and calibration station for the calibrating gas detectors.

Address: Unit P, Kingsfield Business Centre, Philanthropic Road
Description:
Rivertrace are the market leaders in Oil in Water Quality Monitoring, at the forefront of designing equipment and systems that not only meet but exceed requirements of tightening environmental legislation for the marine, offshore and industrial markets. 
Rivertrace tailor makes systems according to our customers individual environmental monitoring requirement including, Oily water discharges, EGCS Wash Water, boiler condensate, produced water and slop water discharge.

ProductGallery.Name: OCD XTRA
ProductGallery.Description: The OCD Xtra is a robust and versatile oil in water analyser which combines multiple light wavelengths with multiple sensor technology, to measure oil accurately in the range 0-200 ppm, even in the blackest of produced water.

ProductGallery.Name: SMART PFM
ProductGallery.Description: The SMART PFM is a Oil in water analyser which measures particulates in the sample stream on a continuous basis by passing the process fluid through a proprietary photo optical measuring cell developed by Rivertrace.

ProductGallery.Name: SMART 50M
ProductGallery.Description: The SMART 50M is a versatile and sophisticated monitor to suit multiple applications in marine and industrial environments. The Smart 50M uses a nephelometry based detection technique and uses sophisticated algorithms to detect Oil in the sample

ProductGallery.Name: SMART 40M
ProductGallery.Description: The SMART 40M has been developed as a versatile low-cost solution for simple oil in water monitoring applications. Originally designed for use onboard vessels under MARPOL regulation the monitor has been re-developed for industrial use with user adjustable alarm points to suit the environmental requirement.

ProductGallery.Name: SMART BILGE
ProductGallery.Description: The SMART BILGE 15ppm Oil Content Monitor was developed in 2005 to meet and exceed the requirements for MEPC.107(49) regulations. The SMART BILGE is made up of 2 key components, the SMART BILGE ‘Module’ and the SMART ‘CELL’ measuring cell. The SMART CELL utilises a unique Detector Array Technology, developed by Rivertrace, allowing the OCM to analyse all three oil types (HFO, Diesel and Emulsions) simultaneously without the need for re-calibration.

ProductGallery.Name: SMART VISCO
ProductGallery.Description: The SMART VISCO monitor is designed to measure the viscosity and temperature of fuel oil on board large ships prior to entering the main engines. The monitor will be installed in the fuel line prior to injection and will report temperature and viscosity data over analogue/digital outputs and volt free relay contacts.

ProductGallery.Name: SMART HUB
ProductGallery.Description: The SMART Hub is part of the RT Connected initiative. It is a control monitor used to record and output data from multiple parameters. It is extremely flexible and can be used in a host of different applications to lift data from stand-alone devices into the cloud and / or connected control systems.

Description:
RMG Messtechnik GmbH is internationally successful in the field of gas measurement technology at home and abroad. We develop, produce, sell and maintain high-quality and sensitive products for energy supply companies, plant manufacturers and industrial companies in the natural gas sector. We are always interested in building, developing and promoting young talents and qualified professionals.

RMG – Your professional partner in gas measurement technology.

ProductGallery.Name: Ultrasonic gas meter RSM 200 - dedicated to the distribution networks
ProductGallery.Description: RMG will launch a new series of 2-path meters for the distribution market (size 2” up to 8”, ANSI Class 150). With an overall length of 3 x DN, it is compatible with turbine wheel meters, and thanks to a built-in flow straightener, an inlet section is only required if severe flow disturbances (acc. OIML 137) are present. Compact, inexpensive and with an integrated volume corrector on request. You can be excited!

ProductGallery.Name: USM GT400 ultrasonic gas meter
ProductGallery.Description:
Highest accuracy and largest measuring ranges: The GT400 series is the high-end result of continuous product development of ultrasonic meter technology.
Already with the market launch of the first RMG ultrasonic meter in 1999, the principle of 6-path measurement was applied for custody transfer metering. In the current 4th generation, the optimum measuring instrument is available for the precise
measurement of large flows at high pressures in pipelines and gas transfer stations.

ProductGallery.Name: Correlative calorimeter RGQ 5
ProductGallery.Description: The RGQ 5 is a compact gas analyzer with low CAPEX developed for the continuous measurement of combustible gases. From the signals of the sensors the quantities calorific value, relative density, methane number and Wobbe index can be determined according to a correlative procedure. The instrument provides the values every second via Modbus RTU (RS485) or one of the values at the analog output (4-20mA current loop).

ProductGallery.Name: Compact Volume Corrector Primus 400
ProductGallery.Description: The Primus 400 volume corrector is an extremely compact and robust device that has been specially developed for the natural gas market and is suitable for commercial and industrial applications. It enables gas network operators and their customers to precisely measure the gas flow, to convert the measured volume based on the state variables pressure, temperature and compressibility and to read out all data via standard protocols.

ProductGallery.Name: Electronic Volume Meter with integrated Volume Corrector TME 400-VC
ProductGallery.Description: A new class of instruments has been created with the TME400-VC series: Sensors for pressure and temperature of the sample gas are integrated in the measuring unit and electronic counter. Volume and flow rate can then be calculated from these measured values, even under standard conditions. For conversion methods, you can choose between GERG88, AGA 8 Gross Methods, AGA 8 NX19 and GOST30319.

PressReleases.Name: GT400-3P 4-inch Gas Ultrasonic & Orifice Meter Wet & Dry Gas Test Results
PressReleases.Description: The use of multi-path gas ultrasonic meters (USMs) in upstream/midstream applications, where liquids may be present, has generally been considered not a viable application for this technology. Since there are many different USM path configurations in use today, one should not assume poor wet-gas performance by one meter design translates into the same performance for all others.

Description:
Market leading geophysical wireline technologies, software and services.
For over four decades Robertson Geo has pioneered the development of advanced wireline instrumentation for geophysical and petrophysical applications. Our ethos begins and ends with research and development - we listen and learn from our customers and develop better products suited for their specific applications.

Rock Flow Dynamics' flagship product tNavigator is a state-of-the-art reservoir modelling and simulation platform, offering a wide range of advanced innovative tools for geoscience, reservoir and production engineering disciplines. Integration is at the heart of our technology; we believe that by keeping data and knowledge in a single platform, performance and efficiency is increased, allowing you to undertake a deeper analysis of your field and make more informed, confident decisions.
