Description:
Rockwin is a forty-six-year-old Indian company and has been producing high performance flowmetering equipment. It has to its credit several new developments in technology and equipment for process control instrumentation. 

Over four decades ago, Rockwin built its pioneering industrial unit near New Delhi. This modern integrated unit, spread over 10000 sq. meters, is the heart of its Design, Manufacturing and Calibration facilities. 

Rockwin’s products have high quality standards with accreditation from National and International bodies.

ProductGallery.Name: Custody Transfer Turbine Flowmeter
ProductGallery.Description:
The Custody Transfer series Inline Turbine Flowmeters are designed to provide high accuracy liquid flow measurement under the exacting conditions encountered in the Oil Industry. 

These are capable of achieving ±0.15% linearity or better, over a specified flow range.

These are specifically intended for use in fiscal or custody transfer applications.

ProductGallery.Name: Electromagnetic Flowmeter
ProductGallery.Description:
These flowmeters are suitable for all types of electrically conductive liquids.

Fluids are isolated from the meter pipe by inert linings and compatible electrodes.

These flowmeter tolerate high percentage of suspended solids, sludge, slurries, minerals, paper and sewage which flows with high level of contaminants

ProductGallery.Name: Filtration, Pressure-Reduction and Metering Skid
ProductGallery.Description:
Rockwin’s state-of-the-art fabrication and system integration facilities are designed to meet the fabrication, assembly requirements of small to large projects from the fabrication phase to field installation. We deliver value and expertise in piping, structural steel fabrication, component and skid fabrication and assembly with value added services. 

These skids  /  systems  have  been  used  in Oil  pipelines,  Gas  distribution,  Petrochemical, Distilleries, Food & Beverage industries.

ProductGallery.Name: Flow Calibration Services
ProductGallery.Description:
Rockwin has a state of the art flow calibration facility which is at per with the best in the world. This facility is accredited by  (National Accreditation Board for NABL Testing and Calibration Laboratories) and in accordance with ISO / IEC 17025.

NABL accreditation maintains linkages with the international bodies like, International Laboratory Accreditation Co-operation (ILAC) and Asia Pacific Laboratory Accreditation Co-operation (APLAC).

ProductGallery.Name: Fuelgas Turbine Flowmeter
ProductGallery.Description:
These Turbine meters are designed for all non-aggressive gases and fuel gas such as natural gas, propane, butane, ethane, coke oven gas, town gas, acetylene, nitrogen, carbon-dioxide, air and all inert gases.

These flowmeters are also designed for custody transfer applications.

ProductGallery.Name: Insertion Turbine Flowmeter
ProductGallery.Description:
Insertion Turbine Flowmeters are designed for applications where installation and removal  from the pipeline without interruption to flow altogether with economy of  cost  are more important than extreme accuracy of measurement.
They are ideally suited for use in large pipelines where the cost of inline meters would be prohibitive.
Meters can be installed and removed through a suitable valve while the flowline remains under pressure. They offer wide rangeability and improved linearity.

ProductGallery.Name: Metering Skid
ProductGallery.Description:
Rockwin’s state-of-the-art fabrication and system integration facilities are designed to meet the fabrication, assembly requirements of small to large projects from the fabrication phase to field installation. We deliver value and expertise in piping, structural steel fabrication, component and skid fabrication and assembly with value added services. 

These skids  /  systems  have  been  used  in Oil  pipelines,  Gas  distribution,  Petrochemical, Distilleries, Food & Beverage industries.

ProductGallery.Name: Turbine Flowmeter
ProductGallery.Description: Rockwin Turbine Flowmeters are precise, reliable and rugged instruments built to International standards. These flowmeters are suitable for a wide variety of industrial, commercial and aerospace applications. Sizes range from 5 to 50 mm threaded and from 5 to 500 mm flanged end connections. All flowmeters are individually calibrated.

ProductGallery.Name: Wafer Turbine Flowmeter
ProductGallery.Description: The Wafer Style Turbine Flowmeters are designed for installation between two flanges. This unique design results in simplified installation. The WTM Series meters are robust design and available up to 2500# rating.

ProductGallery.Name: Wing-Nut Hammer-Union Turbine Flowmeter
ProductGallery.Description:
The Wing Nut End Turbine Flowmeters are designed to withstand the rugged conditions of Oil & Gas Upstream. These type of flowmeter is used for measurement of a wide variety of liquids, including  slurries and suspensions in high pressure oilwell services. 
These flowmeters are with wing nut end  connection commonly known as Turbine Flowmeter with Hammer Union end connection in accordance with 1502.

PressReleases.Name: U-stamp & R-stamp certification
PressReleases.Description: We are pleased to inform that Rockwin have achieved another milestone in the area of fabrication. Recently we have faced successful audits from ASME & National Board (USA) and as a result got certified for the Fabrication of pressure vessels and static equipment’s with the application of “U” and "R" stamp.

Description: FMJ Rolloos BV is the supplier of explosion proof CCTV systems to the oil & gas industry, (petro)chemical industry and renewable energy market. From the harsh North Sea to the heat in the Middle East, from the Gulf of Mexico to the Far East. Each Rolloos CCTV system is designed for remote and harsh environments. On offshore production platforms, FPSO’s, drilling rigs and windfarm substations, onshore land drilling rigs and tank farm.

Pioneering the Power that matters,

mtu systems power the largest yachts, the strongest tugboats and the biggest land vehicles and provide energy for the world’s most important mission-critical applications. Through advanced solutions such as microgrids, we integrate renewable energies and manage the power needs of our customers.

Romar-Abrado offer advanced milling and SWARF handling services to the global P&A market. Its combined approach and first-class operating knowledge provide innovative technologies through integrated milling and SWARF handling services to deliver permanent, verifiable, and emission-free well barriers and highly predictable alternative zonal isolation P&A solutions.

Description: ROVOP are the world's largest independent ROV contractor. With more than 10 years dedicated experience purely on ROV operations, we are domain experts in all aspects of safe and efficient ROV operations. We have a varied fleet of 44 vehicles, from small observation class vehicles through 250HP working ROVs to service a variety of subsea construction, inspection, repair and maintenance activity. Knowledge in depth -  the defining principle of our ROV service offering.

Royal Van Beest is the leading manufacturer of premium quality lifting, lashing and mooring fittings. We understand that different environments need different products. Lifting and lashing operations in the offshore transport and installation business are challenging due to harsh environments. In other industries – such as manufacturing and distribution – continuity is key to daily operations. Royal Van Beest brings everything together with Green Pin®, Irizar Forge and Heuer Hebetechnik brands under one roof.

Description: Rutter is a Canadian developer of X-band radar signal processing applications for marine safety, security, and environmental monitoring. Rutter sigma S6 systems integrate with either navigational or dedicated-purpose marine x-band radars. The sigma S6 Suite includes: Oil Spill Detection - detects and monitors marine oil spills (https://rutter.ca/oil-spill/); Small Target Surveillance - enhanced target detection for security SAR operations (https://rutter.ca/sts/); WaveSignal - short range prediction of wave action at a vessel (https://rutter.ca/wavesignal/).

ProductGallery.Name: sigma S6 Oil Spill Detection
ProductGallery.Description: Rutter's sigma S6 Oil Spill Detection uses standard X-band radar technologies to detect oil slicks out to 4 nautical miles from a radar site or vessel.  The system automatically alarms on the presence of oil, outlines the extent of the oil spill showing its deformation and drift over time.

ProductGallery.Name: sigma S6 Small Target Surveillance
ProductGallery.Description: sigma S6 Small Target Surveillance provides enhanced radar imagery, target detection and tracking in the marine environment. A versatile tool, detecting and tracking a wide range of target profiles from persons in water and small maneuvering craft to large vessels, the system is a practical solution for specialty radar applications such as search and rescue, improved vessel traffic monitoring, asset protection and surveillance applications including antipiracy and coastal water protection. The image depicted shows the

ProductGallery.Name: sigma S6 WaveSignal
ProductGallery.Description: Rutter's sigma S6 WaveSignal use standard X-band radar technologies to perform short terms individual wave prediction.  Within a three-minute horizon, WaveSignal™ identifies quiet periods by displaying a simple red [stop] or a green [go] signal light indicating when to suspend or resume operations with confidence.

ProductGallery.Name: Clock Spring - Composite Reinforcement Repair
ProductGallery.Description: Clock Spring® is an economical repair alternative for pipelines. Clock Spring’s patented design re-defines the economics of pipeline repair, ensuring a permanent repair that is safe, economical, and effective. The Clock Spring® pipe repair system is a high-strength corrosion-resistant e-glass and resin composite sleeve, a high-performance adhesive, and high-strength filler material. Clock Spring repairs are fast, economical, safe, and easy.

ProductGallery.Name: VISCOTAQ - Corrosion Prevention Coatings
ProductGallery.Description: A unique viscous elastic technology! VISCOTAQ® is a worldwide patented viscous elastic pipeline technology coating that is used for corrosion prevention of pipelines, storage tanks, soil to air transitions, above ground flanges, pipe crossings and in the ditch applications. VISCOTAQ® also offers a unique waterproofing line of products to stop water infiltration at pipe casings, buildings, vaults, storm drains, sewer lines and more.

ProductGallery.Name: VISCOTAQ - Casing Filler 95 Deg.C
ProductGallery.Description: Viscotaq Casing Filler 95 is delivered to the casing in a “Heat Traced ISO Tank” container pumped in liquid form. The liquid form is only to enable the product to flow into the annulus. Once it is in and left to cool down, it will turn into its natural Viscous Elastic state: Not Solid, not liquid but viscous and will not dry up.

ProductGallery.Name: Protectoseal - Vapor & Flame Control Equipment
ProductGallery.Description:
-Pressure and Vacuum Relief Vents

ProductGallery.Name: Cygnus Ultrasonic Thickness Measurement Gauges
ProductGallery.Description:
MULTI-MODE ULTRASONIC THICKNESS GAUGE 
Cygnus Ultrasonic Thickness Measurement Gauges all measure using the Multi-Echo Technique for accurate error-checked metal thickness measurements. This uses multiple pulses, providing verified thickness readings and allowing coatings up to 0.787 inches thick to be ignored. Our UT thickness tester range now includes several PLUS+ models which also feature Single-Echo and Echo modes for measuring extreme corrosion and pitting.

ProductGallery.Name: RPR Machine - Coating Removal by Induction
ProductGallery.Description: The world’s Fastest, Safest, Cleanest & Quietest method for removing paint and coatings from steel surfaces. Clean and fast system for coatings removal. No dust, no noise in the process. This is an environmentally friendly and safe system. The induction dis-bonder works by the principle of induction. Heat is generated in the steel substrate and the bonding is broken. The coating is then removed entirely without disintegrating and completely free from contaminating agents.

ProductGallery.Name: Humidur - Anti- Corrosion Coatings
ProductGallery.Description: All Humidur® anti-corrosion coatings are solvent-free and coal-tar-free 2-component modified polyamine cured epoxy coatings with excellent barrier properties. The products have been designed for durable and maintenance-free lifetime protection against aggressive corrosion, found in marine, offshore and chemical environments. The products are single layer applied systems used in dry or wet conditions with underwater curing ability. All systems are applicable on steel and concrete and are compatible with minimal surface preparation.

ProductGallery.Name: Zerust - Corrosion Inhibitor System
ProductGallery.Description: Effective Corrosion Protection Zerust Oil & Gas technologies have been successfully implemented across refineries, oil rigs, pipelines and tank farms around the world. By combining our proprietary Zerust inhibitor formulations with some of the traditional corrosion mitigation methods in use today (cathodic protection, coatings, etc.), Zerust advanced technology yields several unique and innovative solutions that counter costly corrosion problems in the oil, gas, and process chemical industries. Solutions are provided for flanges, and oil tanks.

ProductGallery.Name: Rotary Union
ProductGallery.Description:
A rotary union is a precision mechanical device which allows to transfer fluid  under vacuum or differential pressure environments from a stationary source to a rotating part of machinery, preserving and isolating the fluid connection. 
It is used for supplying and connecting fluids separately, it also called as Rotary Joint. It plays a core role in CMP equipment in Semiconductor front-end processing.

ProductGallery.Name: Rotary feedthrough
ProductGallery.Description:
A rotary feedthrough is a precision mechanical device which allows to transfer rotational motion 
from atmosphere into vacuum or differential pressure environments. 
The best feature of Sealink Rotary Feedthrough (Mechanical Seal) is that it 
doesn’t need lubricant supply system. It can be used in both condition high pressure and high vacuum. According to these features, it’s possible to use various industries such as Semiconductor equipment, Petrochemical equipment, Pharmaceutical, Marine, etc.

PressReleases.Name: A new innovative technology for sealing.
PressReleases.Description:

There are Mechanical seals unit, Rotary feedthrough, Rotary & Linear Feedthrough for high vacuum or high pressure.
These solutions have dramatically improved existing Magnetic and Mechanical seals.
SEALINK's professional design engineers support customized designs that meet customer requirements.
Standardized S-Seal Unit used in semiconductor and petrochemical fields is also provided.

ProductGallery.Description: RIM SEAL FIRE DETECTION is a fire detection system dedicate for the floating roof tank storage based on a Linear Heat Detector (LHD) Technology with protective chemical and UV resistant outer jacket sheath The LHD sensor consists of a two-core twisted pair, where the cores are tinned copper coated spring steel conductor with a special heat reactive polymer insulation. The insulators between the two conductors plasticizes at the design temperature of 105°c creating short-circuit...

ProductGallery.Name: ATD - AUTOMATIC TANK DEWATERING
ProductGallery.Description:
Over time a water layer can form on the bottom of the UST ( underground storage tank ) containing hydrocarbon crudes.
Due to this water, a possibility exists of increased corrosion.
Therefore, this water will need to be periodically drained manually.
By monitoring the drainage water, an operator can accurately measure the presence of hydrocarbons reducing the risk of contamination in high risk areas.

ProductGallery.Name: FLOATING ROOF MONITORING SYSTEM
ProductGallery.Description:
External Floating Roof Tanks (EFRT) External, or open-top, floating roof tanks typically have steel floating roofs with a drainpipe to drain away rain water. Problems that may affect EFRs include excessive rainwater or snow accumulation, rim seal degradation, and stuck seals or ladders. These problems may further cause inclination and/or vibration of the floating roof, and product emissions.
Our solution has sensor technologies capable of detecting warning signs for these conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: HSP - HYDROCARBON SENSING PROBE
ProductGallery.Description: The Hydrocarbon Sensing Probe (HSP) is based on Solid state element containing Graphene compound able to absorb non-conductive liquids (HC’s or selected solvents). Liquid hydrocarbons or their vapors (C3+) are absorbed and the sensitive sensor. This one swelled locally and some Carbon particles start losing contact between them. The electrical resistance of the graphite silicone moves and the output signal increase. This technology are a complete product line for fluid leak detection application.

ProductGallery.Name: UNRIVALLED SPILLANGEL
ProductGallery.Description:
SPILLANGEL™
The sensor Technology without contact is aimed for detection of oil films on water and ground surface in continuous unattended mode.
It registers the specific fluorescence of oil caused by its exposure to certain ultraviolet light emission.
Due to that the sensor is selectively sensitive to various oil products while not reacting to most other materials that may appear in the observation area.
unrivaled for leak detection in bund areas.

ProductGallery.Name: PATENT NPW PIPELINE LEAK DETECTION
ProductGallery.Description: Distributed Leak Detection System operating principle is based on the detection of pressure transient waves caused by the onset of a pipeline leak. The pressure transient waves our system detects are caused by the sudden drop in pressure, and the immediate line re-pressurization at the location of a leak onset. This onset causes pressure oscillations in the fluid pressure and propagates as a sonic wave signal at the speed of sound through the fluid

ProductGallery.Name: PATENT ACOUSTIC PIPELINE LEAK DETECTION
ProductGallery.Description: Above ground or buried underground, the pipeline system tends to receive less attention than other process units do. Additionally, regulatory oversight of pipeline safety, operations, and reliability is somewhat fragmented depending on what is transported. Key examples include crude oil pipelines from oil fields to refineries; multi-product pipelines from refineries to tank farms; water pipelines from desalination plants to cities; and gas pipelines. There are three basic leak detection systems: internal, external and visual inspection...

ProductGallery.Name: SPILLCHECK
ProductGallery.Description:
The sensor Technology is aimed for detection of oil films on water and ground surface in continuous unattended mode. 
It registers the specific fluorescence of oil caused by its exposure to certain ultraviolet light emission. 
Due to that the sensor is selectively sensitive to various oil products while not reacting to most other materials that may appear in the observation area

ProductGallery.Name: SPILLEYE
ProductGallery.Description:
The oil and diesel industries are plagued by the inability to accurately discriminate oil on water because there is not a strong contrast between them.
 Even if the oil and water temperatures are the same, our polarization imager can detect oil on water up to 400% better than standard thermal imagery while seepage can be detected up to a kilometer away. These impressive features make the perfect solution for leak and seep detection.

Description:
A premier engineering business, offering the best in severe service valves.
At Severn, our control, choke and Butterfly valves are pre-eminent in the global market. They underpin the reliability and high performance of business-critical client infrastructure. Our global reach, technical prowess and collaborative approach – all founded upon a heritage of British engineering excellence – helping to assure production continuity and reduce the prospect of costly downtime.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 1000 Series Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description: The 1000 Series Globe valve range represents a cost-effective design, with the standard range using the W-Series Spring and Diaphragm Actuator – although it can be designed to suit the double-acting P-Series Actuator when applications dictate.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 1200 Series Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description: Series 1200 range benefits from more than 40 years of in-field experience to deliver cost-effective, easily maintained, reliable and high-quality valves for the most punishing applications. The wide choice of materials used for manufacture offers bespoke application solutions, while the smooth body flow path reduces turbulence, minimising the effects of erosion and noise.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 1200P Series Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
The hallmarks of the 1200P design are its high flow capacity, durable shut-off and low emission performance.

The 1200P Series also uses NACE conforming material options to provide reduced overall dimensions and weights for increased valve performance.

The unique static balance seal with clamped seat, minimised use of shims/gaskets, large post/cage guiding ensures ruggedness and durability.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 3000 Series Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
The 3000 Series was initially developed specifically for installation in cryogenic cold boxes – so is derived from proven application in an industry which makes the most stringent demands upon its suppliers.

The fully machined flow path ensures a high degree of cleanliness: all 3000 Series valves are cleaned and assembled to the standards required for cryogenic service, so meet the exacting specifications of the industrial gas market.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 4000 Series Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
The 4000 Model Series was initially developed specifically to satisfy the installation in cryogenic ASU cold boxes of an all-welded-in construction – thus preventing any possibility of process leakage within the insulated area whilst giving full access to the valve trim from outside the cold box.

The range now has a track record of high performance in the industrial gas industry, which requires the provision of cost-effective valves based on a simple maintenance regime.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 5000 Series Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
The 5000 Series range encompasses control and choke valves across a flexible range of designs, from contoured and caged to multiturn stack designs such as the MLT and CCD.

Its range and versatility means the 5000 Series can be offered in both standard design as well as bespoke, highly engineered solutions for service application in the harshest of environments.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 7000 Series Control Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
The 7000 Series was initially developed specifically for installation in cryogenic and warm service Ultra High Purity bulk gas systems for the semiconductor industry.

As such, it benefits from extensive experience in providing cost-effective and easily maintained valves in an industry which makes very stringent design demands upon its suppliers.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 5000 Series Choke Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
The 5000 Series choke range delivers reliable control of production rates from the wellhead to the production header.

The choke, designed to deal with initial high pressure at well start-up, is used to balance production rates in the production header – both in terms of best production fluid make-up as well as optimisation of the individual well operation and pressure.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 8100 Swing Clear Series Butterfly Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
Our Swing Clear Butterfly Control Valves are designed to control the flow of liquids and gases for more severe applications typically encountered in chemical and petrochemical applications where a complete tight shut-off is not essential.

The Swing Clear disc, which has no contact with the valve body, enables valves to be used with high pressures and a wide range of temperatures.

ProductGallery.Name: Severn 8200 Step Seat Series Butterfly Valve
ProductGallery.Description:
Our Step Seat Butterfly Control Valves are designed to control the flow of liquids and gases for more severe applications typically encountered in chemical and petrochemical applications where a complete tight shut-off is not essential.

Our Step Seat valves mean reduced leakage levels on limited applications, with both high and low-temperature gasses.

PressReleases.Name: Severn Go Digital
PressReleases.Description: With a global reputation as the technical valve and applications experts, Severn attends ADIPEC to showcase how their Control, Choke and Butterfly valve products, MRO service offerings and significant investment in digital technology places them at the forefront of technological advancements in the valve industry.

ProductGallery.Name: Coiled Tubing
ProductGallery.Description: Certified by API-5ST, Shinda is a manufacturer specialized in Coiled Tubing and has made excellent sales both at home and abroad. The biggest feature of our coiled tubing string is that we could make a combination of our capillary tubing, cables & fibers with the traditional coiled tubing to form our Intelligent Cable Coiled Tubing (ICCT) for the real-time monitoring, data acquisitions and etc., which make us different from the rest of our competitors.

ProductGallery.Name: Capillary Tube, Control Line, Chemical Injection Line
ProductGallery.Description: Welded or seamless capillary tube, control line, chemical injection line, bare or encapsulated tube for chemical injection or downhole hydraulic control purposes. Tubing material include SS 316L, Incoloy 825, Inconel 625, Duplex SS 2205, Duplex SS 2507, Monel 400, etc. Encapsulation material include PP, TPV, PVDF, Polyamide 11 (PA11), ETFE, FEP, etc.

ProductGallery.Name: Tubing Encapsulated Cable (TEC), Permanent Downhole Cable (PDC)
ProductGallery.Description:
Tubing material mostly are SS316L and Incoloy 825 and encapsulation material include PP, TPV, PVDF, Polyamide 11 (PA11), ETFE, FEP, etc, for different well environments.
Copper conductors: 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22AWG, ETC. Solid core or stranded conductor. Bare copper, tin-plated, silver-plated, and other copper conductors.

ProductGallery.Name: Downhole Fibre Optic Cable
ProductGallery.Description:
Downhole fibre optic cable combines the copper conductor, optical fibres and amour tube within one same cable structure. This construction is intended to withstand high temperature, high pressure and corrosive environments. We can provide various downhole cable solutions for different applications.
Armor tubing material are mostly SS 316L and Incoloy 825. Optical Fibres are purchased world-renowned brands. Encapsulation materials are mostly PP, FEP, ETFE, PVDF, etc.

ProductGallery.Name: Flatpack
ProductGallery.Description: This is a comprehensive product that integrates the capillary tube or control line and TEC/PDC for advanced or smart well completions.

ProductGallery.Name: ICCT (Intelligent Coiled Tubing Cable)
ProductGallery.Description:
ICCT integrates traditional coiled tubing with capillary tube, PDC/TEC for complex downhole operations.
Applications: 
1. Complex wellbore intervention. 
2. Offshore/onshore coiled tubing perforation. 
3. Perforation, well stimulation, gas lift, well cleaning. 
4. Electric heating. 
5. DTS, DAS, DVS, real-time monitoring. 
• Features: 
1. Realize multifunctional operations at the same time. 
2. Reduce risk and expense. 
3. Provide effective coiled tubing operations. 
4. Increase certainty and reduce invalid operations.

ProductGallery.Name: Seamless Tubing
ProductGallery.Description:
Shinda can also produce the seamless tubing for chemical injection or hydraulic control purposes.
Small Diameter - 1/8”, ¼”, 3/8”, ½”, 5/8”. Long Length - used as control line and flatpacks for oil & gas wells.

ProductGallery.Name: ESP Pump
ProductGallery.Description:
An ESP system includes surface part and downhole string, which often consists of pump, gas separator (if needed), seal chamber section, motor and sometimes a downhole sensor, from top to bottom.
Pump is the core component of the ESP system. They have multistage centrifugal structure and can be used to lift the well fluid to the surface wherever the reservoir pressure is dropping.

Sinergia turns to O&G, Petrochemical, Power, Chemical, industries by providing engineering and manufacturing of instrument air and N2 generation packages, combined in integrated systems as well as gas treatment units. 

Customized solutions & flexible production are part of the offered added value. 

ISO certified Company horizontally organized with vertical integrated productive process, all in house performed. 

Aiming sustainability, can offer ESG approach to projects, and LCA of products.

ProductGallery.Name: OIL FREE & OIL INJECTED AIR COMPRESSOR
ProductGallery.Description:
Oil Free & Oil injected Screw compressors are used for production of compressed air in a wide variety of processes. The presence or absence of residual vaporized hydrocarbons (oil) is the main discriminating criteria of selection.

SINERGIA designs and manufactures high quality and innovative oil-free and oil injected air compressor packages for a wide applications' spectrum. 

All units are fully skidded and depending on specifications can be supplied complying with API 619 standards.

ProductGallery.Name: CENTRIFUGAL COMPRESSOR
ProductGallery.Description:
Centrifugal compressors are used when oil free compressed air is required in large amount and for continuous consumption applications.

SINERGIA can design and manufacture high efficiency air compression packages based on centrifugal type. 

All units are fully skidded and depending on specifications can be supplied complying with API 672 standards.

ProductGallery.Name: RECIPROCATING COMPRESSOR
ProductGallery.Description:
Reciprocating compressors are commonly used to increase the pressure of a variety of gases. 

SINERGIA designs and manufactures packaged reciprocating air and nitrogen compressors to be included in its nitrogen generator systems when a higher pressure is required for gaseous nitrogen storage or bottle filling. 

All units are fully skidded, and depending on specifications, can be supplied complying with API 618 standards.

ProductGallery.Name: HEATLESS DRYER
ProductGallery.Description:
This type of air dryer, operating with pressure swing adsorption technology, is the most common type of air dryer supplied to industries. 

Properly designed and regulated can easily reach extreme dew point levels. 

Sinergia has long lasting experience on this technology, and is able to supply fully packaged units, in variable configurations: standard design, or improved for heavy duty and severe ambient installation, dangerous or explosive environmental conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: HEAT DRYER with BLOWER
ProductGallery.Description:
This air dryer is a pressure swing adsorption type, belonging to the hot regenerated family. 

It is commonly used for large capacities employing an external heater (electrical or steam type) to increase the performance of adsorbing material’s regeneration by reducing dry air consumption.

The additional presence of a blower increases the efficiency of the dryer by reducing further the purge air. The choice of this type is in line with goal of overall energy saving.

ProductGallery.Name: HEAT OD COMPRESSION DRYER
ProductGallery.Description:
Adsorption dryer with hot regeneration in closed circuit version, uses the heat of compressed air-stream (aftercooler of air compressor is by-passed or excluded) in order to regenerate the adsorbing material. 

this type of dryer is suitable for large amount of airflow with the advantage of not requiring any external energy source and of consuming little purge air. 

Combined with centrifugal air compressors properly cool-regulated gives huge energy savings to the project.

ProductGallery.Name: NITROGEN MEMBRANE GENERATOR
ProductGallery.Description:
The selective permeation property of membranes is used to separate/concentrate gaseous molecules. 

Sinergia can supply fully packaged membrane nitrogen generators by selecting the membrane, core of the process, among the international premium brand manufacturers. 

Sinergia uses advanced calculating software for the selection of the most effective membrane under the particular project conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: NITROGEN PSA GENERATOR
ProductGallery.Description:
Sinergia has gained experience and skills in the pressure swing adsorption technology, manufacturing dryers since 2006. 

As a natural evolution of this know-how, Sinergia successfully started to engineer and manufacture PSA nitrogen & VPSA oxygen generators.

ProductGallery.Name: AIR SEPARATION PLANT
ProductGallery.Description:
Sinergia, thanks to partnership with qualified cold-box manufacturers, has integrated its supply range of technical gases generators with cryogenic technology.

The air compression and pre-treatment stages, part of Sinergia long lasting expertise, is combined with the “cold” portion of the system, partially outsourced and integrated in 

Sinergia detailed engineering and manufacturing scope of a customized turn-key solution. Both, liquid and gaseous, O2 and N2 at very high purity can be produced.

ProductGallery.Name: CONTAIINERIZED "Plug&Play" IA& N2 Package
ProductGallery.Description:
Sinergia has developed the production of Instrument Air and Nitrogen in containerized, plug & play solution, suitable for easy transport, quick installation and start up. 

The standard design takes into account most of the variable requirements referred to process and extreme ambient conditions of installation. 
Further integration with optional is possible thanks to the flexibility that is part of Sinergia DNA. 

Applications of this solution have proven to be reliable, effective, and cost saving.

Description:
Sitindustrie Valvometal started manufacturing valves for the energy industry in 1955 in its plant in Valduggia, Italy, and today is regarded as a very important supplier of ball, gate, globe and check valves.
The complete range of valves can be produced in forged and cast carbon steel, stainless steel and special alloy. Our company is mainly focused on critical applications in oil & gas, petrochemical, power generation and nuclear industries.

ProductGallery.Name: Ball Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Valvometal ball valves are known for being durable, performing well after many cycles, and reliable. Valvometal can manufacture all types of ball valves: side entry, top entry, fully welded, compact, with different special design, such as high temperature, cryogenic and cladded valves.

ProductGallery.Name: DBB Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Valvometal manufactures DBB valves, soft and metal seated, to suit our client’s specific requirements in all service conditions for limited space and perfect leakage prevention, also Top Entry DBB are available for full In-Line maintenance either with vertical and horizontal position

ProductGallery.Name: Gate Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Valvometal Gate valves are mainly used to intercept the flow in the oil & gas and power generation plants. Valvometal can produce Bolted Bonnet and Pressure Seal Gate Valves, with Slab, Flexible and Solid Wedge. Manufacturing all types of forged and cast material for any client needs.

ProductGallery.Name: Globe Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Valvometal Globe valves are mainly used to regulate the flow pressure or rate in the oil & gas and power generation plants. They can be also used as interception valves. Our Company produced bolted bonnet and pressure seal design, outside screw and yoke, rising and rotating stem design.

ProductGallery.Name: Check Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Valvometal Check valves are installed both onshore and offshore, in cryogenic and water treatment services, in oil & gas and power generation plants. Valvometal range of product for check valves is: pressure seal, tilting disc, bolted bonnet and dual plate.

ProductGallery.Name: Active alumina – General purpose dryer (Al2O3)
ProductGallery.Description:
Active alumina is a general-purpose dryer used for drying gaseous and liquid hydrocarbon systems, air, including in cryogenic processes, and various gases obtained in the air separation processes.
Two types of dryer are available: 
RS-400 (type A, type B) – intended for use on Sulfrene installations;
RS-401 – intended for use on Claus Units.
The production method is based on granulation of thermo-chemically activated aluminum oxide (TCA). Production technology is our know-how.

ProductGallery.Name: RS-H90 Desulfurization Catalyst
ProductGallery.Description:
A unique product that combines maximum efficiency and adsorption capacity to remove H2S from hydrocarbons ranging from natural gas to heavy naphtha. 
To reduce the length of the adsorption zone, RS-H90 has a large surface area and an optimized pore structure, which ensures high sulfur absorption and increases the life of the absorbent.

ProductGallery.Description:

2) Synthetic granulated zeolite NaX-BKO (Molecular Sieve 13X BKO) – a special type of molecular sieve designed for purification of air in air-separation units (production of technical gases: nitrogen, oxygen, etc.) 
3) Synthetic granulated zeolite NaX-APG (Molecular Sieve 13X APG) – for deep dehydration and purification of natural and associated petroleum gases

ProductGallery.Name: Synthetic Granulated Zeolite – Molecular Sieves type 5A (active pore size 5Å)

2) Synthetic granulated zeolite CaA-SR (Molecular Sieve 5A-SR) – for deep dehydration and purification (desulphurization) of natural and associated petroleum gases.

ProductGallery.Name: Synthetic Granulated Zeolite – Molecular Sieves type 4A (active pore size 4Å)
ProductGallery.Description:
1) Synthetic granulated zeolite NaA (Molecular Sieve 4A) – for dehydration and purification of gases and liquids.

2) Synthetic granulated zeolite NaA-APG (Molecular Sieve 4A-APG) – for deep dehydration and purification of natural and associated petroleum gases.

ProductGallery.Name: Synthetic Granulated Zeolite – Molecular Sieves type 3A (active pore size 3Å)
ProductGallery.Description:
1) Synthetic granulated zeolite KA-APG (Molecular Sieve KA-APG) – for selective removal of water vapour from natural and associated petroleum gases.

2) Synthetic granulated zeolite KA-SR (Molecular Sieve KA-SR) – for selective removal of water vapour from fractions on petrochemical units (dewatering of gas of pyrogas, ethane-ethylene and other fractions in Ethylene production units).

At SoluForce we develop, manufacture and market high pressure flexible Reinforced Thermoplastic Pipe (RTP or FCP) systems. As originator and technological leader, our systems are used for a variety of applications such as high pressure (gas) (flow)lines, water injection, mining or hydrogen transport.
With over 3.500km installed around the world, the SoluForce RTP system is certified according to multiple international standards. They last up to 50 years, maintenance free and without scaling or corrosion.

ProductGallery.Name: SoluForce Oil and Gas applications
ProductGallery.Description:
With over 3.500 km of SoluForce pipe systems installed around the world in on- and offshore applications, our customers have been benefitting from our reliable solutions, know-how and experience since the year 2000. 

They last up to 50 years, maintenance free and without scaling or corrosion. Moreover, with our durable and reliable fitting systems, our solutions are easily connected to existing infrastructure.

ProductGallery.Name: SoluForce for Hydrogen Applications
ProductGallery.Description: The SoluForce RTP has been certified for hydrogen applications up to 42 bar of operating pressure. Unique in the world of hydrogen transport and a global first. With a significantly lower CO2 eq. footprint compared to alternatives, this ready to use pipeline solution has a major impact on the feasibility of (green) hydrogen and a sustainable energy mix.

ProductGallery.Name: SoluForce for Offshore Applications
ProductGallery.Description: Light, strong, durable and reliable – and with shorter lead times – our pipeline systems are perfect for connecting low-viability wells to nearby platforms, so eliminating the need for a new drilling platform. They are quicker, easier and cheaper to deploy with no welding required, no need for hot permits and no need for specialist pipe-laying barges. SoluForce pipeline systems are completely corrosion resistant – even in extreme sour service.

ProductGallery.Name: SoluForce for Mining Applications
ProductGallery.Description: The unique properties of the SoluForce system make it perfectly suitable for transporting ore, minerals, water, slurry, chemicals and other fluids in mining environments. In general, the life time of conventional (steel) pipes are relatively short due to abrasion and corrosion, and often cannot cope with the challenging environment in which they are installed. SoluForce pipeline components can resist extreme loads and adhere to ridged safety standards typically found in Mining operations.

ProductGallery.Name: SoluForce for Water Applications
ProductGallery.Description: Featuring polyethylene liners and metal-free fittings, our pipelines systems are durable – they cannot corrode – high quality, fast and easy to install over ground or in trenches, efficient, cost-effective and built for the long term. SoluForce Heavy pipes can withstand very high pressures and are ideal when high pressures and high temperatures are a priority. All SoluForce systems have been approved for potable water applications.

Tecniplant is specialized  in the design and construction of complete Filtration, Oily Water Separation and Water Treatment equipment packages modularized plants. Filtration: Drum Vacuum Filters, Belt/Indexing Vacuum Filters, Pressure Leaf Filters, Sand and Activated Carbon Filters, Dewaxing. Oily Water Separation: API/CPI separators IGF/DGF. Water Treatment: Industrial water filtration processes include different treatment phases based on the contaminants to be removed to obtain Customer’s target.

ProductGallery.Name: DEWAXING
ProductGallery.Description:
MEK Dewaxing (Metil Ethyl Ketone) is a system dedicated to wax separation so it can be used in various industrial fields.

The Dewaxing filter is essentially composed of:

rotary drum
tank with horizontal flange
cake discharge device
The Dewaxing vacuum filter allows to physically remove the paraffin using crystallisation and filtration processes.

The Dewaxing filter uses rotation to allow the paraffin to be first crystallized through cold solvents and then discharged into the appropriate collection hopper.

The most common size for the drum filter is between 30 and 110 m2 of filter surface.

ProductGallery.Name: VACUUM BELT FILTERS
ProductGallery.Description: Vacuum belt filters are ideal for filtration processes that involve the presence of heavy solids and large filtration surfaces. The main feature of the belt filter system is the additional presence of the filtration cloth and a special reinforced rubber belt with draining grooves. Specifically, the rubber belt is activated by means of a variable speed drum, while the vacuum action is created by a vacuum box system.

ProductGallery.Name: SKIDS AND PACKAGES FOR SOLID-LIQUID SEPARATION
ProductGallery.Description: Solid-liquid separation skids and packages are a separation system designed to provide a complete, automated and modular solution for the filtration of suspensions. Specifically, TECNIPLANT developed this filtration system to optimize the plant’s configuration and reduce installation time. The ultimate goal is to create a competitive solution capable of: making the transportation and installation process more economical offering advantages for operational and maintenance activities System.

ProductGallery.Name: PILOT UNITS
ProductGallery.Description: Our use of pilot plants allows us to perform filtration and water treatment tests and oil-water separation directly in the industrial context, at the customer’s premises. In addition, these systems allow us to study, design and implement the best solution for the customer’s need. Research and Development is the heart of our work. Having pilot plants available for testing the countless products that the industry produces is essential for choosing the best process to adopt.

ProductGallery.Name: FLOTATORS
ProductGallery.Description:
Flotators are efficient systems for the continuous removal of suspended oils and solids from water. Specifically, they are secondary treatments to be installed after the API separator and/or the CPI separator. This equipment is especially ideal when high flow rates are involved and if significant separation performance is required.
TECNIPLANT specializes in the design, engineering and construction of different types of induced air/gas flotators (IAF/IGF) and dissolved air/gas flotators (DAF/DGF).

ProductGallery.Name: CPI
ProductGallery.Description: CPI separators are ideal for treating oily wastewater. These lamellar pack separators can be used to treat oily water before flotation units. In particular, CPI separators can treat and remove from the water any oil particles with a diameter of less than 150 microns. This is possible because, when treating oily water, the lamellar pack separators allow the separation of suspended solids and oils from water by exploiting the different specific weights of oil, solids and water.

ProductGallery.Name: WATER TREATMENT
ProductGallery.Description: Industrial wastewater treatment is a process that transforms unsuitable water into water free of the contaminants you want to eliminate, making it reusable for various purposes. The processes involved in separating contaminants during wastewater treatment include multiple steps including: Pre-treatment is a mechanical operation. Primary treatment involves chemical or physical operations to remove materials that could create problems in the subsequent stages. Secondary treatment is the removal of biodegradable organic substances.

ProductGallery.Name: HORIZONTAL PRESSURE LEAF FILTERS
ProductGallery.Description: Horizontal pressure leaf filters are ideal for solid-liquid separation involving large filter surfaces. Simple to use and requiring little maintenance, horizontal pressure leaf filters are composed of a pressure tank with filtering elements inside and a washing system. The filtering elements consist of vertically mounted leaves that filter through both sides. The leaves are the same shape and size. They are interchangeable and ensure ease of maintenance of the filter and uniformity of the Cake.

ProductGallery.Name: SKIDS AND PACKAGES FOR OILY WATER TREATMENT
ProductGallery.Description: Skids and packages for treating oily water make it possible to separate oil and solids suspended in the wastewater from oil refineries or other industrial sources. Basically, this type of system is composed of one or more pieces of equipment, each dedicated to a specific separation. The main advantage of using TECNIPLANT skids and packages for the treatment of oily water is to provide an integrated, complete and ‘turnkey’ solution.

ProductGallery.Name: MULTIMEDIA FILTER
ProductGallery.Description: The Multimedia Pressure Filter is a specific equipment used for removing Turbidity and Suspended Solids from water through the action of a quarzite bed. The effluent is forced to pass through one or more layers of filtering media: suspended solids are retained into the filter bed, while clean water is sent to discharge or further treatments. The reactivation of the filtering bed capacity is carried out by periodic backwashing with clean water

TECNOMATIC FLOW ELEMENTS is the most historical Italian Manufacturer of flow and temperature measurement devices. Since 1962, Tecnomatic is located in Cremona, the Ancient Italian City that has been producing violins since 16th Century, 1 hour south of Milan. Tecnomatic Quality Standards are in compliance with the latest ISO, API, PED, ATEX, Gost Standards for on-shore and off-shore applications, in particular, the Certified Flow Rate Calculation for Multistage Restriction Orifice and the Multiphase Flow Skids.

ProductGallery.Name: Venturi and V-Cone Tubes
ProductGallery.Description:
The Venturi Tube is a differential pressure device suitable to measure flow rate in a closed conduit with the minimum permanent pressure loss.
The Venturi Cone Meter is a differential pressure device to measure flow rate in a closed conduit with the minimum pipe straight length and with high rangeability.

ProductGallery.Name: Orifice Plates
ProductGallery.Description: The Orifice Plate is a differential pressure device suitable to measure the flow rate in a closed conduit (it is an affordable device for general applications).

ProductGallery.Name: Orifice Plate Assemblies
ProductGallery.Description: The Orifice Plate is a differential pressure device suitable to measure the flow rate in a closed conduit (it is an affordable device for general applications). In this version flanges, bolts and nuts are included and fully assembled.

ProductGallery.Name: Meter Runs
ProductGallery.Description: A meter run or meter tube is an assembly consisting of an orifice plate with flanges and calibrated upstream and downstream pipes. Since the meter tube is manufactured as one unit, it is possible to optimally match all components with each other.

ProductGallery.Name: Multihole and/or Multistage Restriction Orifice
ProductGallery.Description: Multi Stage Restriction Orifice Plate Assembly devices are used where the pressure reduction ratio is very high and cannot be achieved by a single stage orifice plate. Thus a multistage device essentially consists of a number of single stage device built in a single spool. Like a single stage device it can be of single hole multi stage design or multi-hole multi-stage design or combination of both.

ProductGallery.Name: Multiport Averaging Pitot Tube
ProductGallery.Description: The Multiport Averaging Pitot Tube (Mapflow) is a differential pressure device suitable to measure the flow rate in a closed conduit for general applications (it is a general purpose and affordable device). Normally used in big pipes with low flow velocity.

ProductGallery.Name: Wedge Meters
ProductGallery.Description: The Wedge Meter is a differential pressure device suitable to measure the flow rate of dirty liquids in a closed conduit (slurry applications).

ProductGallery.Name: Flow Conditioners: Zanker
ProductGallery.Description: The Flow Conditioner is a device that improves the fluid velocity profile across the flow section. This device is typically applied when pipe straight length requirements cannot be satisfied. This often happens when, due to layout constraints, it is not possible to install a flow meter in a straight portion of pipe suitable to obtain acceptable metering conditions. With this device it is possible to have the best fluid velocity profile, even if the pipe

ProductGallery.Name: Flow Conditioners: Etoile
ProductGallery.Description: The Flow Conditioner is a device that improves the fluid velocity profile across the flow section. This device is typically applied when pipe straight length requirements cannot be satisfied. This often happens when, due to layout constraints, it is not possible to install a flow meter in a straight portion of pipe suitable to obtain acceptable metering conditions.

ProductGallery.Name: Thermowells
ProductGallery.Description: Thermowells are precise components serving as protective devices for the primary or sensing temperature elements, as thermocouples, resistance thermometer bulbs, bimetallic thermometers, filled system, etc. of all types of temperature indicating, recording and controlling instruments. Particular care, together with long experience and special designed drilling machines, guarantee the choice of materials and construction of TM Tecnomatic thermowells.

Description: TERRANOVA® is an instrumentation group gathering the oldest and most historical Italian Brands of Process Instrumentation: Spriano® (1923), Valcom® (1974) and Mec-Rela® (1976). Today the Terranova product range includes several technologies related to the measure of pressure, level, temperature, flow, density and other related variables. Terranova is in compliance with all the latest Electrical and Mechanical standards, and proudly serves over 135 countries worldwide, in different market segments with main focus on Oil & Gas.

ProductGallery.Name: SST70 - Displacer Level Transmitters
ProductGallery.Description: The SST70 series SMART level transmitters are microprocessor-based instruments that combine the analog signal advantages (4-20mA) together with the flexibility of digital communication (standard FSK) using HART® or FIELDBUS® protocol. They can be remotely configured by a universal hand held terminal (HHT) or by PC with a dedicated interface. The transmitter series SST70 measures liquid levels, density and interface levels in closed or open vessels

ProductGallery.Name: 65L - Pneumatic Displacer Level Controllers
ProductGallery.Description: 65L series level controllers measure liquid levels and interface levels in closed or open vessels. It converts buoyant force exerted by a displacer immersed in a liquid to a proportional current signal thanks to a mechanical forces transmission device based on a torque tube and a annexes linkage.

ProductGallery.Name: SST76 - Pressure Transmitters
ProductGallery.Description:
SST76 series SMART pressure transmitters are microprocessor based instruments that combine the analog signal advantages (4-20mA) together with the flexibility of digital communication using HART® protocol.
Some of the main characteristics of this microprocessorbased transmitter, are:
- Wide rangeability.
- Automatic temperature compensation.
- Digital communication using HART® protocol.

ProductGallery.Name: SST57B - Differential Pressure Transmitters
ProductGallery.Description: SST57B series SMART differential pressure transmitters are microprocessor-based instruments that combine the analog signal advantages (4-20mA) together with the flexibility of digital communication using HART® protocol. They can be remotely configured by a universal hand held terminal (HHT) or by a PC with a dedicated interface. Moreover, it is possible to locally configure the instruments (zero and span) by means of 4 pushbuttons and to display the data on the wide LCD display.

ProductGallery.Name: SG76 - Pneumatic Pressure Transmitters
ProductGallery.Description: The SG76 works on the force balance principle and consists of two main units: The measuring unit which detects the differential pressure variation and consists of two forged bodies and a measuring capsule. The transmission unit converts the differential force applied to the measuring element into a proportional output pneumatic signal. The output pressure, generated by a flapper nozzle relay, feeds the feedback bellows with a rising pressure.

ProductGallery.Name: SST57BL - Level (DP) Transmitters
ProductGallery.Description: The SST57BL transmitters measure a liquid level head with spans from 1.2 to 10000mbar also with a static pressure. The pressure measuring element is a piezoresitive sensor. It is possible to choose a variety of sensors to satisfy all process conditions. The Spriano measuring cell contains the sensor and transmits pressure to the electronics. Thermal drift is compensated using the temperature signal generated by a PTC thermistor integrated in the sensor itself.

ProductGallery.Name: SST52 - Temperature Transmitters
ProductGallery.Description: The SST52 transmitters are able to accept 3 wires Pt 100 ohm resistance thermometers and total accuracy is depending on class of the sensors utilized such as DIN A, DIN B, 1/3 DIN, 1/5 DIN,1/10 DIN etc. The Spriano measuring cell contains the sensor and transmits the temperature value to the electronics. Based on these readings the microprocessor generates the 4-20mA analog output "two wires system" and displays the pressure measurement on the LCD.

ProductGallery.Name: T7S - Density Transmitters
ProductGallery.Description: T7S series are Smart electronic transmitters with 4 ÷ 20 mA output and HART® digital communication protocol. Sensors are always calibrated individually together with their own seal. These transmitters allow the measurement of specific gravity of fluids as liquids or cement slurry. The instrument gives the specific gravity value of the product by measuring the static differential pressure between the two seals (Δp) and applying the formula р=Δp/d.

ProductGallery.Name: ASL - Ultrasonic Level Switches
ProductGallery.Description: ASL instrument is designed for marine and on-land applications for liquid detection, pump control, water ingress alarm systems, overfilling protection on liquids with or without foam. ASL works on Valcom® proprietary principle of distributed acoustic waves in a metal rod. The variable is the change in the velocity of the ultrasonic waves that will be slower in the air and faster in the liquid.

ProductGallery.Name: MLG - Magnetic Level Gauges
ProductGallery.Description: A permanent magnet incorporated in the float actuates the sensing elements mounted in the special waterproof case, causing them to rotate 180 These elements, which are treated with special paints of contrasting color on the two faces, show the red color faces when the level increases (float going up) and the white faces when the level decreases (float going down), thus showing very clearly the position of the float and hence the liquids level.

PressReleases.Name: Terranova Capability Statement
PressReleases.Description: TERRANOVA® is a group gathering the oldest and most historical Italian Brands of Process Instrumentation: Spriano® (1923), Valcom® (1974) and Mec-Rela® (1976). Our mission is to present a great portfolio of experiences and solutions for all Process Industries with the quality, the creativity and the excellence that the Italian manufacture has always demonstrated in the years.

ProductGallery.Name: AutoHEAT (part 1)
ProductGallery.Description:
It is used in the first welding station in S-Lay projects while for J-Lay projects is used in the preparation area of the multy-joint pipe and in the

This solution integrates the INDUCTION HEATING INVERTER and a DEMAGNETIZER into the same machine.
The system is completed with an INDUCTION-COIL equipped with infrared temperature sensor and gauss meter sensor. The machine

ProductGallery.Name: Additive Manufacturing & 3D Printing (Reverse Engineering)

Additive manufacturing is used for rapid manufacturing, rapid prototyping and rapid tooling where a master is made via 3D printing.

ProductGallery.Name: KwikDraw Charcoal/Sorbent Tubes
ProductGallery.Description: Charcoal tubes and Silica Gel tubes are sorbent tubes specifically designed to monitor personal exposure to organic vapors and aerosols.

ProductGallery.Name: Hazmat Kits
ProductGallery.Description: Hazmat kits are portable kits designed to aid in the initial assessment of potentially hazardous situations.

ProductGallery.Name: Kwikdraw Fire Brigade Kits
ProductGallery.Description: Kwikdraw fire brigade kits help quickly identify unknown hazardous gases generated during a fire accident.

ProductGallery.Name: KwikDraw Smoke Tubes
ProductGallery.Description: KwikDraw Smoke tubes are tailor made to test the performance of ventilation systems in buildings, leak detection around doors and windows, etc. These tubes consist of ampoules, which when crushed and air allowed to pass through, produces a visible aerosol plume of white smoke.

ProductGallery.Name: KwikDraw PID Pre-Filter Tubes
ProductGallery.Description: KwikDraw PID Pre-Filter tubes are used to filter volatile organic compounds from an air sample and only allow Benzene/ Butadiene to pass through for a Benzene/ Butadiene specific measurement. These tubes are generally used in conjunction with a PID based gas monitor allowing Benzene/ Butadiene specific measurements. They are available in a variety of specifications enabling them to be used with most of the popular PID instruments available in the market.

ProductGallery.Name: Uniphos Dosimeter Tubes
ProductGallery.Description: Uniphos Dosimeter tubes are custom made to measure Time Weighted Average (TWA) gas concentrations over longer durations. The gas enters the dosimeter tube by the principle of natural diffusion. The sensing chemical in the dosimeter tube changes color if the target gas is present. The length of discoloration is proportional to the concentration of gas in ppm.hrs present in the area.

Description:
ÜNTEL KABLO, one of leading cable manufacturers in the world was established in 1972, Turkey. 
ÜNTEL’s power and instrumentation cables supplies energy for industries which requires experience like marine, offshore, mines and tunnels, airports, railways and have been used in industrial ways such as heavy-duty rubber drum reeling cables, welding cables, control cables and fire resistant cables.
ÜNTEL is also able to produce tailor made products for special purposes.

In the oil industry, Upstream Solutions provides different types of innovative products, services and technological solutions for oil production optimization with environmental awareness covering wide range of downhole and surface state of the art equipment.
Our business module is based on partnership and being open to possibilities, being creative and working with people.

ProductGallery.Name: Rexonics Ultrasound Wellbore Treatment Technology
ProductGallery.Description:
The Rexonics™ technology makes the oil recovery process more efficient and less cost-intensive – with no environmental risks.
Based on 50 years of market leadership with industrial ultrasonic technology solutions, Rexonic Ultrasonics AG was founded to develop Rexonics™, the game changing and patented high power ultrasonic tool set for well stimulation.
High power ultrasonic technology for the stimulation of oil wells. By unclogging the perforation zone more efficiently than other known recovery and stimulation methods.

ProductGallery.Name: RMSpumptools Field Attachable Wellhead Connector Split-Phase
ProductGallery.Description: SPEEDFiT is the new benchmark for high-speed, consistently reliable field installations of downhole cable to Wellhead and Packer Penetrators - saving you even more rig time. Requiring minimal parts and training, just a cable prep is required - SPEEDFiT requires no tapes, no epoxy, no gel and minimal assembly of parts. SPEEDFiT is easily adaptable for use with different size cables, resulting in simple redress for re-use with only a minimum of spares required.

ProductGallery.Name: RMSpumptools Field Attachable Wellhead Connector
ProductGallery.Description: SPEEDFiT is the new benchmark for high-speed, consistently reliable field installations of downhole cable to Wellhead and Packer Penetrators - saving you even more rig time. Requiring minimal parts and training, just a cable prep is required - SPEEDFiT requires no tapes, no epoxy, no gel and minimal assembly of parts. SPEEDFiT is easily adaptable for use with different size cables, resulting in simple redress for re-use with only a minimum of spares required.

ProductGallery.Name: RMSpumptools Single Mandrel Wellhead Connector
ProductGallery.Description: The Vertical Wellhead Penetrator System is one of our most popular products and comprises of a Lower Hanger Penetrator and a Surface Connector (which can be either 45 or 90 degrees). The System is designed to withstand a broad spectrum of downhole conditions including High Temperature, H2S and CO2. Power specification ranges from our standard NEXUS Series at 140 amps/5 kVAC, to our FRONTIER Series at 250 amps/8 kVAC, with a working temperature of 450°F.

ProductGallery.Name: RMSpumptools Y-Tool
ProductGallery.Description: The Y-Tool system offsets the ESP in the well to provide a straight line conduit for wireline or coiled tubing tools to bypass the ESP. Dual Systems allows the operator to run two complete ESP systems in one well, providing a downhole back-up system. An individual cable powers each ESP and either the upper or lower ESP system can be selectively operated without any well intervention required.

ProductGallery.Name: Unico SRP Variable Speed Drive
ProductGallery.Description: Unico SRP variable speed drives provide autonomous optimization for rod pumped wells by utilizing patented algorithms and digital twins to continuously maximize production while ensuring pumping unit integrity. Unico SRP drive software integrates motor control, well optimization, pump fill control, and rod load control into a single, compact solution that enhances usability, energy efficiency, and reliability of both new and existing pumping systems. Built-in guided setup, predicted to measured dynacards, and performance notifications.

ProductGallery.Name: Unico ESP Variable Speed Drive
ProductGallery.Description: Unico ESP variable speed drive systems have patented algorithms, sensorless fluid flow, level estimation, and well inflow simulation. This unique ESP modeling assists in control and optimization of the well.  With embedded intelligence built into every Unico ESP drive, you will achieve optimal performance and protection for CBM, HPS and deep oil well applications under all conditions. Built-in power disturbance ride though, backspin speed sensing, closed-loop speed and torque regulation, and closed-loop fluid control.

ProductGallery.Name: Unico PCP Variable Speed Drive
ProductGallery.Description: Unico PCP variable speed drives integrate motor control and well optimization into a single, compact solution that maximizes production, energy efficiency and reliability of your pumping systems. These application engineered drives provide advanced control for PCP systems by utilizing patented algorithms and modeling to continuously maximize production while ensuring pumping system integrity. Optimized for operation in all PCP driven systems from CBM to heavy crude oil applications.

ProductGallery.Name: Magnetron Step Up Transformers (SUT)
ProductGallery.Description: The Magnetron ESP-SUT has been specifically designed for electric-submersible pumping of oil, combining Magnetron’s extensive expertise in transformer design and manufacture, with the advanced technology of the main ESP Service Providers, resulting in a perfectly matched team to address and meet the technical and economic needs of the oil industry.

ProductGallery.Name: Magnetron Phase Shift Transformers (PST)
ProductGallery.Description: The Magnetron PST has been specifically designed for the connection of variable speed drives used in ESP to the electric power distribution grid, based on Magnetron's extensive knowledge of transformer design and manufacture and on the technological developments of the main manufacturers of variable speed drives, resulting in a device that is a perfect fit to meet the technical and economic needs of the oil industry.

Description: Global Turkish Valve Company VASTAS is designer, manufacturer and service provider of industrial valves and actuators serving oil & gas projects at 70+ countries. Focus products: API & SIL certified Ball, Gate, Check, Plug, Globe Valves and Hydraulic, Pneumatic Actuators.

ProductGallery.Name: Top Entry Ball Valves
ProductGallery.Description: These types of valves are being used for Natural Gas and Crude Oil Pipelines, NG Pipeline Pig Stations, Compressor and Measuring Stations, RMS Pressure Regulating and Measuring Stations for above & underground applications. Generally used between -46°C up to 100°C. PSL2 level can be obtained upon request and it can be manufactured with various materials.

ProductGallery.Name: Split Body Ball Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Split Body Ball Valves are made from forged steel with flanged connections. The body of valve is constructed by welding of all parts except stem housing. No sealing elements are used which might cause leakage through. Inspection and maintenance of such valves may be executed on live line. SIL 2 & 3 certified. When required it can be manufactured from special material according to NACE corrosion standards and/or temperature class.

ProductGallery.Name: Full Welded Ball Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Vastas produces API 6D and API 6A Ball Valves. Vastas Ball Valve production includes Full Welded Ball Valve / NPS 2 - 60 - Split Body Ball Valve / NPS 2 - 56 - Top Entry Ball Valve / NPS 6 - 48 plus compact forged ball valves, other types and tailor-made for special size and materials.

ProductGallery.Name: Gate Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Vastas Wedge Gate Valves are API 600 licensed. They are preferred as closure (shut-down) valves. Upon request it can be manufactured in bigger sizes and from various materials. Custom-made wedge gate valves are manufactured to meet the requirements for high-pressure water, sea-water and waster-water systems. SIL 2&3 certified When required it can be manufactured from special material according to NACE corrosion standards and/or temperature class.

ProductGallery.Name: Check Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Vastas API 6D Check Valves are used at various onshore and offshore projects, It is a full bore valve, suitable for the pig transition. It is used as line valve in natural gas and crude oil pipelines and also used in Pig Stations, Compressor & Metering Stations, Regulating & Metering Stations, Pumping and Filling Stations.

ProductGallery.Name: Plug Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Vastas produces API 6D Plug Valves. Vastas Plug Valve production includes Pressure Balance Plug Valve / NPS 2" - 30" and other types Wedge Plug Valves / NPS 6" - 24" Plug Valve, plus, other types and tailor-made for special size and materials.Plug Valve was the first valve type produced by Vastas, for Unilever vegetable oil plant in 1966. Vastas plug valve is put into service of oil, fuel oil and petrochemical industry, since 1971.

ProductGallery.Name: Globe Valves
ProductGallery.Description: Vastas Globe Valves are commonly used for flow control. They are used for regulating and throttling at various pressures or flow rates and can suit to lines with frequent on/off operations. This type is not a closure valve. The advantage of Globe valves is, they operate smoothly even during sudden opening/closing operations at the line. They are not effected by shocks and vibrations created by the flowing fluid. They do not generally require by-pass systems.

ProductGallery.Name: Globe Type Control Valves
ProductGallery.Description: This type Globe Valves are used for regulating and throttling at various pressures or flow rates and they can provide pressure and flow control as it can operate in semi-open positions. Control Valves can be produced as balanced or unbalanced type. Balance is provided by holes on the disc. Vastas recommend unbalance type for 1” and 1 ½”.

ProductGallery.Name: Compact Forged Valves
ProductGallery.Description: These types of valves are mostly forged steel. The body of valve is constructed by welding of all parts except stem housing. No sealing elements are used which might cause leakage through. Inspection and maintenance of such valves may be executed on live line. When required it can be manufactured from special material according to NACE corrosion standards and/or temperature class.

ProductGallery.Name: Pneumatic & Hydraulic Actuators
ProductGallery.Description: Usage Areas Pipelines, Iron & Steel, Energy Facilities, Drinking Water Lines, Compressor Stations, Pumping Stations, Pressure Reducing Station General Features Local & Remote Control (Standard), ESD, Emergency Reservoir, Partial Stroke Test (Optional)

Mining consulting company evaluating mining and exploration projects. We specialize in increasing value across the mining value chain. PressReleases.Name: Successfully showcasing VBKOM at WAMPEX 2022
PressReleases.Description:
VBKOM attended the 16th West African Mining and Power Expo (WAMPEX), which was hosted at the Accra International Conference Centre in Ghana from 1 to 3 June 2022.

Business Development Executive, George Olivier, proudly represented VBKOM by tending to the VBKOM exhibition booth located at the South African Pavilion this year.

PressReleases.Name: The Junior Indaba: Tackling the tough topics
PressReleases.Description:
Group CEO, Manie Kriel, attended the eighth annual Junior Indaba, which took place on 1 and 2 June 2022 at the Country Club Johannesburg in Auckland Park, South Africa. This year the organisers created a hybrid event that allowed people to attend both in-person and online.

The Junior Indaba is notoriously recognised for its direct discussions and straightforward update on the status of the junior mining sector and exploration in Africa.

PressReleases.Name: An epic week at the Investing in African Mining Indaba 2022
PressReleases.Description: This was the first in-person Mining Indaba since the worldwide pandemic and was well-attended by industry leaders, investors, and global mining industry government representatives and Heads of State. Approximately 6,500 people registered and attended the event, which is somewhat less than the pre-COVID attendance of 8,000 people however still made for the feeling of a beehive inside the venue.

PressReleases.Name: Preserving quality from pit to port and beyond
PressReleases.Description: The transportation of material from a mining site, over vast distances, to a port terminal and beyond, is a crucial function in the mining value chain of any mining operation. The quality of the material delivered to the market is a key element to a successful operation. Risk management is reliant on product reconciliation and governance, ultimately enabling the determination and analysis of product variances in the mining sequence.

PressReleases.Name: VBKOM Mineral Resource Auditing
PressReleases.Description:
Mineral Resources and Mineral Resource declarations form the cornerstone of all resource development projects and mining operations.

Mineral Resource Reporting Codes were developed to convey standardised technical and material information to investors and shareholders for the purposes of transparency and to provide a level of confidence to a company’s declared Mineral Resource statement which is presented within the Competent/Qualified Person’s Report.

PressReleases.Name: Test Work Successfully Concluded on ARME Zandheuvel Phosphate Project
PressReleases.Description: Adelaide Ruiters Mining and Exploration (ARME) appointed VBKOM in 2019 to conduct and manage the entire bankable feasibility study of the Zandheuvel Phosphate Project close to Saldanha in the Western Cape. The appointment included all aspects of project management for the integration of all technical disciplines.

PressReleases.Name: Project Khomanani – Mining Excellence Workshop
PressReleases.Description:
During February 2021, VBKOM was requested by AML to audit and review the KMR mining operation on several areas of the mining value chain. This included Productivity, Mineral Resource Management, Safety & Legal Compliance, and Talent Management.

VBKOM hosted a 2-day weekend workshop with the KMR and AML management teams in May 2021.

ProductGallery.Name: THE COMPLETE VERTEX MWD KIT
ProductGallery.Description: A complete kit of Vertex positive mud pulse telemetry MWD tools utilizing lithium-Ion batteries to power directional and standard Gamma array sensors. Comprised of 4 sections: Directional Sensor Module, Gamma Sensor Module, Battery Module(s) and Pulser Module.

ProductGallery.Name: VERTEX PULSER & VALVES (TOPLINK & LATCHING LOWER)

ProductGallery.Name: VERTEX BABELFISH INTERFACE FOR ORBIT RSS INTEGRATION
ProductGallery.Description: Vertex Downhole Real Time Data Transmission is available for use with the Orbit Rotary Steerable Tool. Vertex’s downhole electronics and proprietary surface software enable real time communication from the Orbit RSS tool via the BabelFish wireless link creating the most complete and intuitive system available.

ProductGallery.Name: WINC (WIRELESS INCLINATION) AND WINC+ UNMANNED KITS
ProductGallery.Description:
WINC (Wireless Inclination) is an unmanned survey tool that is retrievable.

WINC+ (Wireless Inclination with Azimuth) provides inclination, azimuth, toolface, temp, shock and vibration so you can keep your hole straight and on target, avoiding costly doglegging and potential hole conditions as a result of not circulating while surveying.

ProductGallery.Name: AZIG+  AZIMUTHAL GAMMA RAY, INCLINATION, PRESSURE & DOWNHOLE DRILLING DYNAMICS
ProductGallery.Description: A premium pulser that brings Vertex performance to your current tool string. And with our unique trade in program, you can trade in your current pulser for a great discount on a Vertex pulser.

ProductGallery.Name: SHORT PACK TOOL
ProductGallery.Description: A full MWD tool under 12 feet long with sensors closer to the bit. The smaller size is more tolerant to shock and vibration and simplifies tool service.

ProductGallery.Name: RSS TOOL INTEGRATION & PROPAGATION RESISTIVITY

Description: Virtual Reality Safety Training (VIRSAT)  focuses on developing new educational tools that can be used to enhance the safety competence and behaviors of the frontline workers and their supervisors. VIRSAT aims at providing the best available learning techniques to help companies achieve a safer working environment. This includes Virtual Reality (VR) training. VR revolutionizes learning through its immersive approach which makes training much more effective, efficient, and fun!

ProductGallery.Name: Graded Road Driving Pro
ProductGallery.Description:
Graded Road Driving Pro® is a Virtual Reality serious game. The trainees join
a day in the life of a driver. They follow the driver and need to intervene when a
non-compliance is noticed. Playing the game ensures that the trainee knows,
can apply and will apply the rules. All key graded road rules are addressed.
Also, important vehicle requirements and precautions are addressed.

ProductGallery.Name: Life-Saving Rules Aware
ProductGallery.Description:
The Life-Saving Rules Aware® training is delivered with our Virtual Reality
Headsets. It is a fun tool to further educate workers and promote a safe
working environment. Playing the game ensures that the workers know
the Life-Saving Rules. The Life-Saving Rules Aware® training shows that
fun and safety can go together very well.

ProductGallery.Name: Life-Saving Rules Pro
ProductGallery.Description:
Life-Saving Rules Pro® is a Virtual Reality serious game. The trainees join
a day in a life of a worker. They follow the worker and need to intervene
when a Life-Saving Rule non-compliance is noticed. Playing the game
ensures that the worker knows, can apply and feels empowered to make
interventions.
